story:
Piper Marie is on a mission and we need your help to get there!

We believe that companies should use their platform to help make the world a better place for everyone.  At Piper Marie we have four main goals.

  • To help women feel confident and beautiful.  We believe a great pair of underwear can do just that.

  • To run an eco-fashion company that proves you can make sexy, sweet and fun fashion without hurting the environment.  

  • To help bring manufacturing and jobs back to the USA.

  • To help normalize breastfeeding.


What will the funding go towards?  

Markets and trade fairs $1,500

  • Local French markets

  • Veggie Fest

  • Sukhava Bodhe Yoga and Music Festival

Legal structuring $1,500

  • Trademarks

  • Labels for new fabrics

More sustainable packaging $600

  • Make the switch to recycled packaging that is also biodegradable.

Launching the "Pantie Drawer"  $1,400

  • Waiting for the mail has never been more fun with Piper Maries’ new monthly eco-friendly fashion subscription: The Pantie Drawer! Each month, you’ll receive a fun mailing box with a pair of sexy sweet underwear inside. Handmade from the highest quality, 100% eco-friendly fabrics like organic cotton, bamboo, hemp, or soy, the organic underwear is sure to become your new favorite pair. Your panties will feature limited edition designs and patterns that will never repeat. Sign up monthly, quarterly, or yearly with major savings at each level and watch for surprise gifts throughout the year.


More about Piper Marie

Owned and designed by Rebecca Delgado, who takes great care ensuring Piper Marie's apparel is a truly luxurious and couture product. We use the highest quality fabric for the ultimate comfort and durability. Along with organics we also work with vintage fabrics. Always the perfect fit in all sizes.  Although Piper Marie is still mostly handmade, in order to better meet the needs of our customers, for some products we are partnering with a sustainable manufacture in the USA that will construct them with the same love we do.

As a company, we believe that it’s important to be responsible and make a positive impact on our community and the world at large. We do this by trying to reduce our carbon footprint, sourcing the majority of our materials from American companies and working with other companies that support their employees and communities.

To help normalize breastfeeding we have the "I'm the Pacifier" campaign.  This is something Rebecca feels very strongly about and she knows that with Piper Marie she can help the fight. Learn more at http://pipermarie.com/imthepaci/

We work hard so that when you buy an item from Piper Marie you can be proud, and we hope that you can take our philosophies and implement them in your day-to-day life.




About Rebecca

Rebecca Marie, youngest of four, was born to Walter and Nancy Piper. Growing up in an artist family, Rebecca spent her days dressing up and designing for her dolls. Her Grandmother Gloria was always taking her shopping, intensifying her love for design. Nancy her mother would fill her head with grand stories of her Great Aunt Lil, a designer from Cincinnati, Ohio who would travel to France for fabric and design for the elite. This always had Rebecca wondering if fashion was her calling. With the help from Nancy and Gloria, Rebecca started sewing at eight. She hasn’t stopped since.


After graduating from high school, Rebecca Marie enrolled at the Illinois Institute of Art-Chicago. She graduated in September 2006 with a Bachelor of Fine Art in Fashion Design.

She started Rebecca and Emily Designs with her sister in 2002, designing one-of-a-kind items from vintage and repurposed materials. While also making custom bridal and evening wear.

In 2009 Rebecca married and started a family. After a few years as a stay at home mom, she founded Piper Marie in 2012. Piper Marie still does special orders and freelance work for other designers but in 2014, Rebecca decided to focus on her underwear line. This line is made of sustainable, vintage and repurposed materials. Now a mother of three, she designed this line to lend itself to motherhood and nursing moms. She also is helping normalize breastfeeding with her “I’m the Pacifier” campaign.


More about our perks!

Our fun hipster panties with either lace or elastic.  Offered in blends of Organic cotton with hemp, bamboo or soy.

Our nursing friendly bra is offered with either lace or elastic.  Offered in blends of Organic cotton with hemp, bamboo or soy to match our panties.


Help normalize breastfeeding when you and your little one wear of our items from the "I'm the Pacifier" campaign!

Super easy to nurse in. It's been tested; pull down or up with a tank!



Plus! All gift perks over $20 come with a special shopping pass to be one of the 1st to shop our Spring 2015 line! 

Help get the word out!

Sharing done easy, just copy and past on to the page. 

Twitter

Shaking up the #fashion industry one pantie at a time! @pipermarieshop  Get your perk today and make a difference! http://igg.me/at/PiperMarie  

Consciously made fashion matters, lets make it happen! http://igg.me/at/PiperMarie  #madeinUSA #EcoFriendly @pipermarieshop

story:
I discovered an exciting world of vibrant abstract art, when I went beyond the surface of the urban graffiti I was shooting one day. It changed the way I saw the world. It taught me to look beyond the ordinary, to see things more deeply, to reveal the natural art that's around us all the time but so often goes unnoticed. 


These images needed to be shown and seen, but not just framed, not just on a wall, in a gallery, in some wealthy persons home, or on a corporate boardroom wall. 


These images need to be on a living, mobile canvas, to be experienced by anyone. They need to reflect the surroundings from which they were captured. They needed to walk the streets, to chill out with friends and be social. They needed to connect with the living world. They need to be worn.


The Urban Abstract line was born to bring these striking pieces of macro, urban graffiti art, to a global audience. These are “limited edition” designs (only 13,000 shirts, per design, will be produced, after which, that design will then be retired). So, in a global market, each of these designs will have a short life before being retired. 


The Mandala line is a collection of Christopher Marshall's original art. This is not cookie cutter, mass market, clip art. It was inspired by the ancient mandala form, used for personal insights and the awareness of ones universal relationship.


All of our garments are printed full-front, die-sublimation, on 100% polyester fabric. Die-sublimation on poly delivers the most vibrant color saturation and richest textural details for the longest wear time, all while maintaining the "feel of silk”. 


Your contributions will allow us to upgrade all facets of our new business:  From comprehensive website creation, to new computer systems and production equipment. This will offer us better control of the production process for faster turn around and smoother introduction of new designs, while added greater quality controls. The new website will allow for faster, easier, ordering and an overall more pleasant viewing and shopping experience. With each new design comes various development costs, such as printing dies, plates, screens and stock inventory. Your contributions will greatly assist us in rapidly deploying our new designs while also advancing additional creative projects using this style with home decor in mind.


We want to share the excitement, world wide with a fun and engaging contest!      We can't tell you everything right now. Let's just say...it will be rewarding



____________________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________________

The Christopher Marshall Collection of t-shirts will only be sold on-line and is not available in retail stores. As limited editions you will be one of the few in your area to own one. Be distinctive. Be an original. Expression your true creative nature. Be the living canvas. Join us.

____________________________________________________________________________

"I have gotten so many great comments from strangers about these shirts." "Cool design!" "Where'd you get that?" "Where can I get this?"

____________________________________________________________________________

story:
Short Summary

  • Fairway Jockey was started by young entrepreneur and golf equipment enthusiast, Mike Robinson, to create a platform to make high quality custom tour golf equipment available at a lower cost to the consumer.   
  • Not everyone has access to custom golf equipment built exactly to their specifications with aftermarket premium shafts.  Most players are stuck with stock equipment options from big box retailers that lack the knowledge to fit their clients needs.  We have created a web platform to solve that problem and bring these products to the entire world.  In the end, we want our clients to have the best options available to help them player better golf and shoot lower scores.
  • Check out our review by GolfWRX - GolfWRX is owned by Golf Digest and is the largest online community of golfers in the world!  http://www.golfwrx.com/210121/fairwayjockey-com-review-my-custom-vega-wedge/
  • We have spent the last two years working with industry experts and focus groups to find out what serious golf consumers really want - and Fairway Jockey is the answer.  Fairway Jockey uses a clean interface to help guide the client through the design of their own golf equipment.  In addition, we have programmed our own proprietary shaft fitting application called Shaft Select.  Shaft Select will help make shaft recommendations based off information and data collected from the client.

What We Need & What You Get

  • No business or organization can be a success unless it adds value to the world - We need your support to make this dream a reality!  Not only would we love for you to pledge for one of our great perks, we need you to share the story with a friend.  
  • Not only will you be helping our startup gain momentum, the perks are some of the best deals we have ever offered.  If you're in the market for new custom golf equipment, this is your opportunity to make that happen at the lowest pricing available.
  • Your support will go directly to a fund that Fairway Jockey uses to create a global advertising campaign to spread awareness of our products and services.


Risks & Challenges

  • The largest hurdle for Fairway Jockey will be getting the word out and convincing IndieGoGos to participate in our project.  There are so many great projects and ideas out there, but we hope our innovative platform for the golf industry will set us apart.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but you can still help us grow our brand awareness.  Even liking and sharing our social media pages will go a long way in helping us succeed.

story:
Summary

Growing up playing sports is more than a great way to get kids active its an important gift that can and does shape children's lives.  I started martial arts training at 7 years old and the lessons I learned from training helped me build a fitness company that has taken me around the world. If I hadn't had the opportunities to try and train in different sports my life would be very different today and unfortunately there are many children from financially challenged families that can not participate in sport because of financial boundaries. 

I want to help share the lessons of sport with kids whose families can't afford to pay for them to play. KidSport Canada is a Canadian based charitable organization that raises funds to help support families in need. To help support their nation wide efforts we are starting a new line of jiujitsu apparel called "Spirit of the Samurai." 40 percent of the profits from each sale of any item in the line will go towards donations to KidSport to help children across the country. 

Breakdown 

*Expenses-manufacturing (includes importing and transport fees) & marketing 

*Company-company needs to turn a profit to continue to pay for new designs and labour.

*Kids- This share of the proceeds will be donated to KidSport Canada to aid them in their efforts to support Canadian families struggling to afford the cost of registering their child in sports.

Your contributions will help us launch this clothing line and give kids a chance to get in the game and participate in judo, soccer, karate, and many other wonderful sports. 

What We Need & What You Get

To start this clothing line we are looking to raise $5000:

  • We are currently working with designers and creating some exciting products. Each unique design is costly to create and your support ensures that we can get amazing images that everyone will love.
  • After we create the graphic designs for rash guards, shorts and jiujitsu uniforms we have production costs to meet and your donations will help manufacture the first items.
  • A new website is being created for this project and professional photos need to be taken to sell the products to the public. If we meet our fundraising goal almost all of our expenses would be covered however even if we can't raise the entire amount we are dedicated to launching this project.
  • As a thank you for your generous contributions we are discounting pre-orders on the clothing we are designing. You will be the first to receive an Agatsu Gi or Rash guard depending on the perk you select and the contribution you make. 

(1 kid sponsored for aprox every 10 units we sell.)

(1 kid sponsored for aprox every 10 units we sell.)

(1 kid sponsored for aprox every 5 units we sell.)

The Impact

If you have benefited from organized sports you know first hand how profound an impact it can have on a childs life. Imagine your son or daughter had to stop training or couldn't even start because you could't afford their equipment or registration fee. Now imagine there was a program that could help you and your child. 

  • We can impact the lives of children and their parents with this project.
  • With one donation you can give back to the martial arts for everything it has given you.

Risks & Challenges

Jiujitsu apparel is a very competitive field with lots of established companies selling merchandise. In order to have a large impact with this project we need exposure to help get the word out about our brand and mission. 

  • With the world wide fitness network I have built through my fitness company Agatsu Inc I have many of the contacts necessary to help get the word out about the "Spirit of the Samurai Project."
  • To kickstart this project we will use my companies extensive social media network and also ask many of the martial arts schools and fighters that we know to help spread the word.

Ways You Can Help

We need contributions to launch this product line but we also need attention. Please help us by making a donation and by spreading the word through your social media networks. Click on the idiegogo share tools and tell everyone you know to lend their support. 

Help some kids get in the game. Make a donation today.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Ruth Dent and I'm an artist inspired by music, literature and poetry.  

Virginia Woolf's debut novel, 'The Voyage Out' is a favourite.  

It's 100 years since it was first published in 1915 and I have created an image to capture the spirit of the book.  One afternoon, with two paintings in progress, I reached for a fresh canvas.  Choosing colours for sea, sky and earth, I worked quickly and almost in a dream, finishing with a light blue edge to hold the image - like text on a page.   

Digitally printed onto crepe satin silk, this is now the Voyage Out Centenary Scarf; only 100 will be printed.

And Isabel and I would like to invite you to buy one of these scarves.

Isabel works with me, despite living far away ... in New Zealand.  She organises the blog posts on my website, helps manage my social media and marketing.  We regularly Skype to bounce ideas around and discuss plans and progress.


What We Need & What You Get

Already we've had three scarves pre-printed to see what it looks like, feel how it wears and be sure we've chosen the right silk.

  

The scarves measure 136cm x 136cm, are digitally printed on luscious velvety crepe satin silk and made in England.

A few friends and collectors have had an advance peek at the scarf - some can't wait to own and wear it, whilst others are planning to hang it on the wall!

And we've used these scarves in the video and promotional photographs.

So now we're ready to produce these 100 Voyage Out Centenary Scarves, and that's why we're asking you to support this project, as the funds raised will pay our production costs. 

And your reward for supporting us can include one of these limited edition scarves.

If we don't achieve full funding, we will still print the scarves that you have purchased, so you will still receive your scarf plus any other perks you have chosen.

The Impact


So "what's so special?" 

"Apart from being Virginia Woolf's debut novel?" 

The Voyage Out is a fantastic read:

It follows Rachel Vinrace, as she leaves England on her father’s ship, The Euphrosyne, bound for South America.  She travels with her Aunt and Uncle and a collection of other passengers - including Clarissa Dalloway, for part of the sea journey.  Over the course of the voyage and subsequent stay amongst ex-pats in South America, Rachel’s views on life develop and she finds her own voice, emerging a 'free-spirit'.  Rachel’s lifelong love is music, and a recurring theme is that it “says everything”. 

Virginia Woolf wrote of her intention when writing The Voyage Out:

"What I wanted to do was to give the feeling of a vast tumult of life, as various & disorderly as possible, which should be cut short for a moment by the death, & go on again ..."

And because it was her first novel, it's centenary should be celebrated, and what better way that to be able to take a scarf on your travels that has been inspired by an imaginary voyage by one of the twentieth century's greatest novelists?

Now I'd like you to see that if I set out to do something, I keep going until the project is successfully completed.  So here are a couple of projects that I've been involved with since graduating in 2010 with a BA (Hons) in Printmaking (First) from UCA.

Art for Evensong

Inspired by Choral Evensong at Rochester Cathedral, I created a visual journey of the service as a series of 16 prints in 2009.  In 2012 these were transformed into painted banners and displayed in Rochester Cathedral.  Subsequently I took the banners 'on-tour' and they were hung in St German, Isle of Man (2013), Worcester and Bradford (2014).  


Travels with my scarf

A first experience of taking a painting and turning it into a silk scarf.  Travels with my scarf launched in 2014, with four scarves inspired by music and packed in bespoke, hand-printed packaging.  Collectors are encouraged to share their travels on our blog, where we take photographs and add a little text - maybe a story, quotation or link to historical event or a famous person.  

This is when Isabel and I started working together.

Isabel with L'Hiver scarf.

And with the successful completion of the Voyage Out Centenary Scarf project, there will be another scarf to feature on the blog.  We do hope so!

Risks & Challenges

We've worked hard to minimise the risks - three scarves have been pre-printed and used to check quality and ascertain peoples' opinions.  We've used a manufacturer we've worked with before, and have pre-ordered a small number of scarves.

The biggest risk lies in the timing ... there's a 6 week lead-time and we need to get our order in as soon as possible to guarantee delivery in time for Christmas.

So it's over to you - if you, like us, like Virginia Woolf's writing, and you like the Voyage Out Centenary Scarf and you want to have one, please rush to choose your perk and help us get to our funding target ..

... the sooner we reach our target the sooner we can order those scarves!

And we promise to keep you updated with planned and actual delivery times.

Your support will help us as we build our brand of art inspired scarves and we'd really like you to be part of 'Travels with my scarf' ... who knows where we'll be going next?


Other Ways You Can Help

We want to say a big "Thanks for reading this far!"

And "yes - you can help".  Please share this campaign if you would like to see us succeed.  

We know you can't all buy a scarf so there are some lower cost perks here too.  

To be the first to hear about Ruth's art and future events please signup to receive her monthly newsletter: http://www.ruthdent.com/subscribe/

And we promise never to share your email address with anyone.

Want to share an idea, or comment - please contact Ruth directly.

And finally ... images of the perks!


This is how your scarf will be packaged - in a hand printed folder complete with one story postcard, five picture postcards, tied with ribbon threaded through a numbered, signed label to guarantee authenticity.

The River, 40 x 40 cm, acrylic on canvas
“Sometimes the flats and churches and hotels of Westminster are like the outlines of Constantinople in a mist; sometimes the river is an opulent purple, sometimes mud-coloured, sometimes sparkling blue like the sea.” [1992:4]

A slight but perceptible wave, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas
“A slight but perceptible wave seemed to roll beneath the floor; then it sank; then another came, more perceptible. Lights slid right across the uncurtained window. The ship gave a loud melancholy moan.” [1992:9]

The voyage had begun, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas
“The voyage had begun, and had begun happily with a soft blue sky, and a calm sea. The sense of untapped resources, things to say as yet unsaid, made the hour significant, so that in future years the entire journey perhaps would be represented by this one scene, with the sound of sirens hooting in the river the night before, somehow mixing in.” [1992:17]

Like a ball of thistledown, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas

“Inextricably mixed in dreamy confusion, her mind seemed to enter into communion, to be delightfully expanded and combined with the spirit of the whitish boards on deck, with the spirit of Beethoven Op. 112*, even with the spirit of poor William Cowper there at Olney. Like a ball of thistledown it kissed the sea, rose, kissed it again, and thus rising and kissing passed finally out of sight.” [1992:29]

*Beethoven Op. 112 – A calm and prosperous voyage

It happened at tea, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas
“Quite suddenly the storm relaxed it’s grasp.  It happened at tea; the expected paroxysm of the blast gave out just as it reached its climax and dwindled away, and the ship instead of taking the usual plunge went steadily.  The monotonous order of plunging and rising, roaring and relaxing , was interfered with, and every one at table looked up and felt something loosen within them.”[1992:63]

They had dropped anchor, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas
“They had dropped anchor in the mouth of the Tagus, and instead of cleaving new waves perpetually, the same waves kept returning and washing against the sides of the ship.” [1992:30]

Mrs Dalloway, 50 x 100cm, acrylic on canvas

“‘What I find so tiresome about the sea is that there are no flowers in it. Imagine fields of hollyhocks and violets in mid-ocean! How divine!'” Mrs Dalloway and her husband Richard, had joined the Euphrosyne for part of the voyage.

Later, Mrs Dalloway would get her own book.

The moon poured its light through the empty air, 100 x 50cm, oil and acrylic on canvas

Over the course of the sea journey and her stay in Santa Marina, the heroine, Rachel develops emotionally, mentally and socially, in the process emerging a ‘free-spirit’. She meets and becomes engaged to Terence, a would-be author, to whom, at the top of a cliff she states that “Music goes straight for things. It says all there is to say at once”. Then she catches a fever and dies.

Then “for two or three hours longer the moon poured its light through the empty air. Unbroken by clouds it fell straightly, and lay almost like a chill white frost over the sea and the earth.”

I imagined that the night sky would be a deep inky blue and the moon, shining over the sea contains colours associated with the land and Rachel’s thoughts as its light pours down.

The Voyage Out, 100 x 100cm, oil on canvas

‘The Voyage Out’ by Virginia Woolf was originally published in 1915 by Gerald Duckworth, her half-brother. 

My quotations are from the Penguin 1992 edition.
story_txt:
Short Summary Hi, my name is Ruth Dent and I'm an artist inspired by music, literature and poetry.  
Virginia Woolf's debut novel, 'The Voyage Out' is a favourite.  
It's 100 years since it was first published in 1915 and I have created an image to capture the spirit of the book.  One afternoon, with two paintings in progress, I reached for a fresh canvas.  Choosing colours for sea, sky and earth, I worked quickly and almost in a dream, finishing with a light blue edge to hold the image - like text on a page.   


Digitally printed onto crepe satin silk, this is now the Voyage Out Centenary Scarf; only 100 will be printed.
And Isabel and I would like to invite you to buy one of these scarves.
Isabel works with me, despite living far away ... in New Zealand.  She organises the blog posts on my website, helps manage my social media and marketing.  We regularly Skype to bounce ideas around and discuss plans and progress.
   What We Need & What You Get
Already we've had three scarves pre-printed to see what it looks like, feel how it wears and be sure we've chosen the right silk.

  

The scarves measure 136cm x 136cm, are digitally printed on luscious velvety crepe satin silk and made in England.


A few friends and collectors have had an advance peek at the scarf - some can't wait to own and wear it, whilst others are planning to hang it on the wall!

And we've used these scarves in the video and promotional photographs.

So now we're ready to produce these 100 Voyage Out Centenary Scarves, and that's why we're asking you to support this project, as the funds raised will pay our production costs. 

And your reward for supporting us can include one of these limited edition scarves.

If we don't achieve full funding, we will still print the scarves that you have purchased, so you will still receive your scarf plus any other perks you have chosen.

    The Impact

So "what's so special?" 

"Apart from being Virginia Woolf's debut novel?" 

The Voyage Out is a fantastic read:

It follows Rachel Vinrace, as she leaves England on her father’s ship, The Euphrosyne, bound for South America.  She travels with her Aunt and Uncle and a collection of other passengers - including Clarissa Dalloway, for part of the sea journey.  Over the course of the voyage and subsequent stay amongst ex-pats in South America, Rachel’s views on life develop and she finds her own voice, emerging a 'free-spirit'.  Rachel’s lifelong love is music, and a recurring theme is that it “says everything”. 

Virginia Woolf wrote of her intention when writing The Voyage Out:

"What I wanted to do was to give the feeling of a vast tumult of life, as various & disorderly as possible, which should be cut short for a moment by the death, & go on again ..."

And because it was her first novel, it's centenary should be celebrated, and what better way that to be able to take a scarf on your travels that has been inspired by an imaginary voyage by one of the twentieth century's greatest novelists?

Now I'd like you to see that if I set out to do something, I keep going until the project is successfully completed.  So here are a couple of projects that I've been involved with since graduating in 2010 with a BA (Hons) in Printmaking (First) from UCA.


Art for Evensong


Inspired by Choral Evensong at Rochester Cathedral, I created a visual journey of the service as a series of 16 prints in 2009.  In 2012 these were transformed into painted banners and displayed in Rochester Cathedral.  Subsequently I took the banners 'on-tour' and they were hung in St German, Isle of Man (2013), Worcester and Bradford (2014).  




Travels with my scarf

A first experience of taking a painting and turning it into a silk scarf.  Travels with my scarf launched in 2014, with four scarves inspired by music and packed in bespoke, hand-printed packaging.  Collectors are encouraged to share their travels on our blog, where we take photographs and add a little text - maybe a story, quotation or link to historical event or a famous person.  

This is when Isabel and I started working together.

Isabel with L'Hiver scarf.

And with the successful completion of the Voyage Out Centenary Scarf project, there will be another scarf to feature on the blog.  We do hope so!

    Risks & Challenges
We've worked hard to minimise the risks - three scarves have been pre-printed and used to check quality and ascertain peoples' opinions.  We've used a manufacturer we've worked with before, and have pre-ordered a small number of scarves.

The biggest risk lies in the timing ... there's a 6 week lead-time and we need to get our order in as soon as possible to guarantee delivery in time for Christmas.

So it's over to you - if you, like us, like Virginia Woolf's writing, and you like the Voyage Out Centenary Scarf and you want to have one, please rush to choose your perk and help us get to our funding target ..

... the sooner we reach our target the sooner we can order those scarves!

And we promise to keep you updated with planned and actual delivery times.

Your support will help us as we build our brand of art inspired scarves and we'd really like you to be part of 'Travels with my scarf' ... who knows where we'll be going next?
 
    Other Ways You Can Help
We want to say a big "Thanks for reading this far!"

And "yes - you can help".  Please share this campaign if you would like to see us succeed.  

We know you can't all buy a scarf so there are some lower cost perks here too.  

To be the first to hear about Ruth's art and future events please signup to receive her monthly newsletter: http://www.ruthdent.com/subscribe/


And we promise never to share your email address with anyone.

Want to share an idea, or comment - please contact Ruth directly.


And finally ... images of the perks!


This is how your scarf will be packaged - in a hand printed folder complete with one story postcard, five picture postcards, tied with ribbon threaded through a numbered, signed label to guarantee authenticity.



The River, 40 x 40 cm, acrylic on canvas

“Sometimes the flats and churches and hotels of Westminster are like the outlines of Constantinople in a mist; sometimes the river is an opulent purple, sometimes mud-coloured, sometimes sparkling blue like the sea.” [1992:4]



A slight but perceptible wave, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas

“A slight but perceptible wave seemed to roll beneath the floor; then it sank; then another came, more perceptible. Lights slid right across the uncurtained window. The ship gave a loud melancholy moan.” [1992:9]



The voyage had begun, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas

“The voyage had begun, and had begun happily with a soft blue sky, and a calm sea. The sense of untapped resources, things to say as yet unsaid, made the hour significant, so that in future years the entire journey perhaps would be represented by this one scene, with the sound of sirens hooting in the river the night before, somehow mixing in.” [1992:17]



Like a ball of thistledown, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas


“Inextricably mixed in dreamy confusion, her mind seemed to enter into communion, to be delightfully expanded and combined with the spirit of the whitish boards on deck, with the spirit of Beethoven Op. 112*, even with the spirit of poor William Cowper there at Olney. Like a ball of thistledown it kissed the sea, rose, kissed it again, and thus rising and kissing passed finally out of sight.” [1992:29]
*Beethoven Op. 112 – A calm and prosperous voyage



It happened at tea, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas

“Quite suddenly the storm relaxed it’s grasp.  It happened at tea; the expected paroxysm of the blast gave out just as it reached its climax and dwindled away, and the ship instead of taking the usual plunge went steadily.  The monotonous order of plunging and rising, roaring and relaxing , was interfered with, and every one at table looked up and felt something loosen within them.”[1992:63]



They had dropped anchor, 40 x 40cm, acrylic on canvas

“They had dropped anchor in the mouth of the Tagus, and instead of cleaving new waves perpetually, the same waves kept returning and washing against the sides of the ship.” [1992:30]



Mrs Dalloway, 50 x 100cm, acrylic on canvas


“‘What I find so tiresome about the sea is that there are no flowers in it. Imagine fields of hollyhocks and violets in mid-ocean! How divine!'” Mrs Dalloway and her husband Richard, had joined the Euphrosyne for part of the voyage.
Later, Mrs Dalloway would get her own book.

Over the course of the sea journey and her stay in Santa Marina, the heroine, Rachel develops emotionally, mentally and socially, in the process emerging a ‘free-spirit’. She meets and becomes engaged to Terence, a would-be author, to whom, at the top of a cliff she states that “Music goes straight for things. It says all there is to say at once”. Then she catches a fever and dies.

I imagined that the night sky would be a deep inky blue and the moon, shining over the sea contains colours associated with the land and Rachel’s thoughts as its light pours down.


The Voyage Out, 100 x 100cm, oil on canvas

My quotations are from the Penguin 1992 edition.

story:
VISIT OUR NEW ONLINE STORE HERE!

Welcome to Barbas & Zacári Watches, a watch brand establish by two entrepreneurial designers from Melbourne, Australia. With a passion for minimalist style watches, Barbas & Zacári offer contemporary and fashionable watches that can be worn to suit any occasion. 


We believe that the traditional means of business are becoming obsolete, which is why we have eliminated the wholesale phase, completely cut out expensive agent costs, traditional marketing expenses and retail mark-up prices. Selling directly to the consumer online, has allowed us to price our watches at only a fraction of the price.

We are extremely proud to announce that we are official partners of 'The Cancer Research Foundation of Australia'. To give back to a good cause and to do what we can to help, we are donating $5 (AUD) for every watch sold to the foundation.

The video below is spoken by Professor Ian Brown, Chief Executive of the Australian Cancer Research Foundation.


Our goal is to donate $1,000,000 in total to the foundation. In doing so, we need your support to help us fund the production of our watches, and at the same time, you'll be doing your part to help a great cause.

 In designing our timepieces, we have partnered with leading designers to create 5 minimalist styles for our first release.

Walnut Brown / Silver

Midnight Black

Gold / Black

Snow White

Rose Gold / Peach

Barbas & Zacári Watches lead the way in not only providing a stylish and fashionable watch at such a low price, but we also lead the way in quality and design. We use genuine Italian Leather bands and have sourced the highest quality materials in dealing with different manufacturers to provide you with the highest quality watch for your wrist.

Case Material: 316L

Stainless Steel Case Diameter: 43 mm

Opening Size: 40mm

Face/Dial Diameter: 38 mm

Bezel Width: 2 mm

Crown Size: 5mm

Band Material: Genuine Italian Leather Band

Width: 20 mm

Clasp: Pin Clasp

Clasp Material: 316L Stainless Steel

Dial Window Material: Hardened Mineral Glass

Movement: Japanese Quartz

Water Resistant: 3ATM/30 Meters

We are so confident in the quality of our watches, that if something were to go wrong within the first 2 years, we will swap it over for you absolutely free. All our watches are backed with a 2 year warranty.

The risks and challenges that we face can be easily overcome. Our main challenge is spreading the word about Barbas & Zacari and helping us market our brand via social media platforms. We have proven that in a short period, we can gain a large following and support base from the community, reaching almost 50,000 instagram followers. If we can continue to grow this following, we have no doubt that we can reach 100,000 followers within the coming months.


www.facebook.com/barbasandzacari
www.instagram.com/barbasandzacari
www.barbasandzacari.com

story:
We are an eco-friendly retailer that rescues and reinvents unwanted textiles and vintage clothing. Our mission is to spread awareness about the importance of recycling textiles and provide consumers with unique and sustainable fashions.                          

The Problem

  • The fashion industry is the the world's second most polluting industry in the world.
  • 97% of our clothing is made overseas - and mostly by women in poor countries, there is a lack of transparency of who and how our clothing is made.
  • Every year, 80 billion new pieces of clothing are consumed, and the "old" clothing is thrown out.
  • Many fabrics are synthetics and take years to decompose, leaving mounds of clothing in the landfill.

Making an impact and creating change…

The EPA states, that clothing recycling today has an equivalent impact of removing one million cars from the nation’s roads.

  • MamerSass created a textile recycling event called Project Clothing Revival, where local churches and schools partner with us to help divert clothing from entering the landfill, and in return, we donate funds to their causes.
  • Teaching children the art of fashion design and repurposing at our "Sass Up Your Summer" Fashion Design Summer Camp Series.
  • Wine & Design- a night where adults learn how to upcycle clothing and jewelry while enjoying a glass of a wine! Held at our shop on Chincoteague Island, women create unique art and fashion using recycled materials.


                                                                  

There is Power in What we Purchase

  • Consumers are a big part in changing the way clothing is made and sold.
  • By buying second-hand and repurposed products you lessen the demand for new manufacturing.
  • By shopping at MamerSass you give discarded garments a chance to live again as new creations.
  • We believe one person can spark change in the world, but together is where our true power lies.

                        

We need to raise $55,000 to take our business to the next level. 

  • Storage/production warehouse 
  • Hiring of a designer/seamstress
  • Industrial sewing machines
  • Dress forms
  • iMac computer and printer
  • Vintage inventory
  • Supplies

Our Roots

I am Jamey Brittingham, the owner of MamerSass Reinvented Fashions. I have a BS in Apparel Design and a minor in Art from Radford University. I worked in the fashion industry for trim manufacturers and suppliers in New York City for several years. It was there that I saw, first hand, the extreme waste.  In 2014, I opened MamerSass with just a little savings and a lot of hard work. I am passionate about reclaiming and redesigning textiles into garments that can live again and help convey beauty as well as an environmentally consciousness. 

                              


                             We've been featured in:

                       

  Sass Up Your Summer: Fashion Camp                  The Journey of an Upcycled Life


                                

                                                                  Great Small Towns


Currently we are the #1 shopping attraction on Chincoteague Island on TripAdvisor.com!

                                                                 

Challenges

  •  I wear too many hats. I am the designer, the seamstress, the shop manager, the photographer, even the website designer!  I need an employee to help distribute the work load and allow me to spread my message to a broader base of people.
  •  I create all of our reinvented products in a small room in our retail shop. I love what I do, and our customers do too - (sales have doubled in one year) but we need more space and more hands!

 Ways You Can Help

  • Not able to donate at this time, but excited about what we do? No worries, there are many things you can do to help spread the word.
  • Help make some noise about our campaign - share on social media and tell your friends!  Don't forget you can even share directly from this page!


 Join the MamerSass Movement!

Your support will enable us to grow and make a bigger and broader impact on the environment and encourage others to reuse and repurpose textiles.

Not able to donate at this time, but excited about what we do? No worries, there are many things you can do to help spread the word.
Help make some noise about our campaign - share on social media and tell your friends!  Don't forget you can even share directly from this page!





 Join the MamerSass Movement!
Your support will enable us to grow and make a bigger and broader impact on the environment and encourage others to reuse and repurpose textiles.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Erica Rupp and I have been invited to present my very first fashion collection at Vancouver Fashion Week F/W 2016. I specialized in costume making during my studies at the Arts University Bournemouth, where I earned a BA(hons) Costume with Performance Design degree. Drawing inspiration from my history with fine arts and tattooing, I have a unique vision and apply my enthusiasm for music into my artwork and designs. My portfolio is online at ericaannrupp.com. 

Rhinestoned Warhol is so titled due to my experiences living in Nashville the past four months - I’ve always been most inspired by pop culture and Andy Warhol’s take on pop art, and I came to Nashville to complete an unpaid internship for Manuel Cuevas at Manuel Couture. I fell in love with Nashville immediately and intend to make a collection about all the things that make Music City so unique! I want to combine the Manuel and Warhol influences with the most unique products, people and places from, in and around Nashville. Included on the cover page is a photograph of the style of work I will be continuing with for this project. The fabric comprising the dress pictured is a design I drew with some of my favourite images of Lady Gaga, worn with a faux fur coat, glove and wallet, all of which I designed, pattern drafted or draped, and constructed. Below that is a simple dress with a Mars Attacks! design I drew based off of the film’s poster. Pictured underneath is a simple quick sketch for a western style t-shirt, with leather collar, faux closure and piping, hand sewn arrows and 2 separate custom designed fabrics for a local band, the Stephen Cochran Project; they do a lot of work for veterans, and I hope to highlight other bands and places that give back to the community.

I am proposing for your business to get the opportunity to have fashion created with your logo and supplemental photographs of your location, product, etc., in an all over kaleidoscopic repeating pattern print in a bright and fresh way that will appeal to a broad audience! I have included facts and figures provided by Vancouver Fashion Week below and in the gallery about viewership and attendance of the event, which is the second largest fashion week in North America. This is a great way for both of us to get international brand recognition! I have also selected a young local to Nashville model, Evan Poirier, to walk in the show in the finale piece provided funding falls into place. I very much want to be able to establish myself as a Nashville designer, although I am still new in town, because I feel so at home here and would love to continue to get to know the city better as I grow right along with it! Help me help you let the world know that there is more to Music City than country music! Thank you for considering commitment as a sponsor of Strawberry Moon Cactus presents: Rhinestoned Warhol at Vancouver Fashion Week F/W 2016.

What We Need 

BUDGET

ESTABLISHED DESIGNER PACKAGE B - 12- 16 looks - $3,800 USD + tax

TRAVEL/LODGING

•$600 return flight

•$450 hotel for 6 nights

NECESSARY SUPPLIES

Custom Printed Fabrics:

•Performance Pique: 18/yd x10 = $180

•Modern Jersey: 23.85/yd x15 = $360

•Minky: 24.30/yd x5 = $125 

•Faux Suede: 30.60/yd x5 = $155

•Misc. Non-Custom Fabrics: $200

Sewing Notions:

•Serger thread: $30 

•Elastic: $30

•Extra Sewing Machine/Serger Needles: $25

•Regular threads: $25

•Zippers: $30

•100 Snaps and Setting kit: $60

•7 specialty feet kit: $60

•Misc. (hand sewing needles, extra thread, etc): $20

Package B total: $6,150 + taxes, assorted fees/unexpected costs:$7,190

& What You Get

Exposure:


Sponsorship Opportunities: 

Sponsorship Opportunities: 

Platinum Sponsor $1,500
* Entire Look covered with all over print of your logo/images- includes dress or skirt/trousers and/or top, with coat lining or exterior of coat, and handbag or hat 

*Name/logo on all my personal advertisements shared by myself and friends/family    via social media AND on backdrop image for runway show*Logo recognition and link to company on my website*Two (2) complimentary tickets to the runway show

Gold Sponsor $500

*Name/logo on all my personal advertisements shared by myself and friends/family via social media  AND on backdrop image for runway show                     *Logo recognition and link to company on my website

Silver Sponsor $250

*Logo recognition and link to company on my website

story_txt:
Short Summary 

My name is Erica Rupp and I have been invited to present my very first fashion collection at Vancouver Fashion Week F/W 2016. I specialized in costume making during my studies at the Arts University Bournemouth, where I earned a BA(hons) Costume with Performance Design degree. Drawing inspiration from my history with fine arts and tattooing, I have a unique vision and apply my enthusiasm for music into my artwork and designs. My portfolio is online at ericaannrupp.com. 
Rhinestoned Warhol is so titled due to my experiences living in Nashville the past four months - I’ve always been most inspired by pop culture and Andy Warhol’s take on pop art, and I came to Nashville to complete an unpaid internship for Manuel Cuevas at Manuel Couture. I fell in love with Nashville immediately and intend to make a collection about all the things that make Music City so unique! I want to combine the Manuel and Warhol influences with the most unique products, people and places from, in and around Nashville. Included on the cover page is a photograph of the style of work I will be continuing with for this project. The fabric comprising the dress pictured is a design I drew with some of my favourite images of Lady Gaga, worn with a faux fur coat, glove and wallet, all of which I designed, pattern drafted or draped, and constructed. Below that is a simple dress with a Mars Attacks! design I drew based off of the film’s poster. Pictured underneath is a simple quick sketch for a western style t-shirt, with leather collar, faux closure and piping, hand sewn arrows and 2 separate custom designed fabrics for a local band, the Stephen Cochran Project; they do a lot of work for veterans, and I hope to highlight other bands and places that give back to the community.





I am proposing for your business to get the opportunity to have fashion created with your logo and supplemental photographs of your location, product, etc., in an all over kaleidoscopic repeating pattern print in a bright and fresh way that will appeal to a broad audience! I have included facts and figures provided by Vancouver Fashion Week below and in the gallery about viewership and attendance of the event, which is the second largest fashion week in North America. This is a great way for both of us to get international brand recognition! I have also selected a young local to Nashville model, Evan Poirier, to walk in the show in the finale piece provided funding falls into place. I very much want to be able to establish myself as a Nashville designer, although I am still new in town, because I feel so at home here and would love to continue to get to know the city better as I grow right along with it! Help me help you let the world know that there is more to Music City than country music! Thank you for considering commitment as a sponsor of Strawberry Moon Cactus presents: Rhinestoned Warhol at Vancouver Fashion Week F/W 2016.
   What We Need  
BUDGET
ESTABLISHED DESIGNER PACKAGE B - 12- 16 looks - $3,800 USD + tax



TRAVEL/LODGING
•$600 return flight
•$450 hotel for 6 nights
NECESSARY SUPPLIES
Custom Printed Fabrics:
•Performance Pique: 18/yd x10 = $180
•Modern Jersey: 23.85/yd x15 = $360
•Minky: 24.30/yd x5 = $125 
•Faux Suede: 30.60/yd x5 = $155
•Misc. Non-Custom Fabrics: $200
Sewing Notions:
•Serger thread: $30 
•Elastic: $30
•Extra Sewing Machine/Serger Needles: $25
•Regular threads: $25
•Zippers: $30
•100 Snaps and Setting kit: $60
•7 specialty feet kit: $60
•Misc. (hand sewing needles, extra thread, etc): $20
Package B total: $6,150 + taxes, assorted fees/unexpected costs:$7,190

& What You Get
Exposure:







   
Sponsorship Opportunities:

story:
How Can I Prepare for the Unexpected?


  • Can you remember all of your passwords, PINs and usernames?
  • Have you documented all of your household possessions for insurance replacement claims?
  • Do you have copies of all your family's important and personal documents? And are they stored in a safe place off-site?
  • Would your spouse know what the state of your financial affairs were?
  • Do you keep a daily journal that is locked and encrypted?
  • Would you like to leave instructions for your caregivers in the event you become incapacitated?
  • Can you leave personalized messages for your loved ones and others such that only they can access them?

Think about it:


If something sudden and unexpected were to happen right now, would you or your loved ones be able to walk away with instant mobile access to all the critical information needed to carry on?

iMemorized.com provides you with a secure locked and double-encrypted virtual vault where you can assemble and store all your family's critically important information and yet have it remotely accessible from anywhere on the planet. With the use of the iMemorized app, you'll have 24/7 secure mobile access to all your passwords, financial, travel, and identity documents on the fly.

You leave home every morning believing you'll be home at the end of the day to protect your family's affairs, but the unfortunate reality is this isn't always the case and sometimes the reality is there is no home to come back to. The unexpected happens. Fires, floods, landslides and many other destructive things can happen to you or your home.

How do you recover destroyed information about your insurance, accounts, assets, and identity documents?

How do you catalogue valuables lost to an insurance provider?

How do you recover your most treasured memories such as photo albums and family videos?


Access Important Information Remotely



Use the iMemorized mobile app to create and organize video and audio messages, photos, and notes. Securely transfer them to the iMemorized server at any time.

Store important account, asset, and identity document information. Keep a scanned copy of your passport and other important documents with you at all times - whether you're travelling, or as part of your emergency preparedness.


Leaving Memories for Loved Ones



Create personalized message capsules for all of the people you care about - your parents, your kids, your spouse, or your business partner. Add security to ensure only the person you intend is able to access the contents you've left for them. No lawyer, accountant, doctor, administrator, family members, or anyone else needs to be involved in passing on important information from you to your contacts.



What's Included?


A Fully-featured Web Portal

iOS App Android App

 

NOTE: Your iMemorized subscription includes 1GB of secure storage, but you have the option of upgrading this amount any time.

  


Mobile App Features


Create images, videos, audio recordings, and notes

A daily journal feature for making personal notes or diarizing your life where no others can possibly have access

Generate one-time passwords to access the most secure areas of the iMemorized Web portal


Use the calendar to keep track of confidential appointments and chronologically track your week, month, or year with notes, photos, videos, or voice memos

Create delayed messages before heading out into risky areas or when your plans change and no one has been notified of your whereabouts


iMemorized Web Portal Features


Use the web portal to organize files sent securely from the iMemorized mobile app. This is the easiest way you will ever find to organize your life.

Create and manage information about Accounts (e.g., bank accounts), Assets (e.g., your house, car, or financial investments), and identity documents (e.g., your passport or birth certificate) with mobile access 24/7 on the fly. With iMemorized, you never forget!

Upload files from your computer to your iMemorized Inbox, or directly attach them to Account, Asset, or Identity Document records

Create and manage message capsules for loved ones and business partners


How Do I Leave Messages for Others?

1

Create new photos, notes, audio recordings, videos, and scanned documents using the mobile app or by uploading existing files from your computer.

2

Create a message capsule for someone important. Choose a capsule type: event-based capsule or time capsule. The type determines when your message capsule will be made available to your participant.





3

Fill the message capsule with photos, notes, audio recordings, videos, scanned documents - anything you'd like to leave for your participant.

4

One of the following happens:

  • Time elapses on your time capsule
  • You pass away
  • You become severely incapacitated




5

Your family and acquaintances search iMemorized to see if they are one of your participants. Normally you would tell them you are a member of iMemorized and they should check the site if something were to happen to you. They join iMemorized entering their own identity information, then search for you by name and provide one of the following:

  • A valid death certificate number
  • Details of your incapacitation
  • An access code your participant received via email

6

Behind the scenes, contact information for any person claiming to be a participant of yours is compared against your list of participants. The death certificate number, incapacitation details, or access code provided by this person is also verified at this time.



7

Once the person inquiring about you has been verified as a message capsule participant, they must then correctly answer all security questions you created to protect the message capsule as an additional safeguard.

8

That’s it! Your participant now has full access to the contents of the message capsule you’ve left for them.


What Makes iMemorized Different?


Protect yourself against the unexpected by storing all your important information in a virtual safety deposit box - whether or not you experience a sudden tragedy or disaster.

There really isn't another platform out there quite like iMemorized. You now have a way to leave behind secure personalized message capsules for the people you care about and can feel secure in the knowledge that no one else will ever have access to it.

iMemorized is a privately-hosted service on dedicated secure servers, meaning it does not use the cloud or any other shared resources.

Do you fully trust large corporate cloud-based services for storing your most important and sensitive personal information? Have you ever accidentally shared information with the wrong person? While these services may be convenient for storing low security documents and photos, what about copies of your Will? Or sensitive financial information? Or personal recordings for someone special? With iMemorized, you can create secure, double-encrypted message capsules for specific individuals - parents, children, business partners - discretely passing on only the information you want that person to have, especially in the event that something should happen to you. iMemorized is that second chance to leave important information behind.


Security Features


   Double Encryption

Message capsules you create are secured using two layers of encryption. The first layer is automatically applied to every file you upload to iMemorized. The second layer is added when you assign a message capsule to one of your contacts (a "participant"). You'll be asked to supply security questions and answers to further safeguard your memory capsule. You should try to select questions that only the person you're leaving the message capsule for would be able to answer. iMemorized uses your answers to these questions to generate an encryption key, which, by its nature, is specific to each of your message capsules. The contents of the message capsule are then encrypted using this key. Since only you and your message capsule participant know the answers to the security questions, and the answers along with the encryption key itself are not saved anywhere on the iMemorized system, no one - not even iMemorized administrators - could unlock (decrypt) any of your memory capsules once assigned. So this means only you and your designated participant have the means to decrypt the files held in the message capsule. iMemorized cannot help you recover this information.


   One-time Passwords

iMemorized uses two-factor authentication to protect the most secure areas of your account on the iMemorized Website. For example, whenever you try to access the highly secure vault area, you'll first be asked to supply a one-time password before being able to proceed. Using the iMemorized mobile app, you can quickly generate this code, then enter it into the Website. One-time passwords are only valid for 30 seconds - after that, a new code will be generated and you'll have to enter that one instead. Two-factor authentication gets it name from combining something you have (your mobile device) with something you know (your password, answers to security questions, etc.)


Why We Need Your Support


We need your support so that we can take our product to the next level. We're a high-tech start-up based out of Victoria, British Columbia, Canada and we're looking to improve and expand the capabilities of our product, specifically, to further develop the iMemorized mobile app and web portal applications and make the interface more helpful and easier to use.

Even if we don’t reach our campaign goal, you’ll still receive full access to the existing iMemorized service, which includes both a Web portal and mobile application. Help us advance personal security and digital message capsule technology.


Description of Perks


iMemorized perks include one or more of the following products:


Subscription to iMemorized


With an affordably-priced annual subscription, you'll have full 24/7 access to the iMemorized service including the mobile app and web portal. Your subscription will be renewed annually with the option to cancel at any time. Your subscription includes 1GB of secure storage on iMemorized's privately-hosted server located off-site at a secure facility in Vancouver, British Columbia.

iMemorized Membership Extensions


To ensure your message capsules are available for years to come, included with some Indiegogo perks are iMemorized memberships. iMemorized Memberships hold your account in good standing for a fixed number of years (e.g., 5 or 10 years), so that if anything were to happen to you, your iMemorized account - along with all of the message capsules you've created - continue to be available to your designated contacts for at least so many years.

Secure Storage Upgrades


Need more secure storage space to leave more memories for people you care about? Upgrade your secure file storage capacity at any time from 1GB to 3GB, 6GB, or 9GB. If you find you don't need the extra space after all, you have the option to downgrade as well.

Current Status and The Plan Going Forward


The iMemorized service is available now with more improvements on the way.

Here's the plan going forward:


Risks & Challenges


The iMemorized platform has for the most part been built upon industry standard technology, which helps to mitigate technological development risk. There are no physical parts or supply chain issues to worry about with our project. The iMemorized service is hosted at an off-site secure facility using dedicated server equipment (no cloud-based services) to ensure maximum security and privacy.


Thank You!


We truly appreciate your support. We will continue to improve the iMemorized web portal and mobile app, and continue to add new features for you to enjoy.

story:
Lets be honest, slim wallets are out there in different shapes and designs. However, none of the ones on sale satisfy our taste for high quality leather while keeping a clever and eye catching design. That is why we came up with The Banker Wallet. With your help, we want to bring to the market the most stylish, elegant, sophisticated and minimalistic wallet that you have ever seen. Every true gentleman should have a Banker Wallet in his pocket. There are colors available for the ladies to!

Don´t miss out! Back us and soon you will answering the question "Where did you get that wallet? I want one!"



Stop driving with that bulky wallet in your back pocket! Say no more to that uncomfortable position while sitting. Say good bye to that bulky wallet!


The Banker Wallet has the perfect design for your EDC (Everyday Carry)


  • Ultra slim minimalist design: Carry your wallet in your front pocket or even in your shirt pocket! Evolve from that bulky old wallet. Less bulk, a lot more style!
  • Cash pocket: Keeps your notes separated from your cards while making them easily accessible. And yes, you can carry cards here and other items. We don´t use magnetic closure. Putting magnets close to your cards (The ones with the magnetic band) can cause demagnetization resulting in ruined cards. 
  • Side Card Sleeve with pull-tab: Provides easy and super fast access to up to 6 cards.
  • Personalize your lining and leather color: A personal touch is always nice! You can choose your preferred pattern for your wallet lining. You want it to be as sexy in the inside as on the outside, don´t you?

Cash Pocket in action


Cards Sleeve with pull-tab in action


So slim that you barely notice it in your front pocket


Unnoticeable even while sitting



We believe that you deserve a top quality product, a wallet you can feel proud to own. That is why we only use the best available materials for our backers. We use full grain leather in all our products. Our leather provides the finest grain, softness and long term durability.

Our wallets are made from the same leather used by luxury brands with a much lower price tag! 






We Believe in honest pricing! You don´t know us, we are not a worldwide famous brand (We expect to become one with your help) hence our prices are not intended to make us rich. We want to raise enough money to bring The Banker wallet to anyone with great taste in any location on the planet while helping us to grow our company and develop new high quality products. This is our first crowdfunding campaign and we expect to create a long term relationship with out backers, not just a single transaction!



We are WABELT Co. We love leather and great design. Early in 2015 devoted ourselves to create a minimalist wallet with top quality leather. The ones out there in the market where "ok" but we wanted something better, something beautiful. We decided to find some inspiration and bring it to life and share it with you today. 

Looking for inspiration we saw a few items made to carry things. We thought that an envelope would do an excellent job as a wallet. In this research we learned that there are different kind of envelopes. One of them is called "The Banker". Our wallets are inspired by this simple yet elegant looking envelope design.

All our wallets are handmade by expert leather craftsmen. We have reunited artisans with the best knowledge in working the finest leather nature can make. Their passion and care for every detail, makes each of our wallets a true masterpiece. Hand crafted luxury items take time to be produced. Several hours are devoted to make each of our wallets. This leads to longer production times but greater quality in our products.

We need your support to bring The Banker wallet to the market. In order to be able to produce a top quality item at an affordable price, we need to put a bulk order to our leather supplier. That is where you come into play! With your help, we will be able to produce the sexiest wallet for those who have great taste.

We recommend getting The Banker wallet ASAP! We can not assure that we will be producing this masterpiece much longer after the campaign ends.

How much is the shipping cost to my country?

We are happy to offer FREE SHIPPING to any country. However, some countries might charge import taxes that we do not cover. Collection and customs clearing costs are not covered by us.

How do I choose the leather color and lining design?

After the campaign end, we will send you a survey to select your leather color and lining design.

How can I buy more than one wallet?

Don´t  miss the bundles! It is a great idea to buy with a friend and get a better price than buying individual wallets.

When will I get my wallet?

We are setting a shipping date that allows us to make each of our backer´s wallet perfect. We don´t want rush the production. Delivering an exquisitely crafted and top quality item is our main objective. However, we will ship in a firstcome, firstserved basis. So, support us today to get your Banker Wallet before everyone ordering after you!

If everything goes as planned, we will be able to deliver our products sooner than the scheduled date.


If you liked our product, please share our campaign so the world can meet The Banker Wallet!

  • Tell your friends how great our products are
  • Please use Indiegogo sharing features.

We appreciate the time you devoted to our campaign. THANK YOU!
story_txt:
Lets be honest, slim wallets are out there in different shapes and designs. However, none of the ones on sale satisfy our taste for high quality leather while keeping a clever and eye catching design. That is why we came up with The Banker Wallet. With your help, we want to bring to the market the most stylish, elegant, sophisticated and minimalistic wallet that you have ever seen. Every true gentleman should have a Banker Wallet in his pocket. There are colors available for the ladies to!
Don´t miss out! Back us and soon you will answering the question "Where did you get that wallet? I want one!"



Stop driving with that bulky wallet in your back pocket! Say no more to that uncomfortable position while sitting. Say good bye to that bulky wallet!







The Banker Wallet has the perfect design for your EDC (Everyday Carry)








Ultra slim minimalist design: Carry your wallet in your front pocket or even in your shirt pocket! Evolve from that bulky old wallet. Less bulk, a lot more style!
Cash pocket: Keeps your notes separated from your cards while making them easily accessible. And yes, you can carry cards here and other items. We don´t use magnetic closure. Putting magnets close to your cards (The ones with the magnetic band) can cause demagnetization resulting in ruined cards.  
Side Card Sleeve with pull-tab: Provides easy and super fast access to up to 6 cards.

Personalize your lining and leather color: A personal touch is always nice! You can choose your preferred pattern for your wallet lining. You want it to be as sexy in the inside as on the outside, don´t you? 

Cash Pocket in action


Cards Sleeve with pull-tab in action


So slim that you barely notice it in your front pocket




Unnoticeable even while sitting









We believe that you deserve a top quality product, a wallet you can feel proud to own. That is why we only use the best available materials for our backers. We use full grain leather in all our products. Our leather provides the finest grain, softness and long term durability.
Our wallets are made from the same leather used by luxury brands with a much lower price tag! 













We Believe in honest pricing! You don´t know us, we are not a worldwide famous brand (We expect to become one with your help) hence our prices are not intended to make us rich. We want to raise enough money to bring The Banker wallet to anyone with great taste in any location on the planet while helping us to grow our company and develop new high quality products. This is our first crowdfunding campaign and we expect to create a long term relationship with out backers, not just a single transaction!
















We are WABELT Co. We love leather and great design. Early in 2015 devoted ourselves to create a minimalist wallet with top quality leather. The ones out there in the market where "ok" but we wanted something better, something beautiful. We decided to find some inspiration and bring it to life and share it with you today. 


   

Looking for inspiration we saw a few items made to carry things. We thought that an envelope would do an excellent job as a wallet. In this research we learned that there are different kind of envelopes. One of them is called "The Banker". Our wallets are inspired by this simple yet elegant looking envelope design.
 

All
our wallets are handmade by expert leather craftsmen. We have reunited artisans
with the best knowledge in working the finest leather nature can make. Their
passion and care for every detail, makes each of our wallets a true
masterpiece. Hand crafted luxury items take time to be produced. Several hours
are devoted to make each of our wallets. This leads to longer production times
but greater quality in our products.




We need your support to bring The Banker wallet to the market. In order to be able to produce a top quality item at an affordable price, we need to put a bulk order to our leather supplier. That is where you come into play! With your help, we will be able to produce the sexiest wallet for those who have great taste.
We recommend getting The Banker wallet ASAP! We can not assure that we will be producing this masterpiece much longer after the campaign ends.






How much is the shipping cost to my country?
We are happy to offer FREE SHIPPING to any country. However, some countries might charge import taxes that we do not cover. Collection and customs clearing costs are not covered by us.
How do I choose the leather color and lining design?
After the campaign end, we will send you a survey to select your leather color and lining design.
How can I buy more than one wallet?
Don´t  miss the bundles! It is a great idea to buy with a friend and get a better price than buying individual wallets.
When will I get my wallet?
We are setting a shipping date that allows us to make each of our backer´s wallet perfect. We don´t want rush the production. Delivering an exquisitely crafted and top quality item is our main objective. However, we will ship in a firstcome, firstserved basis. So, support us today to get your Banker Wallet before everyone ordering after you!
If everything goes as planned, we will be able to deliver our products sooner than the scheduled date.

    


If you liked our product, please share our campaign so
the world can meet The Banker Wallet!

  Tell your friends how great our products are Please use Indiegogo sharing features. 
  We appreciate the time you devoted to our campaign. THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

A pair of sandals for the shrinking middle class. 

What We Need & What You Get

$500 is what is needed to get sandals to the people.

The Impact

  • Support your favorite Democratic Socialist!
  • Get some neat, wacky, political merch on the cheap!
  • Make your friends jealous, and annoy your political opponents!

Risks & Challenges

  • This is a simple enough project that it is honestly fair to say that there simply aren't any particularly striking risks or challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get involved in local politics! Vote, share, and help down ticket!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
In case of any emergency, Etagz can be scanned by paramedics or a good samaritan using a smart phone or tablet QR scanner.

 

Instantly, life saving information which you have provided will be available to first responders.

 

The moment your Etagz is scanned, your emergency contacts from your profile will be alerted via text or email with a GPS location where the tag has been scanned.

 

ETAGZ SPEAK FOR YOU WHEN YOU CANNOT

Etagz is for everyone and especially children, elderly, people with special needs and extreme sport enthusiasts.

 

 

The only thing you pay is $19.99 (+ $36.00 Annual Fee) for a tag which has your unique QR code and links directly to your emergency medical profile when scanned.  Your membership with Etagz is for a lifetime.

 
 
 

Registering YOUR PROFILE on http://www.etagz.net is absolutely free.  

Support our cause in jump starting this amazing

life saving product.

 

Testimonials

I truely believe in etagz, I tested the product before the campaign it is a life saver. I will gladly recommend it to all .

                                                                             Maryam H. (Orange County Ca.)

story: My Name Is Paul Guido. I am 44 yrs old and currently reside on Hutchinson Island, Florida. I am a chef at a small restaurant and have been in the food industry for the past 15 yrs. I came up with the idea for The Amberwhistle aftering viewing a video on Facebook. It showed a young child being taken from a grocery store. Thankfully the child was recovered but it set forth a chain of events that led to our product. After further research into child kidnappings it revealed something staggering. According to the National Center for Missing or Exploited Children an estimated 850,000 children went missing in 2015. Not only that but the numbers for Rape,Murder,Human Trafficking,and all crimes involving individuals is horrific.Although my son is now 23, a trip to Sea World many years ago was brought back to my memory. My son about 6 at the time stepped away from me to get a drink at a fountain not more than 3 feet away. But when I turned and he wasn't by my side I panicked. The thought of losing a child or loved one is horrific. Together we can help aid in the fight with The Amberwhistle. We will be donating a portion of our sales to charities that help these causes. We are trying to raise enough money to develop, manufacture, market and help to raise awareness to these issues. We will be giving our supporters an official Amberwhistle T-shirt and a thank you certificate for your willingness to help us. At the present time we have a Design Patent pending and have an engineer working on the actual prototype along with troubleshooting all would be problems. We have created a website www.amberwhistle.com and have very few challenges left. Funding is the key to completion of the project and will allow us to manufacture and bring to market The Amberwhistle. Although funding maybe key, just spreading the word and getting back to helping save our children and loved ones is help enough. If we can help save lives by helping inform people of the magnitude of these crimes and set forth to educate our children and provide them with the means to help each other we have accomplished our main goal. Help Save Lives…

story:
The people behind Life Saber are just like you. We are everyday people creating solutions for problems other everyday people may face. We aim to make life easier for people by providing high-quality products packed with both mundane and crazy life-changing features. 

 



The LifeSaber Protective Headgear/Bag is designed to provide a lifeline in emergency situations. Its protective features along with its convenience as an “everyday and everywhere” bag will help a lot of people be prepared during worst case scenarios.
 

  • As a bag

Designed for students and professionals, this headgear bag becomes perfect for daily use in the city. Rugged hardened areas on its sides and bottom ensure it stays in one piece even under extreme usage, making it ideal for the gym or for outdoors. It’s also available in many colors to match your unique style!

Its spacious interior lets you bring anything you need to take on your daily life. It comes with a removable padding so you can bring your electronic gadgets without worrying about damage. 

Its exterior mesh, clear and zipper-enclosed compartments give additional storage space that makes organizing your things easier. The convenient design includes a removable shoulder strap so it can transform into a handbag from a sling bag.

  • As a head gear

The LifeSaber team designed this protective headgear to help the wearer survive emergency situations such as typhoons, earthquakes, and other scenarios. Its one-size fit all design, paired with tough materials makes the Life Saber Protective Headgear/Bag reliable companion during hard times.

What lets the bag turn into a headgear is the clear plastic screen that provides people maximum visibility and eye-protection. A fine mesh area gives breathing room to avoid suffocation when worn. You can also improve visibility with the garterized flashlight slot so you can keep your hands free while enjoying a stable light source.

Hard plastic-reinforced areas protect your head from debris and scratches. Its water-resistant nylon fabric cover keeps your head dry from the rain. You don’t need to worry about night time too thanks to the reflectorized linings. The interior provides superior impact absorption and comfort with its three-layer foam cushion.

Velcro fasteners make opening the head gear easier to save valuable time during emergencies. Its high-quality build uses world-class YKK zipper and buckles to ensure its closure and openings will stay intact.

 





Colors to choose from:
Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Gray, Blue, Black, Red
