story:
Hi! 

My name is Cindy Morawetz and I won the Competition to create together with the NDR ( one of german most important TV and radiostations) THE DREZZ for the 42 hostesses for the anual AWARD the German RADIOPREIS one of the most important a Music Awards in Germany.

Since that work I have grown immensely as a designer and I'm ready to take the next step!

THIS IS THE DREZZ you get >





How did I got the Idea of starting an Indiegogo Campaign?

After the dresses were used for the Award, i had them hanging in my closet.I didnt feel well about letting them hang without any use, and how i could find the perfect woman for that dresses and give soetjhing back for animal shelter.


I already designed 2 collections for my brand DREZZ2IMPREZZ or D2I. I sold to individual customers and over my onlineshop DREZZ2IMPREZZ.de


I am in the middle of my Autumn 2016 Collection. I am very excited to announce that I would have the chance to  show my collection in January 19th along the Mercedes Benz Fashion Week in Berlin! 

My brand is an ode to the empowered woman. My overall aesthetic is combining hard and soft elements; specifically using contrasting fabrics, textures and silhouettes. The Success of my DREZZEZ is thatg i use special cutting technique and fabric that let woman look 1-2 sizes smaller.

To start offering my Collection i would need to do a photo shootWith the images, to create a look book enabling me to present this collection to luxury boutiques and department stores all over the world. 

In creating my Autumn line I have i want to move forward in fashion business, however I can not do this without your help!

The INDIEGOGO proceeds will finance production the samples for this collection, pay one fashion show whole the Internation fashion week and book an exhibitian stand at a fashion booth (RED Carpet on Cologne).

The entire line will be available for pre-order and individual purchase on my website then. 


I am starting this INDIEGOGO campaign for 3 important reasons. 

1. Selling the unique design dresses i made for the GERMAN RADIOPREIS instead of keeping them in the closet, and give a big part of that to a the Mallorca Tierrettung because i just moved to Mallorca and I am NOT using animals or  silk, leather or fur for my designs.

2. Getting some attention to my fashion Brand, as it is very expensive and almnost impossible to pay for PR or commercial as the big players do. So that is a good way to draw some more attention on my work and my dresses and maybe find a partner to help me grow internationally

3. Letting my dream come true and present my New Collection on international fashions shows and fairs to establish to DREZZ the WORLD !


What I Need & What You Get

I almost passed the designing process, now I need help getting my dresses out there. This campaign will support me with:

  • Finishing 40 professional samples of my 2016 Collection: $4000
  • Lookbook Shooting and setting: $3500
  • Materials (fabric, zippers, etc.): $1000
  • Travelling and hotel cost (show and fair): $1000
  • Cost for the Exhibition stand: $2000
  • Other Expenses: $200

Being part of a clothing maker's campaign makes for some awesome perks:

  • Special Thank you Posts on facebook
  • Getting one limited German Radio Award Dress 
  • Support Animal free fashion design - fashion you can wear without any animal cruelties included
  • A ticket to the bigfashion  business

This is the platform to start grwoing my own brand and is only possible through your donations and efforts... And for that I am beyond grateful!

I hope you can help me in taking this next step. If you are unable to donate please help by spreading the word through social media or word of mouth. Any efforts made are greatly appreciated!!!

Remember to follow me for updates and special shout-outs! 

Twitter: @drezz2imprezz

 Instagram: @cindy_morawetz

Use hashtags #CINDY_MORAWETZ and #DREZZ2IMPREZZ 

And don’t forget to use the INDIEGOGO share tools! 

Thank you! :)

Cindy

story:
Perks: (On REAL models! For factory fitting scroll down! V necks run a size small, slouchy necks can be worn fitted (a Small viewed below) or loose. 


Our Mission


Our Mission is to give you the clothing that will reflect your inner Lucky Latina. That strong, sexy, unstoppable women that is just as beautiful and confident on the outside as she is on the inside. We understand the struggle of having to shove those beautiful thighs and amazing butt into a pair of jeans made for a department store manikin.  It is our mission to make the clothes that celebrate the beautiful body that you were given.

Lucky Latina stands for equality, strength, beauty, and pride! 


Regardless of whether you are Haitian, Brazilian, Mexican, Colombian. Guatemalan, or Cuban,  We are all Latina. We are strong. We are beautiful and sexy. We are unstoppable. We have been looking for this and there is nothing else like it.

We started with our branded shirts and products but up next will be various lines focused on the Latina body, or even beyond that, a woman's body. We have 4 designs of swim wear that will hug our curves and give us the opportunity to feel the confidence and sexiness that many fashions don't provide. 


Lucky Latina will never use the term 'plus size' because that is NOT what defines us. No woman will pay more than there size zero counterpart. With Lucky Latina, we are all equally celebrating our bodies.

                 What We Need & What You Get


We have just completed out first stage of designing, which is creating the Lucky Latina branded clothing. We will be offering the sexiest tanks and shirts we could find to help proudly define you as a "Lucky Latina". 

Next up is putting together my design team to create the swimsuits. Swimsuits will range from teeny tiny to more demure depending on your personal preferences (again, not the preferences of what people feel YOU should wear, but what you love). 


We need funding to:

  • Finalize market research on making beautiful clothes for beautiful women. 
  • To take us through the process of: Design, fittings, prototypes and manufacturing. 
  • Our goal is to start manufacturing by September of this year and have a full launch by next summer. 

If we GO OVER on our first goal, we will fast forward and start going into our next goal which is the Lucky Latina workout apparel. No longer will we by shoved into ill fitting work out tops and over-sized T-shirts! 

If we DON'T reach our goal, every penny will go towards our project because we are determined like that. We will use sales from Lucky Latina clothing to move forward, albeit more slowly. If we go WAY over our goal a foundation will be created for First Generation College Students to help support women who are already working towards their goals in career and education. 

Risks & Challenges

Taking on on a project such as this can be incredibly difficult and expensive. When you are dealing with sizes that are stock "size 0 - 8" you are having to spend much more time in product development. While it's impossible to create products that are going to flatter every body type, I want each piece to be adjustable in both modesty and size. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Lucky Latina is more than a clothing line. It is a movement. I want to personally invite you to not only invest in this movement but to follow us on social media and share your stories. Share YOUR pride. Support your SISTERS and if you would like to contribute in other ways to Lucky Latina, please contact us ASAP. 
We will be looking to provide jobs for my Latina sisters as designers, admin, jewelry designs, anyone involved in manufacturing and more.  Join us and make your voice heard! 

Instagram: Lucky Latina Clothing
Facebook: Lucky Latina Clothing

Once you've made your contribution, please follow us on social media and join the conversation. This is more than a clothing line, it is a movement. Lucky Latina wants to bring us together as the world hasn't seen before and let the world know we are a force to be reckoned with. 

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Also, if you know of a media outlet that would be interested in covering this campaign please pass on our contact information. 

And that's all there is to it.


Besos, 

Sharon Gutierrez

social media and share your stories. Share YOUR pride. Support your SISTERS and
if you would like to contribute in other ways to Lucky Latina, please contact
us ASAP. 


We will be looking to provide jobs for my Latina sisters as designers,
admin, jewelry designs, anyone involved in manufacturing and more.  Join us and make your voice heard! 



Instagram: Lucky Latina Clothing
Facebook: Lucky Latina Clothing

Once you've made your contribution, please follow us on social media and join the conversation. This is more than a clothing line, it is a movement. Lucky Latina wants to bring us together as the world hasn't seen before and let the world know we are a force to be reckoned with. 
  Facebook
Instagram

Also, if you know of a media outlet that would be interested in covering this campaign please pass on our contact information. 


   And that's all there is to it.Besos, Sharon Gutierrez

story:
SO, WHAT EXACTLY IS A STORY SCARF™?
 
Great question. A Story Scarf™ is the first of its kind accessory to perfectly blend quality fashion and LED technology.  We like to say we are blending quality knitwear with programmed LED technology to awaken those special memories while creating new ones. 
 
       "Stars-N-Stripes"
 
 
 
 
SO, WHAT'S THE STORY ON THE STORY SCARF™?
 
Even better question. We use LED diodes and program them in a timed sequence to reflect a design that speaks to people in a personal way. Each illumiwear Story Scarf™ truly provides a personal LED light experience. Whether reigniting the memories of your young sparkler lighting days at the amusement park while awaiting an American pride fireworks display; or replaying homecoming games over and over while wearing school pride colors; or rekindling those chilly memories in your snowsuit during the first blizzard.
 
"Blue Flake"
 
 
the 'Blue Flake'Story Scarf™ in action
 
 

HOW EXACTLY DOES IT WORK?

Well, our legal team would rather we not tell you exactly how it works, but we can give you the basics. The LED system is embedded in the scarf and is switch activated for when you want to make your world a little brighter. It is run on a 9V battery and will last up to approximately 5 hours of shine time. You access the battery through a panel on the back of the scarf.  Each scarf is a quality design full fashion knit scarves with a fleece backing and are 75 inches long, 9 inches wide.

These are not illmade novelty scarves that are a one and done, on the contrary. These scarves are functional and stand alone on their design merits. The added plus is the sequenced LED technology inside that, when engaged, shows the world how passionate you really are about your life.

WHAT STYLES ARE AVAILABLE NOW?

In addition to the 'Stars-N-Stripes' and 'Blue Flake', we also are offering:

 

 

"Blue Ho"

 

 

"Green Ho"

 

 

"Green Balls"

 

"Red Balls" 

 

             "White Setta"

 

 

 

 "Black Flake"

 

"Red Flake"

 

"USA Squared"

 

ARE THEY REALLY THAT COOL?

Yup....

 

'... a really fun way to be yourself...'

 

'...the mother of three...'

 

WHAT WE NEED:

We are looking to raise $62,000. This money will cover prototyping and packaging costs as well as tradeshow and retail pop-up expenses this Holiday/Winter season. Additionally, the funds will allow us the needed capital to produce in quantity as well as devote some to research and development for our next product iteration in order to stay ahead in the ever changing world of fashion and technology.

WHAT YOU GET:

Sure, our perks include some of the basics like most folks, but we also include perks that are made just for you, the Indiegogo backers: ones that allow for you to join in the fun of design with us and designate a charity to recieve the benefits; or we will throw a dinner for you and 14 of your friends/teammates/office chums/church choir in your hometown where each person receives a scarf and and a surpise LED light display demonstration...

 

 

WANT TO GET THEM FOR LESS?

Claim our FEATURED PERK or the 'STORY SCARF™ SQUARED' PERK to save up to $22.00 off regular prices!

WHY WE CAN MAKE THIS HAPPEN:

Team Illumiwear has decades of experience in marketing, wholesale and retail and are confident that this product and the personalized experience it creates will become the next ‘it item’ to have. Our experience in the fashion and brand development areas suits us well to successfully place the product in key areas/markets/venues to maximize its exposure and grow its popularity. We come from diverse backgounds and have worked with many great companies. (you can read our profiles).

As we are the first in the space to do LED inserts in a full fashion item we have had our challenges. It was difficult to find manufacturing that can be trusted with the technology and experienced enough with the clothing production process to know how to seamlessly produce the finished item. We have secured the right manufacturing team to meet and exceed this challenge.

We know that there will be others shortly on our scarf tails. That said, we have a strong plan in place to introduce new product in January so we will hold the top two position in the marketplace. And while the competition will be trying to figure out our patented technology – thank you Illuminode – we will be in design and production phases for the next versions.

 

 

THANK YOU!

Team Illumiwear

story:
We are a team made up of two hard-working individuals from the Bay Area in California, on a mission to do our best to stir the industry up. To show consumers that it doesn't have to cost an arm and a leg, or in this case, a wrist, to get a quality, well-made timepiece. A watch that outshines it's competitors, inside and out. A lot of companies will preach this, but do they practice it? 

The Right Watch For The Right Price, No Compromises.

     We all know everybody has different expectations of what they need and expect in a watch. This why we are offering two classes of watches. One with a Japanese Miyota Movement (Issue 01), and one with a Swiss Ronda Movement (Issue 02). 

    This gives you a chance to pick your side and decide on what you would like and how much you would like to spend. Both Japanese and Swiss Movements are very reliable, some just prefer one over the other. If you would like a solid watch that can perform on par with a swiss movement watch but for a lower price, the Issue 01 (Japanese Movement) is the one for you. We consider it to be an introductory watch but there's nothing introductory about it. This is our standard piece. A very affordable timepiece that is made with the same quality materials as the Issue 02 (Swiss Movement). 

     The Issue 02 does have its perks, consider it to be the luxury model. The Issue 02 is packed with a Swiss Ronda 763 Swiss Made Movement, Screwdown Back Case, Metal Rhombus Minute Markers and Accents, Inner Case Edge Engraving, comes in different color cases, along with the highly popular Stainless Steel Bands.

      If we had to compare the watches to each other. We would classify the Issue 01 as a Toyota and the Issue 02 as a Lexus. Both are very reliable and great, some just prefer to spend a little more money because of the additional options. But at the end of the day, they will both get you from point A to point B and will last as long as the other. 

     Another benefit of the Issue 01 is that they are currently in Production, which means you will receive them earlier than the Issue 02's which are in the prototype stage and pre-production.

     Both Issue's are top notch quality, rigorously crafted timepieces, especially for the price point they come at. Our watches come loaded and lack nothing but a high price. It is very hard to find a watch with these components including sapphire crystal for $50. Other companies will sell their watches with the cheaper, more scratch prone mineral crystal for $100-$200+. Like we said, we are bringing the best watches for the price. It is also very rare to find a swiss movement watch with the added components for under $100. We are truly a brand for the People. All of our watches also come with interchangeable quick release straps/bands, making it easy to swap your favorite 22mm strap/band if you please. We are truly a brand for the People. 

Up Close And Personal With The Issue 01 (Japanese Movement).

Specifications:

  • 316L Brushed Stainless Steel Case
  • Japanese Miyota Quartz Movement
  • Sapphire Crystal
  • 5 ATM Water Resistant
  • Laser Engraved Detailed Case Back 
  • Genuine Italian Calf Skin Leather Straps (Interchangeable)
  • Sun Burst Dial
  • Logo Embossed Crown
  • "CASTLE" Engraved Buckle

Dimensions:

  • Case: 42mm (W) x 8mm (H)
  • Band Width: 22mm
  • Lug Width: 22mm
  • Band Length: 120mm/80mm

Issue 01 (Japanese Movement) Leather Straps ($50)

Black/Black 

Blue/Brown 

 

Up Close And Personal With Issue 02 (Swiss Movement).

Specifications:

  • 316L Brushed Stainless Steel 
  • Swiss Ronda 763 Movement
  • Sapphire Crystal
  • 5 ATM Water Resistant
  • Laser Engraved Detailed Case Back
  • Inner Case Edge Engraving
  • Genuine Italian Calf Skin Leather/Suede Straps/ 316L SS Bands (Interchangeable)
  • Sunburst/Flat Dial (Depends on color choice)
  • Metal Rhombus Minute Markers
  • Color-Matched Case Back
  • Screwdown Case Back (4 Screws)
  • Logo Embossed Crown
  • "CASTLE" Engraved Buckle/Clasp ​

Dimensions:

  • Case: 42mm (W) x 8mm (H)
  • Band Width: 22mm
  • Lug Width: 22mm
  • Band Length: 120mm/80mm

Issue 02 (Swiss Movement) Leather/Suede Straps ($85)

- LS-A Flat Black/Black Case/Black Leather Straps 


 

- LS-B Sunburst Gold Dial/Black Case/Black Leather Straps


 

 

- LS-C Sunburst Gunmetal Dial/Gunmetal Case/Gunmetal Suede Straps 


 

 

- LS-D Flat White Dial/Silver Case/Wheat Suede Straps 


 

 

 

- LS-E Flat White Dial/Silver Case/Gunmetal Suede Straps 

 

Issue 02 (Swiss Movement) SS Bands

SS-A Black Stainless Steel Bands/Black Case/ Flat Black Dial ($105)

 

 

SS-B Black Stainless Steel Bands/Black Case/Sunburst Gold Dial ($105)

 

 

SS-C Alex Walter Collection - 24kt. Gold IP Case & SS Bands/Sunburst Black Dial ($115)

Design: 

      We set out to make a sharp and sleek watch that has never been done or replicated before. Originality was the biggest factor when we were designing this model. This is a genuine in-house design, we didn't just go to a watch manufacturer to pick a cool watch design and add our name and logo to it. We're not sure if you notice, a lot of affordable watch companies do this and unfortunately, they get away with it. There are a handful of companies that have the same exact watch! If you're interested in this topic and would like to see for yourself, check out Ali Baba and search for watches and you will see many watches that are familiar to you. With the Castle Corbel, you can count on it being unique in its own way. You can wear it proudly without having to worry that someone else has the same exact watch as you, but with a different brand on it. 

What Defines Us and The Company:

     A Castle represents a strong-hold with the main emphasis on providing for the people and coming together in unison. The word "Corbel", delves even deeper into our story. Corbel is defined as,"A projection jutting out from a wall to support a structure above it". We don't want to be another watch company that charges an absurd price for a watch. Too many companies have been doing this and getting away with the money, like highway robbery. We want to be the exact opposite, that's why we are putting you before profits. We dream of one day making enough change to the point where everybody knows how severe the ripoffs are in the watch industry. One step at a time we will make this change, one wrist at a time. 

     We need your help to make this happen. Our goal may seem minimal but a little goes a long way. We were and still are consumers of watches, but after doing research on the companies we once supported, our list has become a lot smaller. We will not be deceived anymore by these frivolous companies and we hope you will join us in making this happen.

     We have a very active social media presence. Everything about our history can be found on our Instagram and Facebook handle @castlewatchco. Join us for the ride and help us get the word out! Indiegogo has some amazing share tools that make it very easy to do so. We thank you for your time and hope to find ourselves on your wrist one day. 

Risks & Challenges

     At this moment, we are in the last stages of completing this process. We do not predict any road bumps along the rest of this ride, although we do understand the possibility of small delays and setbacks coming in the months ahead. That’s just the nature of the production environment, but we will do what we can to make sure these delays are taken care of accordingly and remain non-disruptive in the coming months. Our manufacturer is on the same page as us. It would be very odd to have any setbacks especially after having the great relationship that we have with them. We are a very social and interactive team and will work diligently to keep all backers updated with the most current news. When we hear it, you hear it.

story:
Short Summary

  • Greg Louganis is a four time Olympic Gold medalist and the greatest diver in history.  Respected worldwide as a humanitarian, champion of LGBT rights and inspiration to those living with HIV/AIDS, his achievements are numerous -- His book BREAKING THE SURFACE was #1 on the New York Times Best Selling List; his documentary BACK ON BOARD: GREG LOUGANIS, was nominated for a Sports Emmy in 2016; and most recently, was given his first Wheaties Box cover, bringing his legendary career full circle.

  • Today, Greg has set his sights on developing a casual activewear line for men and women, geared towards achieving success on the field and in life. 

  • Contributors to this campaign will be one of the first to help launch the next brand of this world class athlete and humanitarian.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We would like to raise a minimum of $100,000 to develop, manufacture and grow Greg's new casual activewear brand -- more specifically the creation of logos, designs, patterns and purchasing raw materials -- in hopes of attracting partners in the multi-billion dollar sports clothing business to further expand our reach.

  • Not only will we be launching a unique, limited edition line of t-shirts, you'll also have the chance to grab some collectible Greg Louganis memorabilia. We'll be reminding old and new fans worldwide about Mr. Louganis' rare, one-of-a-kind place in diving and Olympic history.

The Impact

  • Our launch of this line not only reminds the world of the 40th Anniversary of this legend's first Olympic achievement, but also extends Greg's message of reaching athletic and spiritual potential to people across the globe.  

  • A portion of the proceeds raised from this campaign will go to Crossing the Line Sports Summit and The Point Foundation. 

Perks

Today, Greg has set his sights on developing a casual activewear line for men and women, geared towards achieving success on the field and in life.  
Contributors to this campaign will be one of the first to help launch the next brand of this world class athlete and humanitarian.

 
What We Need & What You Get

Not only will we be launching a unique, limited edition line of t-shirts, you'll also have the chance to grab some collectible Greg Louganis memorabilia. We'll be reminding old and new fans worldwide about Mr. Louganis' rare, one-of-a-kind place in diving and Olympic history.
  The Impact 

Our launch of this line not only reminds the world of the 40th Anniversary of this legend's first Olympic achievement, but also extends Greg's message of reaching athletic and spiritual potential to people across the globe.  

A portion of the proceeds raised from this campaign will go to Crossing the Line Sports Summit and The Point Foundation. 

Perks

story:
Molly's Print

What better way to celebrate a person?

Now you can wear the fingerprint of your loved ones at all times. 

Did you know that the palm of your hand is the most important energy field of your body? In olden days the fingerprint was considered to be reflecting only all the positive energy...

 

We need your help 

We need your help to make the good energy flow. Our production is very complex and the bracelets are made by the best craftsmen in Europe.

Take a look at our perks and see which one fits you the best. Lots of our friends have already ordered the print of their loved ones, but we still need your help to cover all our prototype-production expenses, plus material for the new production.

With this campaign you can get a special fingerprint in a beautiful handmade bracelet. You can make your own, your partner, your kids, your parents, your friend or ANY print you would like to ware or give as a gift. 

All you need is INK.....

It's SO easy to make your print.

 

All you need to do is; mark the tip of your thumb in the ink and place it 3 times on a white piece of paper. Take a picture with your smartphone and save it. As soon as we get your order you will receive a confirmation mail where you will be asked to send your print. You can also let us know what colour braiding you would like and maybe get a name carved on the back.

For more info feel free to contact us at :

Molly's Print

info@mollysprint.com

Tlf : (+376 ) 84 10 10

The fingerprints we receive will be used partially, assuring no wrongful use of any kind could be possible.

Unless you decide to keep your prints in our printbank for possible future use, your prints will be destroyed after confirmed delivery.

The Original design as well as the production and distibution of” The Unique Fingerprint Molly’s Print by Molly’s Dream italy” is granted by an OFFICIAL DESIGN PATENT, acording to International laws and agreements wich make the design exclusive property of Molly’s Dream Italy.

We need your help 
We need your help to make the good energy flow. Our production is very complex and the bracelets are made by the best craftsmen in Europe.

Take a look at our perks and see which one fits you the best. Lots of our friends have already ordered the print of their loved ones, but we still need your help to cover all our prototype-production expenses, plus material for the new production.

With this campaign you can get a special fingerprint in a beautiful handmade bracelet. You can make your own, your partner, your kids, your parents, your friend or ANY print you would like to ware or give as a gift. 


All you need is INK.....
It's SO easy to make your print.

 
All you need to do is; mark the tip of your thumb in the ink and place it 3 times on a white piece of paper. Take a picture with your smartphone and save it. As soon as we get your order you will receive a confirmation mail where you will be asked to send your print. You can also let us know what colour braiding you would like and maybe get a name carved on the back.
For more info feel free to contact us at :
Molly's Print
info@mollysprint.com
Tlf : (+376 ) 84 10 10

The fingerprints we receive will be used partially, assuring no wrongful use of any kind could be possible.
Unless you decide to keep your prints in our printbank for possible future use, your prints will be destroyed after confirmed delivery.
The Original design as well as the production and distibution of” The Unique Fingerprint Molly’s Print by Molly’s Dream italy” is granted by an OFFICIAL DESIGN PATENT, acording to International laws and agreements wich make the design exclusive property of Molly’s Dream Italy.

story:
About INTRVL Watches

In today's watch marketplace, there's many styles to choose from, with most ranging in price from $100 to $250+.  What's interesting about the large disparity in retail price tags, is the little variation in materials used in watches at both ends of the price spectrum.  For the most part, expensive watches compare almost exactly to those with more reasonable and affordable retail prices.  The real reasons for the price difference is known as the "brand markup", which is caused by 1) the watches being sold through a traditional retail channel or store, which inflicts additional costs on the consumer, or 2) the watch brand knows they can charge a 10X+ markup because they have a loyal following.

At INTRVL, we don't believe in either, because watch lovers shouldn't be taken advantage of. Everyone should have access to high-quality and fashionable watches, without breaking the bank.  That's why we started this company.

Here's exactly what goes into our watches:

Compare the materials that go into a watch that costs over $200 and the materials that go into an INTRVL watch, and you won't notice any difference.  In fact sometimes, our quality is better...

Keeping our quality standards in line with some of the best watches on the market, we've created a line of stylish and awesome looking watches made for wear on any occasion.  We've been rocking them around ourselves, and are extremely excited to share them with you.


 

The INTRVL Collection

Our very first collection features six styles, with both stainless steel and genuine leather options.

 

    The Future of INTRVL Watches:

    We've come a long way since we decided to start this company, and we have a long way to go.  After a successful crowdfunding campaign, we have plans to continue growing INTRVL Watches and producing high-quality watches that look awesome, but don't break the bank.  We will always strive to produce competitive watch designs and sell them for under $100 retail.

    With your support of this campaign, we'll be able to deliver completed watches to our backers that represent our very first collection of 6 original designs.

    Here's what the future of INTRVL Watches looks like:

     

     

    Referral Contest

    $250 up for grabs!  Refer the most backers that contribute to our campaign, and you'll receive $250 store credit when our campaign ends!

    Here's how the referral contest works...

    At the top of our campaign, you'll find a few share buttons.  Find the one highlighted below, and click it to get your unique share link.  Then share it to your network (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Email, Anywhere!).

    YOU MUST BE LOGGED INTO INDIEGOGO FOR US TO TRACK WHO YOU REFER

    It's that simple!  If you refer the most contributions, the $250 is yours!

     

    Our Warranty and Promise

    We're extremely confident in the quality of our watches and are happy to offer a 2-year warranty should anything go wrong other than general wear and tear.

     

    Photo Gallery

story:
From Construction Site to Bank Meeting

Do you have days that require a practical backpack one moment and a formal messenger bag the next? I do. As a real estate developer and builder in Portland, Oregon, I always need a practical backpack at construction sites but a sleek messenger bag for meetings with clients, business partners and investors.

That's why, as a professional "chameleon", I created a product which did not exist: a bag that easily and quickly converts back and forth from backpack to messenger bag, WITHOUT HAVING TO REMOVE THE CONTENTS! That's how the Austin was born.

Messenger Mode

Looking professional is a critical make-or-break decision in the world of work and business. If you are looking to climb the career ladder, thrive as an independent professional, or grow your personal brand, the time to dress to impress comes every day and often when you least expect it. That's why the Austin Convertible Messenger Bag's mode is your perfect sidekick when you mean business.

Backpack Mode  

You may mean business, but your days aren't linear. On many occasions you need to look like a million bucks but often you just need to move quickly and comfortably, which is why the Austin Convertible Bag in backpack mode is the sturdy and practical companion when you're on-the-go; whether commuting, working out, or traveling.

A Transformer Case with three patents 

The Austin incorporates my proprietary design, which earned not just one but three patents. Why patented? Because it uniquely allows conversion without removing the contents of your bag. All you have to do is unzip, fold, re-zip; and in just a few seconds you're good to go. From bike trail to boardroom, you're prepared for everything your day brings. 

A Checkpoint-Friendly Bag

Designed to keep you moving and to make life as easy as possible, the Austin Convertible Bag is checkpoint-friendly at airport TSA security. The unique design allows you to easily show your laptop without removing it from the bag, as allowed by TSA.

Gender-Neutral

The Austin Convertible Bag is designed for everyone who needs both a comfortable backpack and also an elegant messenger bag. The gender neutral design caters to the needs of both women and men. It's perfect for the up&comer or those who have already arrived. The Austin is a smart choice to look great and also make your busy days smoother.

Bicyclists

For those quick trips or the daily urban commute, the Austin is the perfect way to bike between home, work, and meetings.

Dog Lovers

Sometimes your dog has to go and so do you. Whether you're on your way to downtown or the dog park, the Austin gets you there in style. In backpack or messenger bag mode, your pup will be proud to promenade with you.  

Vegans

Meet the new animal-friendly vegan Austin. Construct of high-grade plant-based "leather". It is as functional and durable as the original Austin.

Iterative Process

A previous crowdfunding campaign included an earlier version of the Austin. Many people had helpful suggestions. I listened, learned, and redesigned. Now I present a refined Austin Convertible Bag and ask for your support.

So this is it! We're at a point at which the Austin Convertible Bag is ready to be yours as the ultimate convertible bag. This is a rugged and durable backpack made with tough synthetic pack cloth. It will hold up to being dragged, slung, tossed, bumped, tugged, and all those other not-so-nice things we do to our bags every day... while always looking perfect whenever you switch it to the messenger bag mode.

After years of design, experimenting, market testing, and re-design work, we can now safely say that the Austin Convertible Bag is here to make your life easier. 

Once funded, we will be able to meet the minimum order quantity required by our manufacturing partner, and also to handle the package and shipping of the bags. With your support, we will have enough inventory to make the Austin start a journey that will reshape the market for messenger bags and backpacks.

While we work under the principle that we want to help people to Dress for Success with a transformable bag that works well in any context of your life, over the years we have always been committed to also supporting those who have been less fortunate in life.

So, as you choose one of the great rewards that we're offering you to make the Austin Convertible Bag yours, you'll also like to know that we will go on supporting those in our community that need help to have a happy and thriving journey in life.

The Austin started with a simple idea on paper is now ready for production. This has involved patents, trademarks, learning to sew all types of materials, and so many other hurdles that have been part of the process, such as researching out materials, factories, and shipping partners. We have put in many years and passionate persistence in developing a completely new concept in carrying bags for your convenience.

I have been a real estate developer and have always found ways to stay in front of suppliers. Mostly it takes a balance of friendship and being a squeaky wheel when there is a problem. We have spent countless hours searching for a reputable manufacturing facility and have found a group who understand that a "small guy" like us can, and does, become a large company. They appreciate our established partnership and are as committed as we are to bring you the finest quality in bag manufacturing along with our unique design.

As with any other manufactured product, this is a complicated process with many people and materials that need to come together. A hurricane or other natural disaster can interrupt the free flow of materials. That's why we have worked to find a factory close to the supplies we need. By shortening the distance the different materials travel to our producer, we can better control the timing of production.

story:
About OVA

OVA is a brand created as a combination of modern design and traditional Bosnian handicrafts. By combining elements of thoughtful and peculiar designs that retain authentic forms and skills, we have created a unique blend of quality and identity.

Each OVA product is unique and tells a different story through the details and shapes, as well as the natural variations of texture and colors, all of which underscore our commitment to the design and the traditional craft.

The idea behind OVA

Our aim is the economic empowerment of women, belonging to vulnerable groups, primarily conflict-related sexual violence survivors from Gorazde, making them self-sustainable women entrepreneurs. Through knowledge and inherited traditional skills,  thez remind us of the importance of preserving the tradition, heritage and diversity of people and cultures in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

→ By purchasing OVA products you provide the necessary and continuous support for the production of handcrafts and the preservation of traditional heritage.

OVA products

All OVA products are made from 100% organic and locally sourced materials.
OVA Bag needs 35 hours of weaving, OVA Cushion Cover requires 45 hours, and OVA Rug over 80 hours of weaving. The diligence of OVA women is impeccable, and the quality of OVA handcrafts is of absolute prestige.

 

OVA Bag

Handmade from 100% organic and locally sources wool and leather
(Dimensions 42x28 cm)

 

OVA One Sided Cushion Cover

Handmade from 100% organic and locally sourced wool on one side, and cotton fabric on the other
(Dimensions 50x50 cm)

 

OVA Rug

Handmade from 100% organic and locally sourced wool

(Dimensions 60x120 cm or 70x110 cm)

 

Where you come in

By backing our project, you are allowing us to take next, vital steps: sourcing and buying more materials, learning more about material properties, devising a strategy for business scaling and growth. You will helps us achieve our goal which is to make OVA handmade products one of the trademark brands of Bosnia and Herzegovina, while empowering a group of women who are taking control of their lives and creating a brighter further for themselves and their families.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren’t able to contribute, please share our story as widely as possible. We welcome your feedback and are open to other opportunities that may be a mutual fit.

https://www.facebook.com/ova.bih/

https://www.instagram.com/ova.bih/

http://www.ovabih.com/

  THANK YOU FOR BECOMING A PART OF OUR STORY

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nate Miller and I am the founder of of Harbinger Watches! I am a 21-year-old in Oregon who has had a deep interest and appreciation for watches and other time-pieces since I was little. I spent a year studying Physics at Oregon State University before leaving and continuing my education and transitioning my field-of-study to business at the local Community College since then. I have always been interested in what it might take to design and make a watch of my own and I want to also have others have a chance to experience the designs as well - so I have begun forming Harbinger Watches!

This campaign is for helping us begin the design and prototype stage of production so that we can prepare to start manufacturing and hopefully begin selling our pieces by Autumn of this year! I have always been enthralled by business and having a deep interest in watches, I want to combine these and create something unique for everyone to experience. Since I have officially started this endeavor, it has become my life. I am a dedicated person who is willing to do whatever may be needed to move forward and reach my dreams - I am hoping that you can help me achieve this.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal to get things going is to reach funding of $10,000. This money would be used to start the design with an expert team - which would take about a month or two. Once this stage is complete, we would be using more of the funds for prototype creation and custom tool piece production - this is where most of the funds would go.

If we have anything left over from this point, it would go into starting production of our full order of units so that we can begin selling these to the public for everyone to enjoy their new high-quality watches of fantastic design.

With contributing to our goal, you would receive early updates as to where we are at with our designs, see our concepts, and, depending on the size of your contribution, receive your own prototype piece as they are produced! My wish is to keep transparency with my contributors so they can see where their contributions have gone and what they are getting to be a part of!

The Impact

I want this company to bring something new to the entire watch and one day, apparel industry. There has been a lot of talk of how the existing companies are holding onto the past and not working to be a part of a more diverse and inclusive world. In a world where fashionable products are becoming more and more of a luxury for few, we want to bring it back to the mass public. I want Harbinger Watches to lead the charge of inclusiveness and diversity and bring a refreshed view to the fashion industry where all the companies are not just offering the same looking products to the public. I am hoping that you can help me get us there!

Risks & Challenges

The first thing that may have come to your mind after starting to see what this company is and who is leading it, is that I am 21. You may be wondering if it would be too risky to contribute to us because of this alone and my lack of worldly experience - and it would be fair of you to have these fears.

However, in my current job that I have had now - I have worked with international supply-chain and procurement services for products of all kinds for the United Nations, World Bank, and other organizations. This job has taught me so much about product research, sales, marketing and everything in between. I have been able to build my personal network that is capable of helping me build a foundation for this company to grow into something with true potential. And while I may not know everything that would be needed to be truly successful right now, I am a dedicated person who will go to the ends of the earth to learn what needs to be done to get to my goal and learn along the way.

My goal is to be fully transparent with my followers and contributors so they know that things are on the right path and are able to provide input if they feel things are going astray. Allow me to build trust with you so we can create something unique for everyone.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some may not be able to contribute funds to help us but may still want to do something to help us out - and that is totally okay too!!

Another way we would really appreciate your help is to share our Indiegogo campaign with people you know! There is also our Twitter page you can go and follow so you can see how things are going with us! Link will be provided or you can search for @Harbinger_Watch

Thank you for taking the time to see what will become an amazing company dedicated to bringing great products to the world!

story:
• About Watch:

 The watch T-one 

is inspired from car speedometer.

Very cool and Design watches.

SINGLE HAND



We need Your support! Despite presence in the design watches industry, Mykonos design is a small design lab that has never received any outside funding and by contributing to this campaign, not only do you get a truly unique timepiece and you also help support Mykonos Design.

FAQ Please read through the FAQ before supporting our project.

1. When will I get my T-One?

Our goal is to ship the watches to the awesome Indiegogo supporters by the end march 2016. As we have produced timepieces for the last 5 years, we are confident in our projected time of completion.

2. Is t-one unisex? Will it fit my wrist?

Yes, this watch is unisex 

size dial diameter 4,2 cm

dial thickness 0,6 cm

band lenght 24 cm

band width 2,0 cm

3. Is the T-one waterproof?

Yes, although we do not recommend diving with it. T-one is waterproof 3 ATM

4. Is there a warranty?

You will receive our standard 1-year warranty. Battery Life 2 Years

5. What materials were used to build the T-one?

Case : Steel

Band : Nato Model Nylon

Movement : japan quartz

6. Is there a number for Customer Service?

For any questions, problems and send another email to our customer service (support@mykonos-design.com) our staff will be available to answer all your needs or concerns.

Risks and challenges

How will the funds used? 
With 5 years of experience, our team create cool watches at an affordable price. With the funds we receive, we will be able to follow the design process until completion of the product, create the new molds necessary for manufacturing, and insure a fantastic end result.

story:
Apex Visionwërks

I'm an optician in Nashville. About a year and a half ago I gave a good friend of mine named Ryan a pair of Transitions Drivewear lenses by Younger Optics for his birthday. I mounted them in a generic plastic frame. He absolutely loved them! Being a bit of a car buff, he tested them extensively in his Nissan 350Z. A month later he called me and said "these lenses are awesome, but the frame is kinda heavy. If we can make them lighter, we should sell them!". So for the past year Ryan and I have been working hard to create a products that will appeal to the car enthusiast niche. Apex Visionwerks was formed! To support our new brand we put together a video crew, and started a Youtube Channel called AV Car Chronicles. We make videos about custom cars and their owners. Our Drivewear sunglasses are worn by us in the videos and are subtly marketed.

Driver

We are seeking funding for our premium pair of driving sunglasses we aptly call "Driver". Most off the shelf sunglasses have poor optics and are made for the masses (one size fits all). Driver will be custom tailored for each individual, just like prescription glasses, even if you don't have a correction. Customizations will include lens size/shape, pupillary distance/seg height, and a number of coatings, including anti reflective and mirror. These state-of-the-art sunglasses will feature Transitions® Drivewear™ that not only polarize, but also automatically adjust to the current lighting conditions (even behind the windshield).

Our Impact

This product is important because it brings the same kind of clarity and optical precision that prescription lens wearers enjoy, to the everyday non-prescription driver. Because we want to deliver the best vision possible, we also encourage drivers to get an eye exam. In addition to health related screenings, an eye exam allows drivers to implement even very slight corrections so that they can be at their best behind the wheel. It's our hope that your contribution will not only #improveyourdrive but will improve countless others safety as well.

Funding 

We are seeking $30,000 to bring "Driver" to market. In order to get a good price on the frames we need to order 500 pair for $15,000 ($30 per). The custom 8 base Transitions® Drivewear™ lenses are the expensive part. However because we have our own optical lab we are able to produce the digitally surfaced lenses for about $120 per set. Our packaging cost $10 per, for a total of $160 our cost per unit. Our introductory price will be $350 plus shipping for single vision digitally surfaced wrap compensated lenses. 

What We Can Offer Now

If you donate to our campaign you will be able to order "Passenger" (our full carbon fiber Transitions® Drivewear™ Sunglasses) for $250. Passenger looks similar to a Wayfarer style and only weighs 12.5 grams. If you buy Passenger now, you will be first in line for your own Driver, behind the pre-orders. If you're still not sure or would just like to support, you can purchase our $60 AV Bamboo or a $5 pair of eclipse glasses and we'll send you lots of information and stickers about our product and Youtube Channel.

Contingency 

If for some reason we don't make our complete goal we'll still be much closer than we were before. Our main hurdle is the $15,000 for frames. We can purchase the lenses in smaller quantities because Driver is made to order.

The Function

These lenses really are spectacular behind the wheel! The color is important because the raised contrast gives near and distant objects sharp definition. From overcast to sunny these lenses allow for clearer traffic light, and hazard recognition. Brighter conditions cause the lenses to polarize and darken, even behind the windshield. The lightweight carbon fiber frame lets you wear them comfortably for extended periods.

Who Has Them Now?

We have had the Passenger out for a few weeks and have been having great success selling them at drift races and car shows. Drivers are amazed by how clear the lenses are and have even bought a pair on the spot. Barry Clap is a professional drift racer who liked them so much, he let us put our logo on his car. I always have a pair with me and I've sold several to Uber drivers too.

Qualifications 

I have been an Optician for the past 5 years. In the past 4 years I have successfully completed orders for prescription sunglasses for another company and shipped them all over the world. I'm hoping to do the same for  Apex Visionwerks. 

Challenges 

One of the challenges of this project will be the measuring kit we will send in advance of the final product. We will need to put together several kits that we will send the customer after purchase. The kit will include three pair of finished frames with clear lenses. They will be small medium and large sizes. Using a mirror, the customer will pick the best fitting pair, and place cross-hair decals on the front of the lenses exactly in front of their pupils. Once the fitting crosses are in place the customer will then mark their center with the included marking pen. After that they will complete the measurement checklist and just send everything back to us in the included box. This process will be accompanied by how-to and troubleshooting videos. 

These kits will be easy to assemble and thanks to our Youtube Channel, AV Car Chronicles, the how-to and instructional videos will be easy to make too!

Thank You!

We really appreciate your consideration! If you can't donate or buy one of our products at this time, please use the indiegogo share tools.

story:
Hello everyone! My name is Kim ^-^ many of you probably know me from my Instagram page @Pixel_Face where I post about my enamel pins and other art projects I'm working on! If you are just meeting me, then hi! I'm a devoted geek and hopeless otaku! I love all things anime, video games, D&D, you name it!

About a year ago I rediscovered my love of pin collecting and even started creating a few of my own! I absolutely love being able to display and wear my pins out and about and showing off my collection from all the amazing artists I've had the pleasure of meeting. 

With this project I wanted to design a cute Ita bag, stylish enough for a night out, that would also be perfect for everyday use. 

With all of your help, we can bring these bags to life! All my pin making and designing is a labor of love. I do have a full time job aside from my small pin business, so these foxy bags can only be produced with your support and contribution. I can not thank every one enough for helping me fund this project!

I am running a flexible funding campaign, meaning even if the main goal is not reached, the funds raised will still go towards the production of these bags!

The total funding needed for this project is $5 ,200. I know that seems like quite a bit of money, so here is a break down of what it will all be going towards:

-$3300 will be needed to pay for the manufacturing of the bags. This is the bulk of the funding.

-$700 for shipping the finished product to me.

-$300 for packing materials 

-$500 for shipping to you

-$400 for platform fees and trasaction fees

When you back this project you will receive your choice of either a Deep Plum or Dusty Pink Foxy Ita bag! Here is a list of all the features:

  • Two larger zippered pockets: one main purse pocket and one clear pocket to display pins
  • Coin purse nose
  • Gold metal hardware
  • Holographic or glitter accents (nose, ears and face) depending on the bag color you choose
  • Removable chain strap
  • Dimensions: 10"x 7"x 4"

Each bag will come with a Pixel Fox key chain! You will receive one of the 5 colors (chosen at random) shown below. They are double sided, soft enamel charms and they go perfectly with my Foxy Ita bags, or you can put it on anything else to add a little flair!

 

If funding is successful and we surpass the main funding goal, I do have some additional colors and designs lined up!

$5,800: Hard enamel pins with every bag

$7,200: Black Fox bag with black glitter details

$7,500:acrylic charms with every bag 

$8,400: Mint Fox bag with pink glitter details

$11,200: Dragon bag (colors TBD)

$17,800: Bunny bag (colors TBD)

With all crowd funded project there are risks involved. If this project does not meet the funding goal, I will have to fund the remaining amount myself. This could prove to be very difficult. If this is the case, I will be sure to post updates regularly of the progress and the timeline that the bags production will follow.

It will also be challenging to make sure this project has enough viability. I am just one person running this campaign so I will have to put in lots of work to make sure it runs smoothly.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to my Foxy Ita bag project, that's ok! You can absolutely help by getting the word out! Tell your friends about my project, share it on social media, anything helps! Remember, Indiegogo offers various share tools to help get projects like mine out there ^-^
