story:
FIND MORE PICTURES AND INFORMATION ABOUT US ON OKSTAL.COM

THE OKSTAL SHIRTS IN YOUR EVERYDAY LIFE

Rush. Every time. To the office or from meeting to meeting. And coffee is your fuel. At high speeds, mistakes sometimes happen as fast as you are. In that splashing moment, your average business shirt will fail. Here starts the racetrack of the OKSTAL shirts:

1) The fabric withstands water-based fluids, like red wine, coffee and of course water itself.

OKSTAL shirts' wine repellent cotton fabric


2) We are using the finest European cotton material as base fabric and 3 per cent touch of elastane for more wearability.

3) We have researched the tailor schools all around the world to create our styles for almost all the tastes. So our shirts are really tailor made, named after the tailor schools of the Globe.

Model size: 6'4" (210 lbs)


4) Our shirts breathe better, and dry faster than conventional fine shirts. A bit of elasticity added to it, and feel yourself better in your everydays. And of course they are anti-bacterial too.

5) We figured out some specialities, to give more better feeling to the maniacs of french cuffs or wristwatches. We have optional asymmetrically sized cuffs and self holding french cuffs. You can hide even your 1000 meters diver, and keep your cuff cool, comfortable and also tight as possible.

You can find more looks on okstal.com/#lookbook


6) Our product line is magically easy to care of. You can wash it on 40°C (104°F) and then just iron it on medium to reactivate your coffee shield. This is a bit better for the environment too, because You don't need to take your shirt to a dry cleaner (they use more chemicals than You do). 


COLLAR AND CUFFS OPTIONS

Our collar options

Our cuff options

PERKS

This is the way You receive OKSTAL shirts
story_txt:
FIND MORE PICTURES AND INFORMATION ABOUT US ON OKSTAL.COMTHE OKSTAL SHIRTS IN YOUR EVERYDAY LIFERush. Every time. To the office or from meeting to meeting. And coffee is your fuel. At high speeds, mistakes sometimes happen as fast as you are. In that splashing moment, your average business shirt will fail. Here starts the racetrack of the OKSTAL shirts:1) The fabric withstands water-based fluids, like red wine, coffee and of course water itself.OKSTAL shirts' wine repellent cotton fabric

2) We are using the finest European cotton material as base fabric and 3 per cent touch of elastane for more wearability.
3) We have researched the tailor schools all around the world to create our styles for almost all the tastes. So our shirts are really tailor made, named after the tailor schools of the Globe.


Model size: 6'4" (210 lbs)


4) Our shirts breathe better, and dry faster than conventional fine shirts. A bit of elasticity added to it, and feel yourself better in your everydays. And of course they are anti-bacterial too.
5) We figured out some specialities, to give more better feeling to the maniacs of french cuffs or wristwatches. We have optional asymmetrically sized cuffs and self holding french cuffs. You can hide even your 1000 meters diver, and keep your cuff cool, comfortable and also tight as possible.

You can find more looks on okstal.com/#lookbook


6) Our product line is magically easy to care of. You can wash it on 40°C (104°F) and then just iron it on medium to reactivate your coffee shield. This is a bit better for the environment too, because You don't need to take your shirt to a dry cleaner (they use more chemicals than You do). 

COLLAR AND CUFFS OPTIONS

Our collar options

Our cuff optionsPERKS

This is the way You receive OKSTAL shirts



Hand made tempered glass cufflinks with laser engraved OKSTAL logo
Exclusive wooden clothes hangers comes with each of our shirts
MILESTONES

Our first generation of fabrics are ready for production.
We designed, prototyped and tested a lot with tailors and material scientists.
So the fits and designs are also ready to be released.
We spent lot of work hours with even the smallest details.
We try to figure out everything.

Now we need your help to achieve the next level: starting to produce our nanotech collection of shirts in series.
PRICING
After the campaign, our shirts will likely retail for 275 USD (around 250€ or 180 GBP). You can now buy one of these early (and in case of Indiegogo individually numbered and labelled with your name) shirts for 200 USD (around 180€ or 135 GBP).
GOALS
In case of successful funding, our dream will take the next step. We can start a small manufacture, with new employees to manufacture OKSTAL shirts.
In the future (or in case of high attention) we would like to start some new line of colors (like mist grey or light blue). If we hit the 20000 USD line, we will add the light blue color, and at 30000 USD line we'll add the mist grey too.

story:
Watcher is a well-designed smartwatch with E-paper display that  enables you to think beyond your life.Coupled with our dedicated accessories ,it can help you to keep track of your personal belongings,how long you've spent time with your lovers,your fitness information,your baby's body temperature and offer  other useful features.



Why do we wanna do this:

We are a team of people who are tech-savvy and true believers of the notion  that technology should simplify and facilitate our lives by make things easier to use without ever letting you realize the existence of it.

How do we make this happen:

We've been doing R&D of RF and low-energy based devices like OBD and other electronics for years and therefore have had rich experience  of making devices. All of our products are integrated with RF chips（Smartwatch comes with additional low-energy bluetooth chip) that enable them to connect with each other .

What do we make:

Our product line includes a smart watch,a pendant,a card and a thermometer. Other products  that come with RF technology are in the pipeline.Stay tuned with us.

Main features:

Your smart Watcher - Anti-lost

Watcher is an anti-lost smart watch. Just attach the accessory to your valuables and pair it with Watcher, Watcher will keep track of them all the time. Once the accessory is out of range(10 meters), your Watcher will vibrate to remind you, preventing you from losing or forgetting your phone, wallet, key case, kids or anything else with the accessory attached, if your Watcher is connected to iPhone

or Android phone by Bluetooth, the GPS location will also be recorded by Watcher app to help you recover your lost stuff. 

When you are with your kids, Watcher will help you keep an eye on your running kids. Just put a pendant on your kids, your Watcher will remind you once they are out of range.

 If you are waiting for your baggage at the airport, you don't need to walk back and forth around the luggage tag, Watcher will vibrate to notify you the moment your luggage comes within range. 

Watcher can work with up to 5 accessories connected simultaneously. They all are equipped with a rechargeable Lithium battery, once fully charged, the accessories can work up to half a month.

Our dedicated card can easily fit into your wallet 


Our dedicated pendant can get attached to your keys or other stuff



Your smart Watcher - Sweet time

Watcher can help you get to know how long you have stayed with your lover. Just connect two watches, and Watcher will count your sweet time automatically. You can even view the statistics on your watch or via Watcher app. 


Your smart Watcher - Notifications

If you connect Watcher to your iPhone or Android phone by Bluetooth, Watcher will vibrate when receive a call or SMS. For Android 4.3+ users, the watch can also display Caller ID and SMS content.

Watcher vibrates to notify you when you receive a call on your mobile phone

Watcher vibrates to notify you when you receive SMS on your mobile phone

Your smart Watcher - Reminder

By setting birthday or anniversary via Watcher or mobile app, Watcher will remind you ahead and display the reminder on the watchface on that day.



Your smart watcher -Fitness Tracking

Watcher can keep track of how many steps you've made and how long you've walked or run.It can also calculate how many calroids you've burned.



Your smart watcher -Thermometer

Once you connect Watcher to our thermometer,put the thermometer on your baby's arm,our thermometer will automatically keep track of your baby's body temperature and send the data to Watcher or your mobile app.If the temperature is abnormal in a  short period of time,Watcher will vibrate to remind you to take action if necessary.



Specifications:

Watcher:

Dimensions:42*34*12mm

Display:Sharp 1.28inches Memory LCD

Resolution:128* 128px

Certification:FCC/CE

Waterproof: IP67

Operating time:3-5 days

Charge mode:magnetic contact


Card:

Dimensions：85* 54* 2mm

Operating time: 30 days

Waterproof : IPX6

Charge mode:magnetic contact


Pendant:

Dimensions: 36 * 36 * 7mm

Operating time: 30 days

Waterproof : IP67

Charge mode: magnetic contact


Thermometer:

Dimensions: 28* 30 * 6mm

Operating time: 20 days

Waterproof : IPX6

Charge mode: magetic contact

Watcher connects with our dedicated  accessories and another Watcher by 2.4G RF. Watcher can work alone with the features of anti-lost and sweet time,even if there's not connection with your mobile phone. Watcher connects to your phone by Bluetooth 4.0, if your phone supports Bluetooth 4.0(iPhone or Android 4.3+), you can download Watcher app and manage the Watcher via your phone. 


Project Timeline 

  • June 2013~Nov. 2014: HW/SW development
  • August 2014: Molding
  • Oct. 2014: Testing
  • Dec. 2014: FCC/CE certification
  • March 2015~April 2015: Indiegogo campaign
  • May 2015: Mass production
  • June 2015: Shipping

Why do we need your support

We need your support to do mass production and market promotion, We hope you will love this well-designed and easy to use product and help spread the word,  and we also need your feedback to improve our products. Thank you very much!

Risks and Challenges

We have already finished the prototyping and FCC/CE certification, but there're some risks need to be considered. Supplier chain management:  component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.EMS capability: It will be the first batch of  mass production for smart watch, due to lacking of experience to assemble such products,we might not able to deliver it to you in time.


If any question, please contact us at: elink-iot@elink-iot.com

story:
ABOUT US

Our team is composed of four people covering four different area of expertise. Biotechnology, Marketing, PR and  Movement/ergonomics which enables us to have a good perspective on the market, technology and our customers. Each of us is addressing certain issue from his point of view. Good teamwork helped us to combine knowledge into a meaningful concrete solutions that include all key components. Members of our team have a lot of experience with innovation and new product development which they showed on different world class innovation exhibitions and business challenges. Every member of our team was a top student in his own field enabling us to be the best mixture of entrepreneurs on the market. Our team leader and main innovator is Matija Jakšić, a 25 year old master of sports management. In his ten year "carrier" in the innovation world he has been around the world and got a lot of prestige awards for  innovations including the "Compact toothbrush".  Innovations aside he has worked in Henkel's international brand management for the Taft brand in Dusseldorf, Germany and as a Junior brand manager for Disney in Zagreb, Croatia with the responsibility for Croatia and Macedonia. As you can see in these few sentences,our team is a multinational think tank with a lot of inspiration and expertise in different areas of business.

THE PRODUCT

Toothbrush, toothpaste and mouthwash cup all in one.Compact toothbrush has a slick design,is practical and environmentally friendly!

COMPACT TOOTHBRUSH is a product that provides a great solution to avoid those oral inconveniences. Ideas of toothbrushes and other oral hygiene means existed for centuries, but ours have many advantages! It combines toothbrush, toothpaste and cup for mouthwash. Brushing your teeth at least twice a day is essential to maintain healthy teeth and gum. Many times people out of laziness or forgetfulness (traveling) don’t remember to do that. In addition while applying paste to a toothbrush and closing the paste, we often forget to close the water, so it unnecessarily leaks. Compact toothbrush is easy, practical and environmentally friendly!

Initial prototype is already made but here is the point where financial problems start. To produce the final product we have to invest money for the production and product design (factory demands). To make our budget as small as possible, we plan to produce the product in China and ship it from there anywhere in the world, as they have the best terms for our quantities. 

This is our three year rough plan for our business:

2015, development and the creation of the final product.
2016, communication of our products to the market and target groups, performance at various fairs, launch sales via Internet sales, in the second trimester we are planning to start the process of selling our products through other distribution channels, and market entry

2017, expected to stabilize sales, a slight decrease in demand, people will not buy the product because they to try it, out of curiosity, because the product will already have been communicated to the market. There will remain the majority of consumers who liked the product, but also a possibility of other potential consumers. 

Compact toothbrush was created as a product for which there are many upgrades and design variants. The mere brush consists of several parts;

• body of the brush with movable base

• brush head that can be detached from the body

• cover the brush

AWARDS & FAIRS

 "Coompact toothbrush" was presented at a couple of local innovation exhibition (Inova for young, INOVA) and in one essential world class exhibitions, INPEX - Pittsburgh (USA), where it was very well received.

Coompact toothbrush won the silver medal in the category of "personal care" and most importantly, the prototype intrigued many American distributors and manufacturers.

FUTURE OBSTACLES

As we are launching a new innovative product on the market we are heading into unknown territory. With all our planning and research we can't be certain on what future beholds. First obstacles will occur in the production of the finish product as we are producing it in China for lower budget. We will face more obstacles while entering the market and communicating the products. We will be facing problems each and every day, but that's the part of our job and we are actually looking forward to the new experiences. Hopefully with hard work and help from you guys we will overcome everything that comes on to our path.

story:
The Macana Bag Is:

  • An Ancient Tradition: The modern minimalist bag reveals a brightly colored handwoven lining when opened. This lining is an art form that dates back to the Incas. It is handwoven and naturally-dyed. This practice is at risk of being lost due to the modernization of the textiles industry.  
  • Socially Responsible: The Macana Bag is designed to help preserve these artisinal traditions. In addition to purchasing the Macana material, a portion of the sales are re-invested into Jose and Anna's business to help them build a future.
  • Your Bag, Your Story: Customize the bag to your needs and tastes by choosing from two sizes, three leather colors, and five Macana designs.
  • Designed to Work: The design of the bag lives up to its story, with several unique and highly functional features.  
  • Guaranteed for Life: It won't wear out, it will wear in. And in the rare occasion that something breaks, you can send it to us for repairs, for free, forever.

As seen in:

An Ancient Tradition

Outside of Cuenca, Ecuador, high in the Andes mountains, Jose and Anna Jimenez are working to keep an Incan tradition alive. They are weavers, primarily making a traditional shawl called the macana - a staple of the region's heritage. It’s handwoven using handmade looms, the dyes are made from rocks, plants and bugs harvested from their property, and the patterns are symbols of indigenous life in Ecuador.

But as Ecuador modernizes, fewer and fewer people are wearing this traditional garment. So in order to help Jose and Anna preserve their weaving traditions we’ve built the Macana bags around the fabric they use in their shawls.

Socially Responsible

Thanks to a partnership with Pro Ecuador, an organization within the Ecuadorian Government, we've created a program that will let us mentor Jose and Anna on growing their business as we work together. This bag is the first step, and we're going re-invest a portion of the sales from each bag into the tools they need to grow. Tools like a car (they don't have one), a website, and improvements to their shops retail space. We launched this project on Kickstarter, and just hit our goal. We were hoping to make bigger investments in Jose and Anna's business so we're here on Indiegogo to make sure we can get Jose and Anna the resources they need to grow.

The Macana Interviews

On one of our planning visits to Jose and Anna's workshop, we documented the making of the macana on video and interviewed them. When we got back we had some friends interview us as well. We've put all that into a short documentary at the bottom of this page.

Your Bag, Your Story

We've created the Macana bag with customizable options, so you can make it your own. Three simple choices, 30 different bag designs, one that's perfect for you.

Two Sizes

Three Leather Colors

Five Macana Designs

Designed To Work

The story is just the beginning. We've designed the Macana Bag to be as functional as it is inspirational.

There (only) When You Need It.

We've all owned a bag with dividers, pockets, or other features that are useful sometimes, and just plain in the way when they aren't. The Macana Bag's features are designed to be really helpful, and then get out of the way. The bag adapts to how you use it, and goes where you need it to. It's ready to get to work.

Guaranteed for Life

The Macana Bag is built to last. The design is simple and timeless, and every detail is durable. It won't wear out, it will wear in. And in the rare occasion that something breaks, you can send it to us for repairs, for free, forever. When you put your heart into something, you never want to see it get thrown away. Here are some examples of the durable construction techniques we've used:

  • 20 Rivets: Key ares on the bag are reinforced with rivets. An extremely durable, and costly, pair of jeans could have as few as 8 rivets.
  • Top-stitched Outer: The ribbing you see along the sides of the bag comes from folding the leather inside the stitch over and stitching it down again. It's time-consuming, but looks great and lasts much longer.
  • Bull Denim Lining: Rather than a thin lining fabric, we've chosen bull denim. Like a great pair of jeans it's soft and very durable.

Macana Interviews

Other Rewards

How Else Can I Help?

Share the following status and image on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram and we will donate an additional $1 toward Jose & Anna's truck fund. 

I have donated a dollar for an artisan in Ecuador to purchase a truck for his business. You can do the same by sharing this status on your page, #buckforthetruck Go here for other ways to help, http://bit.ly/1AsLULS.

About Allegory

Our work is dedicated to bringing meaning back into the objects we carry every day through thoughtful design, excellent craftsmanship, and materials with a story. Our current product line contains several writing instruments made with reclaimed woods, and handcrafted leather goods.
story_txt:
The Macana Bag Is:


An Ancient Tradition: The modern minimalist bag reveals a brightly colored handwoven lining when opened. This lining is an art form that dates back to the Incas. It is handwoven and naturally-dyed. This practice is at risk of being lost due to the modernization of the textiles industry.  

Socially Responsible: The Macana Bag is designed to help preserve these artisinal traditions. In addition to purchasing the Macana material, a portion of the sales are re-invested into Jose and Anna's business to help them build a future.

Your Bag, Your Story: Customize the bag to your needs and tastes by choosing from two sizes, three leather colors, and five Macana designs.

Designed to Work: The design of the bag lives up to its story, with several unique and highly functional features.  

Guaranteed for Life: It won't wear out, it will wear in. And in the rare occasion that something breaks, you can send it to us for repairs, for free, forever.

As seen in:




An Ancient Tradition
Outside of Cuenca, Ecuador, high in the Andes mountains, Jose and Anna Jimenez are working to keep an Incan tradition alive. They are weavers, primarily making a traditional shawl called the macana - a staple of the region's heritage. It’s handwoven using handmade looms, the dyes are made from rocks, plants and bugs harvested from their property, and the patterns are symbols of indigenous life in Ecuador.

Each strand of the macana is dyed in small bundles. Then they are arranged onto the loom to be woven by hand, creating the beautiful traditional patterns.
But as Ecuador modernizes, fewer and fewer people are wearing this traditional garment. So in order to help Jose and Anna preserve their weaving traditions we’ve built the Macana bags around the fabric they use in their shawls.


Socially Responsible
Thanks to a partnership with Pro Ecuador, an organization within the Ecuadorian Government, we've created a program that will let us mentor Jose and Anna on growing their business as we work together. This bag is the first step, and we're going re-invest a portion of the sales from each bag into the tools they need to grow. Tools like a car (they don't have one), a website, and improvements to their shops retail space. We launched this project on Kickstarter, and just hit our goal. We were hoping to make bigger investments in Jose and Anna's business so we're here on Indiegogo to make sure we can get Jose and Anna the resources they need to grow.
The Macana Interviews
On one of our planning visits to Jose and Anna's workshop, we documented the making of the macana on video and interviewed them. When we got back we had some friends interview us as well. We've put all that into a short documentary at the bottom of this page.
Your Bag, Your Story
We've created the Macana bag with customizable options, so you can make it your own. Three simple choices, 30 different bag designs, one that's perfect for you.
Two Sizes


Three Leather Colors


Five Macana Designs


Designed To Work
The story is just the beginning. We've designed the Macana Bag to be as functional as it is inspirational.
There (only) When You Need It.
We've all owned a bag with dividers, pockets, or other features that are useful sometimes, and just plain in the way when they aren't. The Macana Bag's features are designed to be really helpful, and then get out of the way. The bag adapts to how you use it, and goes where you need it to. It's ready to get to work.


Guaranteed for Life
The Macana Bag is built to last. The design is simple and timeless, and every detail is durable. It won't wear out, it will wear in. And in the rare occasion that something breaks, you can send it to us for repairs, for free, forever. When you put your heart into something, you never want to see it get thrown away. Here are some examples of the durable construction techniques we've used:

20 Rivets: Key ares on the bag are reinforced with rivets. An extremely durable, and costly, pair of jeans could have as few as 8 rivets.
Top-stitched Outer: The ribbing you see along the sides of the bag comes from folding the leather inside the stitch over and stitching it down again. It's time-consuming, but looks great and lasts much longer.
Bull Denim Lining: Rather than a thin lining fabric, we've chosen bull denim. Like a great pair of jeans it's soft and very durable.

Macana Interviews


Other Rewards


Custom Macana Edition Kit Wallet by Allegory. Customizable options. Click image to learn more.

How Else Can I Help?

Share the following status and image on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram and we will donate an additional $1 toward Jose & Anna's truck fund. 
I have donated a dollar for an
artisan in Ecuador to purchase a truck for his business. You can do the same by
sharing this status on your page, #buckforthetruck Go here for other ways to help, http://bit.ly/1AsLULS.


About Allegory

Our work is dedicated to bringing meaning back into the objects we carry every day through thoughtful design, excellent craftsmanship, and materials with a story. Our current product line contains several writing instruments made with reclaimed woods, and handcrafted leather goods.

story:
Short Summary

Siete pronti? Siete caldi? Comincia qui la raccolta fondi di Fab for a Jellyfish & Anice.
La raccolta fondi destinata a realizzare il sogno di due ragazze che altro non vogliono se non un piccolo negozietto dove poter vendere le loro creazioni.
In breve: Fabiana modellista e stilista realizza manualmente colorate collezioni per donna e bambino, Gloria incredibile tuttofare ricama e cuce splendidi accessori e realizza piccoli componenti d'arredo.
Amiamo i materiali colorati, possibilmente etici e a chilometro zero.
Dopo l'Accademia di Belle Arti abbiamo intrapreso strade diverse, ma la voglia di esprimersi grazie ad un'arte tangibile, applicata al vivere quotidiano, ci ha portato infine a collaborare. 

What We Need & What You Get

L'obiettivo di questa campagna é di raccogliere fondi per avviare una piccola attività commerciale, nel dettaglio questi soldi verranno utilizzati per pagare : la caparra, qualche mobile e le attrezzature.La nostra esperienza in giro per l'Italia a fare mercatini creativi, ci ha fatto capire che avere una vetrina su strada permetterebbe la giusta visibilità ai nostri prodotti.

Nel caso in cui non dovessimo raggiungere la quota, i soldi diverranno fondo comune e verranno investiti per eventi dedicati a designer indipendenti come fiere e mercatini.

In cambio del vostro contributo:

- 5 € : biglietto di ringraziamento personalizzato disegnato, pezzo unico.

-10 €: una spilla ricamata.

-20 €: mini trousse, tessuto Liberty.

-30-40 €: trousse porta-tablet.

-50-60 € : trousse porta-tablet + spilla

-70-80 €: a scelta un pezzo adulto o uno bambino tra: gonna corta donna, pantaloni bimbi, camicia bimbi.

-100€ : borsa ricamata + spilla

-150€ : abito bimba o  gonna lunga da donna. 

-200 €: zainetto con disegno ricamato.

-250€ : pezzo d'abbigliamento a scelta o accessorio + 10% di sconto su tutti i prodotti per un anno.

- 300 € : avrete una super torta design preparata da Gloria (che é pasticcera) + 30 % di sconto su tutti i prodotti per un anno+ abito o accessorio a scelta. 

Per cifre maggiori ai 300 €: programma personalizzato di ringraziamento!

Other Ways You Can Help

Coscienti della crisi in atto, allora amici, sponsorizzateci e spammate a manetta!!! XD

English version

Our story:

Are you ready? Let's start Fab for a Jellyfish & Anice's first crowd-funding campaign!

This campaign is aimed at making our dream come true: opening a small shop where we'll sell our creations. 

Who are we?

Fabiana is a stylist and pattern maker who hand-crafts colorful collections of clothes and accessories for women and children, while Gloria embroiders wonderful accessories by hand and makes small pieces of furniture.

We share a love for colorful materials, ethically and responsibly sourced where possible. 

After our studies at the Fine Arts Academy in Milan our lives took different paths, but our common interest in a tangible art form that relates to modern day-to-day living brought us back together. 

The main goal of this campaign is to raise enough money to start a small commercial enterprise. The money will be used to cover the deposit, some furniture and machinery. Our experience throughout italian creative fairs and markets made us understand that an open window on the street would give our products a fair visibility. 

If we won't able to meet the target, the raised money will be used as a common fund and reinvested in small events aimed at independent designers - fairs and markets. 

Even if you can't give us money, you can do something very cool and useful for us: If you like our work please share this campaign!!! Thank you!!

Our story:


Are you ready? Let's start Fab for a Jellyfish & Anice's first crowd-funding campaign!
This campaign is aimed at making our dream come true: opening a small shop where we'll sell our creations. 
Who are we?
Fabiana is a stylist and pattern maker who hand-crafts colorful collections of clothes and accessories for women and children, while Gloria embroiders wonderful accessories by hand and makes small pieces of furniture.
We share a love for colorful materials, ethically and responsibly sourced where possible. 
After our studies at the Fine Arts Academy in Milan our lives took different paths, but our common interest in a tangible art form that relates to modern day-to-day living brought us back together. 
The main goal of this campaign is to raise enough money to start a small commercial enterprise. The money will be used to cover the deposit, some furniture and machinery. Our experience throughout italian creative fairs and markets made us understand that an open window on the street would give our products a fair visibility. 
If we won't able to meet the target, the raised money will be used as a common fund and reinvested in small events aimed at independent designers - fairs and markets. Even if you can't give us money, you can do something very cool and useful for us: If you like our work please share this campaign!!! Thank you!!

story:
What do your panties say about you? Make it "stylish, brave - and super-fun"! And what better way to say it than with PUSSYCAT PANTS!


We want to produce cat-related apparel and start with the perfect seamless panty - a low-rise 'boy-shorts' style that will flatter most body-types. The seamless structure and sharp images mean that these panties are invisible under clothing - but make a BIG statement when you want them to be seen

Sizes, materials
On successful achievement of the funding target, we'll contact you (Survey) within two weeks to check your size requirements. Please ensure you select your size with care from the chart we will provide, since different countries use different sizing methods. 

MINKANAK Pussycat Pants is a collection of comfortable but sassy, lingerie made from a Poly/Spandex mix, laser-cut so as to eliminate those pesky Visible Panty Lines. As you'd expect in an item of this quality, the crotch lining is made of 100% cotton for maximum breathability, protection and comfort.

PLEASE BACK OUR PROJECT AND SHARE OUR STORY WITH YOUR FRIENDS!


Where are we at now? 

The great news is, we've finalized our designs, agreed terms with our manufacturers and received samples that are MORE than satisfactory. If the project gets the backing it needs, the items will be produced and shipped in July / August 2015 or sooner. And, if we reach our funding goal of £5000 - £7500 - £9999, we'll incorporate additional designs and products to the range - broadening the brand's appeal still further.

story:
Since Elise is leaving to Shanghai in March she is risking to not be able to be with us for her birthday and miss out on the unmissable Venice Biennale! 

Let's fly her back for the weekend!

story:
My name is Libby Hopper and I am a jewelry designer based in Detroit, MI. Jewelry became a passion of mine about 6 years ago, and led me to move to NYC and get a job in the jewelry industry. During my time there, I soaked up all the information I could about jewelry making and realized it was something I could (and wanted to!) do. Now I'm back in Michigan, living in Detroit and running my small jewelry business full time.


I love what I do, and try my best to deliver the highest quality jewelry to my customers. One of my favorite materials to work with is jewelers' brass, because it has the beautiful warm gold color that people love while still staying affordable. However, I'm constantly plagued by an upsetting problem - brass tarnishes and turns many peoples' skin green. I have tried countless brass sealers and nothing seems to adequately solve my problem.

I am asking for $3000 to fund the purchase of an "E-Coating" system from www.riogrande.com. This system works similarly to plating - an electric charge is used to bond a clear ceramic coating to the metal while still retaining the look and feel of the metal. This coating will make the metal tarnish resistant, hypoallergenic and will keep your skin from turning colors; it will be very hard and will last for a long time. Finally, my troublesome tarnish will be gone!



I am asking for $3000 to purchase a complete E-coating system. This includes:

  • $1450 - the six-station system pictured above
  • $1100 - a convection curing kiln
  • $450 - e-coating solutions, solvent, shipping and fees
I am offering multiple jewelry options as perks - they make great gifts for yourself or your loved ones!  For "your choice" items, I will be contacting you for your preference. You can view the options below:
  • $18 + shipping - your choice of one handmade stacking ring in 14k gold fill or sterling silver

  • $34 + shipping - your choice of two handmade stacking rings in 14k gold fill or sterling silver

  • $36 + shipping - your choice of one pair of handmade tiny stud earrings in 14k gold fill or sterling silver

  • $40 + shipping - your choice of one pair of handmade mix & match studs in brass or sterling silver - choose a matching pair or mix & match as you please!

  • $48 + shipping - your choice of three handmade stacking rings in 14k gold fill or sterling silver

  • $52 + shipping - your choice of one pair of handmade brass stud earrings / earpins

  • $56 + shipping - your choice of one pair of handmade sterling silver stud earrings / earpins

  • $60 + shipping - your choice of one handmade brass ring

  • $60 + shipping - set of three oval brass bangles, one of each style (peak, arc, and hammered)

  • $70 + shipping - your choice of one handmade sterling silver ring OR one brass Birch necklace

  • $80 + shipping - your choice of one pair of handmade brass statement earrings

  • $96 + shipping - your choice of one handmade brass bracelet OR a set of three oval sterling silver bangles, one of each style (peak, arc, and hammered)

  • $114 + shipping - your choice of one pair of handmade sterling silver statement earrings OR a sterling silver taiga bracelet

  • $118 + shipping - your choice of one handmade brass pendant necklace on 32" chain


  • $148 + shipping - handmade sterling silver BIRCH necklace on 34" chain

  • $170 + shipping - you choice of one brass pendant necklace PLUS three stacking rings


  • $200 - a $200 credit toward Goldeluxe jewelry with a 10% coupon code
  • $300 - a $300 credit toward Goldeluxe jewelry with a 20% coupon code
  • $400 - a $400 credit toward Goldeluxe jewelry with a 25% coupon code
  • $500 - a $500 credit toward Goldeluxe jewelry with a 30% coupon code

If I don't reach my goal, the funds raised will go towards this system and I will find another way to pay for it. I am determined to raise the bar for my brass jewelry and make sure everyone who wears it is happy!

The Impact

Your donation to this campaign will help me bring higher quality brass jewelry to my customers all around the world. This will benefit my clients because they won't have to deal with annoying tarnish or green skin. On my end, I will receive peace of mind that I'm delivering the highest quality brass jewelry I can. In addition, it will lessen any repairs, touch-ups or unhappy customers, making my small business that much more efficient.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, I understand - even just sharing this campaign on indiegogo and your social media channels would make a huge impact. Thank you for your support!

story:
Hi Im Sylvia LLewelyn, but some people call me ' the Empress of Buttons'. That is because I have a wonderful small niche business that I have built up over the last 20 years selling Antique and Vintage buttons with an online store www.oldbuttonsshop.com and also that I have made a unique  Collection of buttons (approx. 4,000) ranging from Roman Times to the Present Day.

    From this Collection I published my book 'Old Buttons' five years ago with an Art Publishers here in Hungary, rather than a big International Publisher - it was their first book in their series in the English language and it has helped open up a new market for them and myself. The book is a lovely evergreen seller (Copies with a Price List of all 900 buttons pictured are one of my Perks) which has been sold at the Victoria & Albert Museum bookshop, London and last Spring at the Louvre's Museum of Decorative Arts in Paris when they did a major 2 floor exhibition of buttons. I have uploaded their video from last Spring because it will give you an idea of how interesting buttons can be for all people, from young to old, studying Decorative Arts, Fashion and the History of Mankind. In a way my Collection is even better as it is comparable in size and not just French buttons but examples are from All Over the World.    

Perk. 'Old Buttons' book by Sylvia LLewelyn Published by Tandem Graphics Studio 2011
Contains the History, Fashion and Collecting Information from Caveman to 1940's with 900 full colour photos of buttons in their actual size with a Ligne Guage for measuring buttons in the Fashion Trade.
Now in Second Edition with Price List to help you discover if you have any valuable treasures in your Mother's, Grandmother's or Family Button Box.

 About Myself and How I got into Buttons - I qualified as a Fine Art and Chattels Valuer / Appraiser in College and worked in the City of London valuing the Art and Antiques of the Rich and Famous for mainly Insurance purposes. I was brought up in the Antique trade as my Mother who had been a top Knitwear Fashion Designer in the 60's with Twiggy etc. later got into Antiques and we lived over the shop for many years in Cardiff. I took over the business when I was 20 and by the time I qualified as a Valuer at 30 and started out in London another Financial Recession hit and I was back working as a Sole Trader. After working at the famous street markets, like Covent Garden, Campden Passage, etc. I set up shop at the Antiques centre in the Kings Road ,Chelsea selling Costume jewellery and with the Fashion scene all around me and knowing from my background that Buttons to a Designer garment, can be as important as a Frame to a Painting,  I started selling buttons. I've never stopped trading and collecting them and I now have a stock of around 100,000 buttons (650 different styles online). I am passionate about my work and somehow I have had a living out of it (plus doing lots of other work, such as writing, teaching, interior design, acting, having paying guests to my Art studio/Button warehouse in Budapest.etc) except any spare money somehow gets ploughed back into the business and more Interesting Vintage and Antique buttons with the future dream of a Museum. So if I could only turn some of the buttons into money..(some of the gold ones are like Pirates gold treasure!! See the Perk below! And at the end of my story!) then the buttons would pay for the first stage of my plan for the Museum and pay for the building plot in the most perfect place for it.

Perk 6. Gold Art Nouveau-style Metal Buttons Set  contains 4 High quality Honey gilt solid metal  alloy in an Art Nouveau-style with Rococo elements that are like pieces of jewellery. Wonderful on a black or darker colours to richly transform an outfit or give a short jacket the Chanel-look.      

Size. Dia. 1 inch (25.4mm) L.40

    So I've picked out 8 special best-selling, buttons of superb style and quality; that I had enough to offer sets of; selected because of their regular size for Modern garments,  as my Exclusive Collection Perks to gain your Support. Each set are 'Beautiful and Useful' as 'William Morris, the Arts and Crafts Designer was quoted as saying and each a wonderful gift that can be posted or a possession to enjoy and cherish, adorn a garment, make a suit unique, make a memory and help bring together a project that Many will benefit from in small ways like the buttons themselves .



Perk 1. Blackboard and Chalk Buttons Set contains 6 Quality Composition grey buttons with the feel of a old School Blackboard and there is a chalk-like stripe that is different on each button. Great for a Suit or Overcoat to give it that unique touch. This Set has been selected to emphasize the Museum will be an educational establishment.

Size. Dia. (Just under 1 inch) 23mm L.36-40


  Well life never always turns out like you plan and it certainly throws you a few curve balls. Mine was that I'm only child and my Mother was a Hungarian refugee from 1956 who was actually homesick all the time in the Cold War in Britain until my parents retired to Hungary in 1997. Sadly after 3 years Dad passed away so for the last 14 years I started living half the time in Budapest and half in London. Over that time I have seen many changes, learnt the language (somewhat!) and integrated into the wonderful cultural Budapest city life. Taste was very different and I couldn't sell my Vintage buttons here at first while a Vintage Fashion explosion was happening in London; the opposite was going on in Budapest; as everyone had put up with Secondhand and drab Hand-me downs through Communism so they wanted bright, shiny, new, Designer labels etc. but now that has changed and I have become well-known in the city, selling my buttons and book at the markets.


Perk 2. Pewter Encased Grey-Green Pearl Buttons Set contains 6 Antiqued pewter metal framed domed green-grey Mother-of-Pearl effect plastic tiny buttons that are suitable for a shirt, cardigan or a blouse to give it an interesting Celtic Ancient-look.

Size. Dia. 15.2mm L.24

What is difficult in Hungary although it has been part of the European Union for 20 years is that the wages for the People have just not gone up as in other Western countries. Id say an average wage for a Man with a Wife and family is around 500 $ or Euros a month. To integrate I had to take a 90% drop in the money I charged compared with London, say for my Interior design work or Art and Antiques valuation. Except somehow the Cost of Living is cheaper than other Western countries and you can mange quite well and have a good life. That is why so many artists, writers, and self employed Ex-pats live here. Of course Tourists love it as they feel like Kings or Queens with their spending power and there are so many Cultural things to do, like Opera, spa baths, architecture, restaurants, bars, all of which are very affordable. I have been having Guests from all over the World stay at my Button studio in the city for the last 4 years and they love it with my local cultural knowledge in the Art and Antiques scene - that's how Ive managed to pay the rent. So much that many return and are now venturing outside the capital.


  Perk 3. Mother-of-Pearl Shirt Stud Buttons Set contains 6 Vintage real white quality Mother-of -pearl  stud buttons with carved detail that are very sought after by Gentlemen for the their Evening or Dress shirts (which normally require 3 or 4). These buttons will be supplied with detachable rings as in the Old Days when you could remove them from garment to garment.

Size. Dia. 0.5 inch (12.7mm) L.20

I travelled all over Hungary and there are some beautiful places but one stuck out to me from all the others. I had heard of an old King's Hunting lodge and it is just on the edge of the city Public transport railway line. The Hunting lodge turned out to be a Classical Palladian house (similar to Chiswick House in London) on the riverbank of the Danube in a 500 year old settlement. It is a beautiful, picturesque and tranquil Heritage Village. It has a  church that has Hieronymus Bosch-like fresco work in bright colours that has never been restored, as good as any in Florence, Italy. The village has a Riverside market where twice a week, thousands of locals from the neighbouring villages and towns sell their produce (all organic) and crafted wares and there is also the thermal water there so there are 3 Four * Hotels and it has a few tiny museums (one is a Cowboy and Indian Museum!) and many Nature trails. Tourists have doubled from 20,000 to 40,000 per annum in this last year. I have become a frequent visitor there and surprisingly discovered that the property was not expensive..one because the Riverside Market is so good that the High St. remains empty of businesses unable to compete and there are no jobs for the locals other than traveling into the city (which is 50 minutes on the City Line and 20 minutes in a car). Although the Spa hotels are fully booked with tourists,,  other than the Market, there are no Art gallery shops or tourist craft shops. I know it is the best place for my Button business and Museum. It will put the place on the map and I will have a ready audience for my Buttons and Museum.

I
Perk 4. Brass 4-Hole Buttons Set contains 6 real brass metal buttons.These have had a patination on them so no need to polish them and will look great on coats, leathers and jackets.

Size Dia. 1 inch (25.4mm) L.40

So for the last couple of years I have been studying everything about this Heritage Village and researching the property market. I have got my Hungarian papers (as I have Dual Nationality). I had seen a country shop with a 25 sq m wooden house for about that price of my savings and thought it would be a good place to start out and look for a premises once I was part of the Community. Anyway I was just about to try and buy it when it went off the market so I started hunting with other agents and then out of the blue found a property that had been reduced to half price because it had been empty for 4 years, right next to the 500 year old church, which is the best central location. So a real antique peasant house, in sound condition with good storage units for the buttons and with a very very big garden plot 600 sq m, enough to extend the existing 100sqm house or build another separate building such as my Button Museum. So I have half the Purchase money £11,000 of £22,000 and have to complete the purchase by the beginning of Spring but for a Single Woman like myself who has never had a regular income, only been in rentals, and is now not a Resident in the UK and neither has a work record income in Hungary..its going to be nigh impossible to borrow the money from a Bank.


Perk 5. Natural Real Silvery White Rainbow Mother-of-Pearl Shell Buttons Set contains 6 quality Vintage Mother-of-Pearl buttons with beautiful rainbow colour highlights that you just don't get on Modern buttons but well matched for sets and with brass shanks. Suitable for any coat, jacket, etc.
Size. Dia. (just under and inch) 22.9mm L.36

So this is why I am asking if you will help Crowdfund this venture and purchase some of my beautiful buttons so that I can buy this plot with the house. Once this is done and if I am free of a loan I will be able restore this house within the year so I can have paying guests in the Summer while I make plans for a new structure or extension . I will work in the market to start with, make friends with the Community. Of course when the Museum is open it will be selling buttons in a shop section and therefor independently funding the running costs itself. When I am busy with the buttons then I always take on extra help. As with any business...we are never successful unless we can work with others. So even in my small business, there's been times when I have had six other people helping me with different jobs, such as the internet side of things, repairs, sales assistants, drivers, movers, collating and counting the buttons, packing orders, etc. Often in the past I have had many women stuck at home for one reason or another, sewing the buttons on cards for me to earn a little extra money money and feel some self respect in their situations, The work is therapeutic and very satisfying. There is always work washing, sorting sewing the buttons as they are all recycled or old shop stocks. Buttons appeal to children and they will enjoy the Museum and learn. There will be craft workshops to make Button jewellery and other items.

Perk 7. Silver Art Nouveau Lily Flower Buttons Set contains 4  fine quality silver metal alloy openwork design buttons with Lily flowers and leaves reminiscent of the Victorian Arts and Crafts and Art Nouveau Movements in England . Suitable for a jacket, cardigan of any colour as the pierced design will let the fabric show through.
Size. Dia. 0.75 inch (19.1mm) L.30

 I think I will really add something to this small Community and I know people from all over the World will come to see my buttons and travel out on the City Line from Budapest when they are on holiday there. I will be happy to establish myself  and the buttons there and I know it will be one day be one of the magic places to visit in this city.

Perk 8. Georgian Antiqued Silver Buttons Set contains 4 superb quality Antiqued Pewter alloy metal buttons that look like real 18th century silver ones with the detail and antique patination. They even look a bit Navaho Indian style. Suitable for Blazers, Coats, Jackets.
Size. Dia.1 inch (25.4mm) L.40

** All the Buttons offered exclusively as Perks are superb quality (not something you would find on your Local High St. unfortunately anymore!) and there will be spare buttons of all of them available to order from my website www.oldbuttonsshop.com when the campaign is over so if you need extra for a garment you will be able to order them at their regular price per button inclusive of all posting costs from the website. **

Im a very positive determined person and whatever money I can raise through the buttons and this Crowdfund will help me to reach a wider audience for my niche business and I will realise this Museum one way or another and I can promise you that any funds will go into supporting a small business that supports others with work and inspiration.
story_txt:
Hi Im Sylvia LLewelyn, but some people call me ' the Empress of Buttons'. That is because I have a wonderful small niche business that I have built up over the last 20 years selling Antique and Vintage buttons with an online store www.oldbuttonsshop.com and also that I have made a unique  Collection of buttons (approx. 4,000) ranging from Roman Times to the Present Day. 
    From this Collection I published my book 'Old Buttons' five years ago with an Art Publishers here in Hungary, rather than a big International Publisher - it was their first book in their series in the English language and it has helped open up a new market for them and myself. The book is a lovely evergreen seller (Copies with a Price List of all 900 buttons pictured are one of my Perks) which has been sold at the Victoria & Albert Museum bookshop, London and last Spring at the Louvre's Museum of Decorative Arts in Paris when they did a major 2 floor exhibition of buttons. I have uploaded their video from last Spring because it will give you an idea of how interesting buttons can be for all people, from young to old, studying Decorative Arts, Fashion and the History of Mankind. In a way my Collection is even better as it is comparable in size and not just French buttons but examples are from All Over the World.    

Perk. 'Old Buttons' book by Sylvia LLewelyn Published by Tandem Graphics Studio 2011Contains the History, Fashion and Collecting Information from Caveman to 1940's with 900 full colour photos of buttons in their actual size with a Ligne Guage for measuring buttons in the Fashion Trade.Now in Second Edition with Price List to help you discover if you have any valuable treasures in your Mother's, Grandmother's or Family Button Box. About Myself and How I got into Buttons - I qualified as a Fine Art and Chattels Valuer / Appraiser in College and worked in the City of London valuing the Art and Antiques of the Rich and Famous for mainly Insurance purposes. I was brought up in the Antique trade as my Mother who had been a top Knitwear Fashion Designer in the 60's with Twiggy etc. later got into Antiques and we lived over the shop for many years in Cardiff. I took over the business when I was 20 and by the time I qualified as a Valuer at 30 and started out in London another Financial Recession hit and I was back working as a Sole Trader. After working at the famous street markets, like Covent Garden, Campden Passage, etc. I set up shop at the Antiques centre in the Kings Road ,Chelsea selling Costume jewellery and with the Fashion scene all around me and knowing from my background that Buttons to a Designer garment, can be as important as a Frame to a Painting,  I started selling buttons. I've never stopped trading and collecting them and I now have a stock of around 100,000 buttons (650 different styles online). I am passionate about my work and somehow I have had a living out of it (plus doing lots of other work, such as writing, teaching, interior design, acting, having paying guests to my Art studio/Button warehouse in Budapest.etc) except any spare money somehow gets ploughed back into the business and more Interesting Vintage and Antique buttons with the future dream of a Museum. So if I could only turn some of the buttons into money..(some of the gold ones are like Pirates gold treasure!! See the Perk below! And at the end of my story!) then the buttons would pay for the first stage of my plan for the Museum and pay for the building plot in the most perfect place for it.
Perk 6. Gold Art Nouveau-style Metal Buttons Set  contains 4 High quality Honey gilt solid metal  alloy in an Art Nouveau-style with Rococo elements that are like pieces of jewellery. Wonderful on a black or darker colours to richly transform an outfit or give a short jacket the Chanel-look.       
 Size. Dia. 1 inch (25.4mm) L.40     So I've picked out 8 special best-selling, buttons of superb style and quality; that I had enough to offer sets of; selected because of their regular size for Modern garments,  as my Exclusive Collection Perks to gain your Support. Each set are 'Beautiful and Useful' as 'William Morris, the Arts and Crafts Designer was quoted as saying and each a wonderful gift that can be posted or a possession to enjoy and cherish, adorn a garment, make a suit unique, make a memory and help bring together a project that Many will benefit from in small ways like the buttons themselves .
Perk 1. Blackboard and Chalk Buttons Set contains 6 Quality Composition grey buttons with the feel of a old School Blackboard and there is a chalk-like stripe that is different on each button. Great for a Suit or Overcoat to give it that unique touch. This Set has been selected to emphasize the Museum will be an educational establishment.
Size. Dia. (Just under 1 inch) 23mm L.36-40
  Well life never always turns out like you plan and it certainly
 throws you a few curve balls. Mine was that I'm only child and my 
Mother was a Hungarian refugee from 1956 who was actually homesick all 
the time in the Cold War in Britain until my parents retired to Hungary in 1997. 
Sadly after 3 years Dad passed away so for the last 14 years I started 
living half the time in Budapest and half in London. Over that time I have seen many changes, learnt the language (somewhat!) and integrated into the wonderful cultural Budapest city life. Taste was very different and I couldn't sell my Vintage buttons here at first while a Vintage Fashion explosion was happening in London; the opposite was going on in Budapest; as everyone had put up with Secondhand and drab Hand-me downs through Communism so they wanted bright, shiny, new, Designer labels etc. but now that has changed and I have become well-known in the city, selling my buttons and book at the markets.

Perk 2. Pewter Encased Grey-Green Pearl Buttons Set contains 6 Antiqued pewter metal framed domed green-grey Mother-of-Pearl effect plastic tiny buttons that are suitable for a shirt, cardigan or a blouse to give it an interesting Celtic Ancient-look.
Size. Dia. 15.2mm L.24
What is difficult in Hungary although it has been part of the European Union for 20 years is that the wages for the People have just not gone up as in other Western countries. Id say an average wage for a Man with a Wife and family is around 500 $ or Euros a month. To integrate I had to take a 90% drop in the money I charged compared with London, say for my Interior design work or Art and Antiques valuation. Except somehow the Cost of Living is cheaper than other Western countries and you can mange quite well and have a good life. That is why so many artists, writers, and self employed Ex-pats live here. Size. Dia. 0.5 inch (12.7mm) L.20

story:
Hi, I'm Lisa Gen, and I'm based in Paris, France. 
For the past twenty years my creator Tom Pastor has worked as a visual 3D artist specialized in furry creatures (e.g. the dragons in GoT). But he always wanted to create his own project ...and after 5 years (Ish) here I am !


Lisa Gen 5

____________________________________________________________________


I'm a full computer graphics 3d human model to give fashion designers the opportunity to create pictures never seen before. Tom started (M!) from scratch and I’m still getting upgrades everyday.

It took him five years of hard work during long nights. I am 100% digital and I have been crafted with passion and a perfect convergence of technology & art.


Lisa Gen 7

I'm the result of putting together the most beautiful women in the world.

But I'm not just the digital double, the scan of one model, I’m Lisa Gen 7, and you won’t find someone like me anywhere else.

  • My target :
My job is to do photo shootings wearing dresses that don’t exist, or even dresses that can not be done in real !
Let’s imagine a dress made out of snow or soap bubbles with ME (Lisa) holding a balloon filled with water and golden fishes inside …. being shot from different camera angles !
But the goal is to do a full CGI commercial, for perfume for example ! It is the bridge between Fashion and Film industry, a brand new business model !

  • What we need

Today we have to face the limits of this project. Why ? 

For the intense rendering process we need more machines, for the details and for the animation. Also we'll need 3d freelancers to help improving me.

We would need powerful Xeon PC's with a high level of memory to be able to realize my creator's crazy ideas.


  • Risks & Challenges

In exchange of your precious help, we will deliver very high quality products based on "Lisa style": E-Books, hard copy books, pictures collection (Limited edition). 



The challenge is to make everyone happy about the products and to deliver everyone as soon as we can.

All products will be double checked before delivering.
Delivery expectation: End of September, middle October.  Delivery is included in the price. Photo frames include number for each picture on the back.


  • Other ways you can help

Tom is holding this project on his own for the past five years. He wants this project to flourish and be shared with other talented people …Being on Indiegogo is also one great way of getting in touch with people. If you are a creator for fashion or just a creator, film maker or even a journalist who’s willing to talk about Lisa, that would seriously help. Stories about Lisa are endless …

New doors for creativity and new ideas are now open ...

Please get in touch with Tom : tom@cloudofisolt.com

Thanks for your time.


Lisa 



_____________________________________________________________________________

Find out what you get in exchange of your help.































_____________________________________________________________________________

story:
This project will enable RACHEL WEISBERG ("RW") to expand her line and incorporate wholesale/production while maintaining social and aesthetic ethos. 

With this funding we can present our entire SS16 line at the AXIS market, September in NYC to a wider range of buyers and establish an infrastructure for growth. The next step following a successful AXIS market season is to start a living wage garment factory located here in Asheville, NC. 

SHOP

Each REWARD is a purchase in advance to get the ball rolling. As an organic designer Rachel Weisberg takes inspiration from the concept of CSA (community supported agriculture) baskets. Produce farms pre-sell their crops to their community, and with the capital they are able to seed, plant and harvest beautiful vegetables and fruits without comprising the produce. Information on CSAs (localharvest.org) and how they function.

As we see it, the goal of this project is to empower the Rachel Weisberg line to expand its current market and production limitations. We will produce locally and ethically to create high quality products in a socially responsible work environment. This means appreciating the time, energy and materials that go into every product for sale. By supporting this project and businesses like mine that are certified "living wage" you are purchasing beautiful products and making a difference.  

COLLECTION

"My inspiration for this collection is the snow melting into spring and the beginning of a new whole Earth cycle. The feeling of being awoken. When the trees grow back and things begin to evolve. With an ethereal feeling and mystical beauty."

SUPPLY & DEMAND

We currently sell through brick & mortar shoppes, romance riders and rachel-weisberg.com. RW is carried in select independent boutiques located in Asheville, Brooklyn, Miami, Chicago, Manhattan, Portland and the Hamptons which demonstrates our strong diversity in clientele. 

RW has the skills, business and growth required to make this next move!

The demand is there, this project will enable RW to supply it and create the right structure of production.

TIME FRAME | FUNDING

The $10,000 will help fund two stages. First, the pre production and design work necessary for presenting the SS16 collection at the AXIS market in New York City in September 2015. And, second to fund the start up costs of production to meet the anticipated orders.

To get to this September deadline there will be necessary expenses:

Now - September:

  • research & design
  • fabric & dye
  • pattern making & draping 
  • samples
  • fittings
  • photoshoot & lookbook
  • axis market 

 SEPTEMBER | NYC AXIS MARKET | RACHEL WEISBERG COLLECTION

September - order fulfillment

  • ethical production
  • production
  • employees: sewers, cutters, pattern makers, etc

Post market comes the big shift in how RW currently operates. We will have our orders to begin the production. Knowing how many items to create allows for proper production with less waste, and higher efficiency. The goal is for RW to be self sustainable from that point forward.

All items packaged, shipped and in stores by end of March 2016.

 PRESS

story:
Reptile and Arachnid related clothing
After years of not finding what we wanted, what our customers, friends and family wanted we decided to create it ourselves.
We joined forces, put our heads and skills together.  We then realised we already had all the tools we needed to get this out there. We have the insight, the information,  the materials and the market,
So here it is.......
Having direct involvement in the Herpetological industry and wildlife rehabilitation, consumers expressed to us through ongoing requests that what they wanted in clothing lines were not available. As an artist, wildlife illustrator and wildlife demonstrator we have the tools to bring these items to life, we have experience with these subjects, we also have experience in business as a business managers for over a decade.
Ask and you shall receive.
The available launch t-shirts for both men and woman include:
Red Back Spider
with quote 'The question isn't who is going to let me, it's who is going to stop me'
For the Arachnid lovers, the delicate yet powerful beauty of the Red back spider remind us not to underestimate and fit perfectly with the quote it is sitting above.


Golden tailed gecko
An Australian gecko illustrated, this beautiful species was one of the first gecko species Rebecca kept as a reptile keeper. They are a stunning creature who would often sit on the branches basking during the day despite their nocturnal nature. 


Rough scaled python t-shirt
A gorgeous snake species and one I keep myself, exquisite eyes that draw you in along with beautiful unique texture amongst Australian pythons.

Red bellied black snake t-shirt
This Australian species has always been one of my favourite, a remarkable snake to watch with striking beauty, Tie has vast amounts of experience with these elapids. Featured on a black t-shirt available for both men and woman
New world t-shirt,
 featuring python hatching from egg. Nothing more amazing than the birth of an animal and a python is no exception.

Peron Tree Frog T-shirt
The beautiful Australian frog with an unmistakeable call, also known as an emerald tree green they have distinct appearance

Funnel Web Spider shirt
For the arachnid lovers the powerful and iconic Funnel web

The beautiful Peacock Spider
With it's distinct colourful appearance and mating ritual, this arachnid is one to be remembered




Now for the boring stuff, who exactly are we?'


Co-creators


Rebecca Koller


Rebecca comes from a business management and art background. Having been involved in management and marketing for over a decade as well as many many years working as an illustrator, and a signature artist for Ártists for Conservation'. Currently she works doing freelance illustration for private collectors as well as an art teacher for US magazine, Çolored Pencil Student' teaching step by step processes for developing art using the medium of coloured pencil. She is also currently involved in wildlife rescue and rehabilitation as a bat/ flying fox carer. Learn more at http://www.wildlifeartist.me/


Tie Eipper


If you want experience, well have you ever got it here, Tie has well over a decade  experience in the retail pet industry as well as involvement in the Australian Herpetological industry well and truley pre-dating that. She is also a published wildlife photographer.  After many years of involvement in animal rehabilitation she current works along side her husband running 'Nature for You' a wildlife education and demonstration business operating throughout Australia, from Perenties to crocodiles she takes a hands on approach to her work with the tenacity to back it up, learn more about her work at http://www.wildlifedemonstrations.com/


Order a t-shirt, show your support to get us up and running and we will do the rest.

story:
SCRUZ Duotone Sunglasses for a 3D World

From the founders of Vogmask, the world's premier designer filtering face mask, comes the biggest innovation in sunglasses since polarization, multi-hued lenses. Offering three lens color combinations, Blue Raspberry, Lemon Lime, or Orange Purps,  each duotone option has a unique design lightweight wood frame.  We created these sunglasses because we wanted them for ourselves. With prototypes in hand we showed them to all our friends. That's how the video came about. People are curious if they make the world look more 3D. That depends on who you ask and what the light is like at the time. Most people say that detail is perfect and overall vision is wonderfully enhanced in SCRUZ Duotone Sunglasses.

Our Unique Product

Beginning with multi-hued lenses, we sourced the best manufacturing in the world.  SCRUZ Duotones feature frames elegantly crafted from FSC certified wenge wood.  Wood frames are light,  eco-friendly, absorb sweat and feel soft against the skin. Special flex hinges can take a beating without breaking. We recommend them for skateboarding, biking, dancing, surfing or just chilling.

Why Multi-Hued (Duotone) Lenses?

Because they look awesome. Why do people wear sunglasses? To look cool and for eye protection. SCRUZ Duotones Sunglasses take the looking cool part to a whole new level, while providing FDA and CE certified protection. The key to our sunglasses are the lenses. Using ultimate mirrored lenses, SCRUZ achieves an iconic look and perfect protection. The lenses are CE and FDA certified UV400,  the highest protective rating. They are also 100% polarized, reducing glare and eyestrain, and adding happiness.

Risks

This is a very low risk campaign proposition.  We have a high quality product,  a fully sourced supply chain, an existing structure of design, logistics, fulfillment, and an experienced team with successful track record establishing Vogmask.

Other Ways You Can Help

We'd appreciate you sharing our campaign and would love to hear from you.


SCRUZ Duotones are available in 3 delicious flavors:

At the end of the campaign we will send you an email and you will pick your flavor. Thanks a million for your support. - SCRUZ


Did you know?  
Each lens color on sunglasses improves vision in a particular way, reducing eye fatigue.  Lemon Lime SCRUZ combine the advantage of green lens for high contrast vision while cycling, water sports, mountain biking, skiing and playing tennis, while in the same pair you have yellow lens filtering blue light and providing added clarity in these same sports.


Regarding our goal of $18,888

Many people have asked us about our goal of $18,888.  Manufacturing minimums at our premium suppliers, packaging cost, and shipping to our fulfillment center in South San Francisco for order processing will total approximately $18,000.  So we chose $18,888 because it provides extra luck.

story:
My Story:

I'm creating a new line of motivating athletic apparel and just getting it off the ground.  They are for average Joe's and Jane's on the path to greater things! We aren't all fitness models or bodybuilders; some of us never want to be but we enjoy the activities that love and work hard at them. We might not be the best of the best but who cares! Hence the Practice Squad name; currently the underdog but working hard to be the best that we can be, while having fun!

I am one of those regular Joe's that I was talking about. One day I jumped on the scale and saw that I was the heaviest I've ever been and I needed to make a change. So I got off my butt and joined a gym and started working out. I had a goal in mind and worked my butt off to get there. Here are some of my before and after pictures to show you what I mean.

I lost 30 pounds plugging away at what I enjoyed. I know that there are days where you can just use a little motivation to give you that kick you need to keep pushing. I had some motivational T-shirts that helped me get through it. I didn't feel comfortable wearing those bodybuilder type shirts that are all about muscles etc. because I wasn't that person. I was just a guy who wanted to get into shape and get there by never giving up on my goal. I want to help people reach theirs too! I know a t-shirt won't get you there but they can help you along the way to help keep you focused on what you want. My main goal is to help others. I get asked all the time on "How I did it?", "What do I need to do to do the same?" and "Was it hard?". I tell them that it wasn’t hard for me only because it was something that I truly wanted to do. It was a passion and a personal challenge. It took a lot of work, dedication, sacrifices, and will power. When they say “hard work”, I think of the last two. I think this is what people consider to be the “hard work”. Do they have to sacrifice some things and do they have to resist temptations…..absolutely!! You have to get out of your comfort zone and do things that you aren't used to doing. But if you want something bad enough, your desire to achieve your goal will overpower the rest. The things that seem strange at the beginning become habit and a lifestyle. You just have to grind it out until it becomes your everyday routine and your old lifestyle or routine seems strange. This is only the beginning for me. I can't wait to see how far I can go!

These T-shirts are what I'm all about and my philosophy. When I get the thought in my head that I could just skip a day or two, I look at the shirts and remember why I started. I have made some demo shirts already that I wear around the house and at the gym. They are extremely comfortable, breathable, good to just wear when you're lounging at home on an rest day.

If I can get the funding I can expand the selection of products (Tank Tops, Shorts, Sweats, Yoga Pants, Hats, etc.). I have a vision of where I want to see the company go but need a little help to get me there. I want to expand the business beyond North America and create more motivational wears, not just something you can workout in. I want to bring out more positivity. I'm sure we all have seen enough negativity on the TV and Social Media. How about something uplifting for a change?

I am currently working on a website for the apparel line.

The Designs:


Never Give Up Design


Stars Design


Only the Beginning Design


Success Design


Change Design


Future Design

Better Design

Coming Design

Grind Design

Stronger Design



The Shirts:

The T-Shirts are 4.2 oz., 100% combed and ringspun cotton; 30 singles; Shoulder taping; Fitted at bicep; Sideseamed; Unisex fit; The material is soft, form fitting, breathable and super comfortable. Ideal for all of types of activities.

4 different colours to choose from: Black, Dark Grey Heather, Red, and White

Comes in sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, and 3XL
