story:
Introduction

Founded in 2014, BLUESY is a leather goods brand whose inspiration originates from the United Kingdom. Combining timeless designs with upgraded modern details, our handbags highlight the characteristics and spirit of BLUESY – Merging the style of BLUESY with your own to celebrate individuality. With the specially-designed, patented features, your favorite elements can be attached to create a personalized BLUESY handbag.



Ideas behind

Patented Bag Designs

BLUESY proudly presents our first collection of signature handbags “Ala”. Inspired by the beauty of birds, simple yet elegant blue-toned colors are employed to bring out the unique style of our brand. We believe that simplicity allows room for originality, a core spirit definitive of BLUESY.

Patented Lock Closure Designs

The idea of the lock closure imitates birds habit of carrying precious glittering gems to their nest. The charms attached on the lock closure represent customers' treasures as it shows the unique style of each owner.

Enhanced User-Friendliness

Despite the extravagant look, we realized the functionality of the handbag is also of paramount importance, therefore somehow find a way to embed it into our contemporary design we did.

1. Our lightweight handbags with shoulder strap enable easy carriage, along with the delicately arranged nylon inner compartments which allow users to separately nestle their belongings.


2. The “Wings” design allows users to conveniently reach into the chambers on both sides of the bag for storing daily necessities.


3. The leather strings attached to the zipper form the shape of the “wings” while ensuring a smoother opening of the zipper.


BLUESY Ala Bags


WARBLER 

In Bice Blue, Corn Flower Blue, Black and White litchi grain genuine leather


BLUEBIRD 

In Corn Flower Blue litchi grain genuine leather


COOT 
In Black litchi grain genuine leather with Black cattle fur

JAY 

In Bice Blue litchi grain genuine leather


SWAN

In Ivory litchi grain genuine leather


PLOVER

In Black and Ivory litchi grain genuine leather with Brown cattle fur


Price:  $280 (INDIEGOGO) /  $500 (RETAIL)

Select bags according to their NAMES

Dimensions:
- Upper Width 18", Lower Width 11.5" / Height 10" (without strap) / Depth 3.5"
- Handle drop: approximately 5.5" drop from shoulder
- Maximum Square Large inside: Approx. 11.5" x 9"

Materials:
- Quality litchi grain genuine leather
- Twill lining with inner compartments

Parts:
- Removable and adjustable shoulder strap
- 925 silver charms (Backers’ choices)

Compartments:
- Large inner pouch, zipped pouch and side pouches


Order Making

1. Press  below and choose a suitable perk

2. Press  to log in your Facebook account

3. Enter shipping information. Fill in the bag and charm you want at Address line 2

(Hong Kong postal code: 000000)

4. Enter payment details to complete purchase


Lookbook


Materials and Craftsmanship

Hand-made with Genuine Leather

Our goods are hand-made with the finest materials in an experienced Italian factory with a long history of production. All handbags are composed of a real leather layer and high quality nylon layer.


Silver Charms

The charms in stock are coated with high quality silver. A maximum of three charms can be attached to the lock closure. Two featured charms at the side with an “EN” letter charm of your choice to be attached on the centre of the lock closure to represent your own, personalized style.


Gift for her

Customize an individually designed BLUESY handbag for your one-and-only. Choose the bag according to her style and attach her favorite elements to convey your most sincere appreciation for the special her. Please, share the love.


The Man Behind

As the founder of BLUESY, I proudly see myself as a responsible entrepreneur and truly appreciate the favor and support of every backer. I hold on to the belief that the best way to repay the crowd funding community is to provide the best products and service to all of you with every endeavor of mine, which I promise with my brand, BLUESY.

With the passion in designing high quality leather goods, massive researches in the fashion field had been done during my 4 years in the United Kingdom. I poured 18 months of time, heart, and soul into designing before I present to all of you the first collection of BLUESY. 


BLUESY Needs You

BLUESY needs your help to achieve the following goals. If you appreciate our ideas behind or like our handbags, please do not hesitate to support us.

1.  Designing New Collection For The Coming Season

In the coming months, we would design new handbag collections with more styles and colors for the next season. Considerable cost is needed for the designing process.

2.  Maximizing Productivity

In order to produce at the optimum production point and lower average costs, the production scale has to be increased through further financial backing. As a result of reduced average costs, we can provide better products and services in advance.

3.  Conducting Social Media Marketing

Our team utilizes the highly cost-effective social media channel to increase brand awareness, in the hope of gathering the ones who value quality leather goods.

4.  Opening Pop-up or Retail Stores

In our physical store, instant and on-site customization, a core characteristic of ours, will be provided. We hope to ensure every BLUESY customer can feel first-hand our philosophy in providing the top-notch shopping experience. 


Production Schedule

Much like wine, it takes time and patience for supreme handmade leather to be crafted into its prime form in our factory, no shortcuts exist given our delicate attention to details. But we guarantee the wait will be worth it.

Early Birds – The First 50 Bags

- Production Starting Date: 30th October
- Products Dispatch date: 12th November
- Products Delivery date: Before 30th November

More Birds – The 51th -250th Bags

- Production Starting Date: 12th November
- Products Dispatch date: 30th November
- Products Delivery date: Before Christmas

Extra Birds – From the 251th Bags on

- Production Starting Date: 30th November
- Products Dispatch date: Upon completion
- Products Delivery date: Within 14 days of dispatch 

*You may be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.


Order Making

1. Press  below and choose a suitable perk

2. Press  to log in your Facebook account

3. Enter shipping information. Fill in the bag and charm you want at Address line 2

(Hong Kong postal code: 000000)

4. Enter payment details to complete purchase


Message to Backers

BLUESY needs your support financially and spiritually, please do not hesitate to share this page to your friends. If you have any questions, you can leave comments or contact us directly. I would love to hear what every fan of BLUESY has in mind. Thank you!

In the coming months, we would design new handbag collections with more
styles and colors for the next season. Considerable cost
is needed for the designing process.
2.  Maximizing
Productivity 
In order to produce at the optimum production
point and lower average costs, the production scale has to be increased
through further financial backing. As a result of reduced average costs, we
can provide
better products and services in advance.
3.  Conducting
Social Media Marketing 
Our team utilizes the
highly cost-effective social media channel to increase brand awareness, in the
hope of gathering the ones who value quality leather goods.
4.  Opening
Pop-up or Retail Stores
In our physical
store, instant and on-site customization, a core characteristic of ours, will be provided. We hope to ensure
every
BLUESY customer can feel
first-hand our philosophy in providing the top-notch shopping experience. 


Production
Schedule
Much like wine, it takes time and patience for supreme handmade leather to be crafted into its prime form
in our factory, no shortcuts exist given
our delicate attention to details. But we guarantee the wait will be worth it.

Early Birds – The
First 50 Bags
- Production Starting Date: 30th October- Products Dispatch date: 12th November- Products Delivery date: Before 30th November
More Birds – The 51th
-250th Bags
- Production Starting Date: 12th November- Products Dispatch date: 30th November- Products Delivery date: Before Christmas
Extra Birds – From
the 251th Bags on
- Production Starting Date: 30th November- Products Dispatch date: Upon completion- Products Delivery date: Within 14 days of dispatch 

*You may be responsible for any applicable duty / VAT charges.


Order Making
1. Press  below and choose a suitable perk
2. Press  to log in your Facebook account
3. Enter shipping information. Fill in the bag and charm you want at Address line 2

(Hong Kong postal code: 000000)
4. Enter payment details to complete purchase

Message to Backers
BLUESY
needs your support financially and spiritually, please do not hesitate to share this
page to your friends. If you have any questions, you can leave comments or
contact us directly.
I would love to hear what every fan of BLUESY has in mind. Thank you!

story:
At ASCENTION, we believe that SCENT has the power to transport us into the invisible and intangible world of memory, more immediately and more powerfully than anything else. This whole-body transportation has amazing power in influencing and conditioning our mindset and emotions. Now imagine what could happen if this power was harnessed and combined with the healing energy of crystals and shaped into a powerful tool that could be used to evoke a self-transformation…

Introducing the first high-vibe, self-care fragrance collection that was created with love to fight through fears and limiting belief patterns and help you to co-create and manifest your desires.

Welcome to your ASCENTION

 

Creating a New Category of Clean Beauty and Wellness:

  • Created by beauty industry expert, Greta Fitz, who couldn't find the suitable holistic beauty products for self-help and healing. 
  • Designed mindfully with the right amount of clean ingredients for the right amount of effect.
  • Each scent evokes aspired emotions which are conditioned through a customized ritual.
  • Double patented bottle design that protects the authentic crystal in a separate chamber.
  • Responsibly produced with materials that can be reused and recycled.
  • Exclusive partnership with Columbia Gem House, the first fair-trade gem supplier.
  • Mindfully and minimally packaged with only what you need and nothing more.
     

About The Brand:

Ascention was created and manifested by female founder, Greta Fitz, who has over two decades of experience as a marketing executive in the beauty and fragrance industries. Her work on Ascention earned her a prestigious spot as a 2019 Sephora Accelerate Cohort, which is a program dedicated to building a community of innovative female founders in beauty. In its most competitive and diverse year yet, Greta was one of 14 chosen from thousands of applicants worldwide.  And of those 14, Greta was the only participant whose startup is in the pre-revenue stage.

After coming to a crossroads due to a serious health scare, Greta decided to reprioritize her life and conquer her fears. When she looked to holistic self-help in beauty, she couldn't find it. During her research, she saw a staggering number of searches for self-healing, anti-stress, depression and anxiety, and quickly realized that she wasn’t alone in the fight. The global wellness industry is valued at ~$4.2 trillion, the self-care industry, ~$10 billion.  Consumers are tired of numbing the pain. They are becoming more conscientious of how modern medications are affecting their bodies and minds and realizing that sometimes you must go through the pain in order to grow and to evolve. Need proof? Look at any hashtag on instagram: #crystalhealing, 2.8MM posts. #selflove, 27MM posts. #selfcare, 14MM posts. #wellness, 26MM posts. #cleanbeauty, 1.3MM posts. #ascension, 1.1MM posts. The zeitgeist is ready to ascend.

A wellness revolution has begun.

 

Our Distinct Point of Difference:

Exclusively partnering with world-renowned perfume house, MANE, ASCENTION fragrances are non-toxic, vegan, cruelty-free, and linear, meaning that the scent will stay the same from the initial spray, to when the fragrance dries on your skin. This means no headaches, and no surprises. 

Our 6 fragrances were designed around the aspired emotions of love, peace, wisdom, prosperity, courage, and detox, respectively, and paired with a responsibly-sourced crystal to match.  In an age where there is so much emphasis on being educated about what you are putting in and on your body, we feel that it is equally important to know how and where your products were sourced.

Have you ever considered what it took for your crystals to make their way into your hands? And are they even real?

Most people haven’t, and that’s why we are thrilled to announce that ASCENTION BEAUTY CO. has entered into an exclusive partnership with an authentic, responsibly-sourced crystal supplier, Columbia Gem House.  They have developed the industry’s first fair-trade and quality assurance program, meaning that every single one of their crystals is closely tracked from mine to market to ensure that they have been handled and treated according to strict protocols. That means NO toxic synthetics or “enhancements,” NO dangerous labor conditions, NO unfair wages, and NO unnecessary environmental destruction.

This information is overwhelmingly undisclosed by other suppliers and retailers, and ASCENTION x Columbia Gem House hope to pioneer a industry-wide standard for how our beautiful crystals are mined and treated, so that we can truly tap into their unobstructed healing properties and feel good about doing so.

That being said, our crystals are not submerged in the fragrance; rather, we’ve created a double patented bottle design that holds the stone in a separate chamber, keeping your crystal and juice safe from contamination, and allowing the crystal’s healing powers to energetically permeate into the fragrance.

This ensures that your ritualistic journey is 100% custom. The crystals can be cleansed and charged with YOUR intentions, and they are not influenced by anyone else’s energy.  Our key points of difference truly innovate a new category and standard of clean beauty and wellness. 

 

Backing ASCENTION Is Showing Up For Yourself:

At ASCENTION, we are led by synchronicities and believe that everything happens for a reason. Like attracts like, and whatever energy we put out into the world will always come back, and the more we give, the more we receive.  This is not just an investment in a brand, but an investment in yourself. 

From emerging talent to the best-in-the-business, ASCENTION was brought to life by a pack of experts who share in this vision of creating a life-changing new category of ritualistic beauty and demanding a higher standard of clean and sustainable products.  And as you can imagine, delivering this package to the world is an ambitious and expensive task, but we are always up for a challenge!  As an entrepreneur and single mom, Greta Fitz strives to instill in her two young boys and those that follow in her collective that miracles are possible, and you can do anything when you put your mind and intent behind it.

 

ASCENTION Was Created For You, But It Can't Happen Without You:

These high-vibe fragrances are not being pushed out through a multi-million dollar corporation. Nor are they based off of market trends of “what sells.” Rather, ASCENTION was born out of one person’s passion for sharing the love and joy that she manifested within herself by implementing the spiritual tools of scent, intention-setting, and crystal healing.

Whether you contribute $1 or $10,000, know that you are playing a part in revolutionizing and unifying the beauty and wellness industries.  By backing ASCENTION, you are supporting the manufacturing of responsible fragrance, the authentic, fair-trade, and sustainable sourcing of crystals, and the courageous dedication, integrity, and passion inherent in small business start-ups.  From the deepest part of our soul to the bottom of our hearts, we humbly thank you.

 

What Your Dollar Will Do: 

Every dollar counts and will contribute to the first round of production and manufacturing of ASCENTION fragrances,

 

Other Ways To Contribute:

We understand that financial constraints may prevent you from donating to our campaign, but we still want you to join the collective and follow our journey!  Please share this page with friends, family, and social media followers, and be sure to follow us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/ascentionbeautyco/?hl=en. Also, please visit our landing page http://ascentionbeautyco.com and join our email subscriber list to receive exclusive content of love, support, and healing.

 

With Love and Gratitude,

ASCENTION BEAUTY CO.

story:
We've started the shipping process!

Some of our lucky backers will be getting the FLYTE backpack early!

We can't thank you all enough!

With the help of our amazing backers, we are officially in the production stage!!

Our first round of Backpacks will be arriving to our warehouse within the next few days!! Select orders will be shipping out earlier than anticipated!

Thanks again to everyone for all of your support, we wouldn't be where we are without you!!

Introducing the FLYTE Backpack

Like all our endeavors, we at Electronic Gamers' League set out to completely overhaul all aspects of the gaming backpack specifically with the gamers’ needs in mind.  The result is an uncompromised and peerless system that offers maximum adaptability and versatility for any gamer (Console or PC).  It is loaded with over 20 gaming and tech-ready features that accommodates all your gaming needs.

Introducing the FLYTE Travel Kit

In addition to the FLYTE backpack, EGL has developed a hard-shelled, protected and self-contained counterpart perfect for storing additional accessories and valuables. The FLYTE Travel Kit offers tech-ready travelers all the accommodations and functionality necessary to keep you on-the-go. Whatever your mode of transportation, the FLYTE Kit will facilitate the protection and usability of all your tech accessories.

We wanted to send a HUGE THANK YOU to everyone that helped us with this project! Without your support, none of this would be possible!

Built by gamers for gamers. Founded in 2013 by Dan Werling and Danny Bristow, Electronic Gamers’ League is home to some of the biggest names in eSports gear and accessories. After attending several Pro Tournaments, EGL saw the need for a specialized backpack. FLYTE represents over a year of design, development, prototyping and testing. We strive to deliver the best quality and service with everything we do.

*Here’s a list of all countries we are currently shipping to:

We will start shipping once this campaign has concluded.

  • Australia
  • Canada
  • China
  • Denmark
  • France
  • Finland
  • Germany
  • Ireland
  • Japan
  • Netherlands
  • New Zealand
  • Norway
  • Singapore
  • Spain
  • South Korea
  • Switzerland
  • Sweden
  • United Kingdom
  • United States

U.S. Delivery Times:

Most U.S. shipments are sent using USPS, UPS, or FedEx. The exact service depends on the size and weight of your order. U.S. deliveries usually reach their destination in 2-5 business days.

International Delivery Times:

Depending on the destination, normal delivery is 4-10 business days; however some international shipments can take up to 3-4 weeks to reach their destination due to local customs.

Customs & Duties:

EGL is not responsible for any customs, duties or import fees associated with receiving your order.

EGL Indiegogo Warranty & Return Policy:

We at EGL stand by our products, while our products include a 1 year warranty against any manufacturer defects, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items that have been used.

story:
Conceived In Incarceration

I have always dreamt of being my own boss and an unfortunate circumstance lead me towards the realisation of my ultimate dream. In 2013 I was incarcerated, where I worked in a sewing workshop and was fortunate enough to train in garment making. It was this experience that led me to the realisation of my mission. My time inside and the skills I acquired allowed me to visualise and create Nrd. Nrd is an acronym for my name and nickname Nicole ‘Red’ Douglas. Pronounced “nerd”. Nrd is a fashion brand which represents freedom and individuality. My circumstances have redirected me towards a purposeful mission to help ex offenders like myself find a positive path and I hope in the long term to outsource some of Nrd’s manufacturing back into HMP and to offer work and training to ex offenders like myself. It's more than fashion! 

This campaign is extremely important to me as it will allow me to take Nrd to the next level. A ready to wear collection is crucial for the evolution of the brand. The support of my network and people near and far will mean so much to the Nrd journey. A small contribution can mean the difference between a one woman band producing garments at one or two pieces a day, a few days a week to a mass production of specific garments ready for sale online and in select boutiques. It will mean I can hire seamstresses and graders to help with my designs and sizing on a large scale. It will in turn allow me the time to target my ideal customers with an online based marketing campaign. It will ensure that Nrd grows to a level where we can employ staff, offer opportunities to ex offenders and explore the avenue of manufacturing Nrd garments in Prison workshops, giving prisoners the opportunity to be part of the movement. It won't be an easy process but I am determined to make it work and give back as I am morally indebted to the opportunities I received in my darkest hours. These opportunities got me through and without my past Nrd wouldn't be my present and I wouldn't have this amazing vision and plan for the future.    

What Nrd Needs and What You Get

I am asking for £6000 to follow through with my 2017 Nrd ready to wear plan. I have conducted research into costs as well as obtaining quotes from specific companies who I will do business with in regards to products (such as fabric) and services (such as embroidery).

The Collection

The forthcoming collection has been designed and includes pieces for both men and women as well as some unisex garments. It includes pieces such as hats, hoodies and jumpers, as well as some two piece sets of shorts and tops, shorts and bandanas and dresses and jackets. Following on from the last summers theme I will be incorporating some African and Exotic prints as well as  trending colour schemes alongside simple yet quirky designs. 

Where Your Money Goes

Fabric - £820    

Hats - £200

Embroidery - £330

Print - £260

Labels - £140 

Business Cards/ Flyers - £60 

Pattern Cutters/ Seamstress - £450 (£18 per hour x 25 hours)

Graders - £360                      

Factory Manufacturing - £2000

Marketing - £270

Postage and Packaging - £1110

Total - £6000

Hitting the £6000 target will get us off to an amazing start and the collection will immediately go into production.  Contributors will have the opportunity to be rewarded with perks such as 10% off the collection and a complimentary 'It's more than fashion' Nrd T-shirt.

No matter how much we raise through the campaign we will push on towards our goals by looking at alternative avenues to raise extra money and put the collection out there for the world to see. If we exceed our target the extra contributions will go towards further expanding the brand.

The Impact

It is important that as people we come together to support one another. I believe that everything happens for a reason. I also believe in second chances. In the UK at least a quarter of offenders reoffend within a year of release from prison. After experiencing the prison system first hand I was determined not to be in the negative 25% of that equation. I made a decision and fixated on my dream and grabbed every opportunity that would aid me in the pursuit of my that dream. Not everyone going through the prison system is fortunate enough to receive the opportunities I did. Failure is not an option. Whatever obstacles have come my way and are headed towards me I have and will continue to find a way through. I want to be a positive example of what people can achieve when they set their mind to it. I want to be like the people who offered me the opportunity to learn a skill and find a way through a dark situation. I will do that through Nrd. 

Born of Emancipation!

Last year I began selling items I had made individually. I sold my works as one of pieces in a Market, online and through word of mouth. In addition I have worked as a seamstress creating one off pieces tailored to individuals. I have loved my journey so far and my amazing clients are enchanted by the colours and prints contrasted with the simplicity of the designs. The clothes are a physical manifestation of the ethos of the brand. Freedom and individuality. Interesting colours, prints and fabrics in uncomplicated styles. The way forward now is to expand and grow. There is only so much I can do as an individual and to fulfil the vision I have for Nrd we must evolve and target a larger customer base. 

Risks and Challenges

I have started my business small with basic facilities at home to design, cut and make garments. I am very committed to Nrd and I am working part time in order to put my all into it. The brand ideologies must not be compromised. Quality, unique garments, made in England. The ethos is clear. Freedom and individuality. I believe in the brand. I am aiming to keep the start-up costs as low as possible to reduce risk during the transition into ready to wear.

There are risks with venturing into the fashion industry. But I aim to focus on the unique nature of my brand and expand accordingly. I have close links to various organisations because of my background that have supported me along the way by way of advice, education and networking and will continue to do so. I have listed them below:

The Real Business Club (therealbusinessclub.co.uk)

Only Connect (onlyconnect.london) 

Blue Sky (bluskydevelopement.co.uk) 

Catch 22 (catch-22.org.uk) 

Troy London (troylondon.com) 

Anna Jacobs (annajacobsart.com)

Anya Hindmarch (anyahindmarch.com) 

This support has been key in the development of Nrd as it is my first business venture.

I have built a small but loyal customer base with people returning for my services so I aim to transfer these customers over to the ready to wear range. The lack of man power and limited product have made the journey challenging so far.

The garments going into the ready to wear collection have been carefully designed to target a larger audience whilst still remaining true to the Nrd spirit. Transitioning into ready to wear will allow me to focus on marketing the final product to the consumer rather than sitting in a room physically constructing garments and putting labour into every stage of the process from production to sale.

Many Thanks!

To conclude, I hope my story and plans have resonated with you. I ask that you contribute what you can to my campaign and spread the word. If you are not in a position to contribute but you would still like to support Nrd, please spread the word to anyone and everyone you think may be interested in hearing my story. Don't forget to use the use the Indiegogo share tools!

Nrd! Conceived in incarceration, born of emancipation.

Its more than fashion!

Thank You!

It includes pieces such as hats, hoodies and jumpers, as well as some two piece sets of shorts and tops, shorts and bandanas and dresses and jackets. Following on from the last summers theme I will be incorporating some African and Exotic prints as well as  trending colour schemes alongside simple yet quirky designs. Where Your Money GoesFabric - £820    Hats - £200Embroidery - £330Print - £260Labels - £140 Business Cards/ Flyers - £60 Pattern Cutters/ Seamstress - £450 (£18 per hour x 25 hours)Graders - £360                      Factory Manufacturing - £2000Marketing - £270Postage and Packaging - £1110Total - £6000Hitting the £6000 target will get us off to an amazing start and the collection will immediately go into production.  Contributors will have the opportunity to be rewarded with perks such as 10% off the collection and a complimentary 'It's more than fashion' Nrd T-shirt.No matter how much we raise through the campaign we will push on towards our goals by looking at alternative avenues to raise extra money and put the collection out there for the world to see. If we exceed our target the extra contributions will go towards further expanding the brand.The ImpactIt is important that as people we come together to support one another. I believe that everything happens for a reason. I also believe in second chances. In the UK at least a quarter of offenders reoffend within a year of release from prison. After experiencing the prison system first hand I was determined not to be in the negative 25% of that equation. I made a decision and fixated on my dream and grabbed every opportunity that would aid me in the pursuit of my that dream. Not everyone going through the prison system is fortunate enough to receive the opportunities I did. Failure is not an option. Whatever obstacles have come my way and are headed towards me I have and will continue to find a way through. I want to be a positive example of what people can achieve when they set their mind to it. I want to be like the people who offered me the opportunity to learn a skill and find a way through a dark situation. I will do that through Nrd. Born of Emancipation!Last year I began selling items I had made individually. I sold my works as one of pieces in a Market, online and through word of mouth. In addition I have worked as a seamstress creating one off pieces tailored to individuals. I have loved my journey so far and my amazing clients are enchanted by the colours and prints contrasted with the simplicity of the designs. The clothes are a physical manifestation of the ethos of the brand. Freedom and individuality. Interesting colours, prints and fabrics in uncomplicated styles. The way forward now is to expand and grow. There is only so much I can do as an individual and to fulfil the vision I have for Nrd we must evolve and target a larger customer base. Risks and ChallengesI have started my business small with basic facilities at home to design, cut and make garments. I am very committed to Nrd and I am working part time in order to put my all into it. The brand ideologies must not be compromised. Quality, unique garments, made in England. The ethos is clear. Freedom and individuality. I believe in the brand. I am aiming to keep the start-up costs as low as possible to reduce risk during the transition into ready to wear.There are risks with venturing into the fashion industry. But I aim to focus on the unique nature of my brand and expand accordingly. I have close links to various organisations because of my background that have supported me along the way by way of advice, education and networking and will continue to do so. I have listed them below:The Real Business Club (therealbusinessclub.co.uk)Only Connect (onlyconnect.london) Blue Sky (bluskydevelopement.co.uk) Catch 22 (catch-22.org.uk) Troy London (troylondon.com) Anna Jacobs (annajacobsart.com)Anya Hindmarch (anyahindmarch.com) This support has been key in the development of Nrd as it is my first business venture.I have built a small but loyal customer base with people returning for my services so I aim to transfer these customers over to the ready to wear range. The lack of man power and limited product have made the journey challenging so far.The garments going into the ready to wear collection have been carefully designed to target a larger audience whilst still remaining true to the Nrd spirit. Transitioning into ready to wear will allow me to focus on marketing the final product to the consumer rather than sitting in a room physically constructing garments and putting labour into every stage of the process from production to sale.Many Thanks!To conclude, I hope my story and plans have resonated with you. I ask that you contribute what you can to my campaign and spread the word. If you are not in a position to contribute but you would still like to support Nrd, please spread the word to anyone and everyone you think may be interested in hearing my story. Don't forget to use the use the Indiegogo share tools!Nrd! Conceived in incarceration, born of emancipation.Its more than fashion!Thank You!

story:
Victoria wanted to design a bag that combines fashion with function to help simplify the lives of busy women.  She couldn't find a bag that fits all of her daily essentials, and could take her from work to workout, and everywhere else she needed to go. She saw other women commuting to work with the same problem, and decided that we deserve better bags to support or busy lifestyles.  From here Workingurl Co. was born.

All Workingurl bags are made to be high quality, versatile, and durable. The new BusyHer Collection is a 3-in-1 bag, that is both elegant and athletic, all while being comfortable and practical. Most importantly they are designed by women, for women!

 

BusyHer Bags can be worn as a shoulder bag (tote), as a backpack, or as crossbody.  Just clip and unclip the straps to change the style.

 

 

 

The BusyHer Collection fits all lifestyles for all women.  Utilizing feedback from customers and influencers who have been carrying our bags since our first small production, we have improved the design and overall aesthetic for this new line.  Whether you're on the go, at the office, heading to the gym, running errands, or traveling, BusyHer bags will carry everything you need and keep you looking chic.

 

 
 
Like our first line, the BusyHer Collection is made of a premium, highly-durable nylon.  While sourcing this nylon, we made sure to select the top-performing choice for rugged applications where durability and abrasion resistance are a high priority. Our nylon is strong, lightweight, and has greater stretchability.  It' s also easy to clean and wrinkle resistant, qualities that make it the perfect choice for our customers.
 

 

 

 
 
 
Carrying your day is made simple and easy with BusyHer bags.
 
The BusyHer Collection has all of the signature features that our customers love, allowing busy women to carry their entire day in just one bag.  There are 11 pockets and compartments including, a separate shoe compartment, a 13" padded laptop compartment, two bottle holders, a detachable key fob, pen and pencil holders, cell phone pocket, and plenty of other pockets and space.
 
 
 
 
Carry your day and organize your everyday essentials.
 
 

Backers can choose a single bag perk with either the Navy (Lisa Bag), or Gray (Christa Bag).

We introduced our original bags to customers almost three years ago with a small batch of our bags, and have helped busy women carry their everyday essentials since. 

Here's what they say about our bags:

"I have had my bag for nearly three years. It still looks brand new! As a working artist, I put this bag through hell & back. I use it for my laptop, umbrella, paint supplies, shoes, extra clothes, water bottle...all at the same time! The best purchase I’ve made in a long time." - Tracy Barbosa

"I was one of your first customers and I'm still using your bag. It has held up despite how ridiculously heavy I make the bag each day. I've taken it on countless international trips for both work and play! I've bought other bags and the handles end up snapping in a month, this is going on years and still looks great!" - ‎Justine Grossman‎ 

"Before my WorkinGurl Co. bag, I literally carried three bags to work (purse, gym bag, lunch bag) every single day...taking the subway was a nightmare! Now, I just fill up my WorkinGurl Co. bag and go. The convenient pockets allow me to actually find things (i.e. my keys, wallet, gym shoes, etc.) versus just buying a massive bag and losing things in the "bag abyss". I can't recommend these products enough, they make your life easier and you look good doing it!" - Shani Sarkis 

"Just got my bag today! Shipping was really quick! The bag itself is a great size. I just started a job where I'll be taking the train every day. This bag is a life saver. Having the spot in the bottom for shoes is perfect. If you commute like me, you need this bag." - Rachel Nguyen 

 

The nylon material we use is much lighter than leather. It gives customers  the ability to pack what they need for their day, without any added weight from a bag. It's also durable, strong, and waterproof. Now you can walk in the rain, contain spills from your drinks, and easily wipe and clean your bag without fear that it can get damaged. 

 

 
Lighter than leather and waterproof!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Victoria started Workingurl Co. almost three years ago, after seeing a need for women's bags that are fashionable AND functional.  When commuting into Cambridge, Massachusetts for work, she found herself carrying 2-3 bags every day to hold her essentials.  She noticed other professional women having to deal with the same problem.  After searching online and in stores without any luck finding what she needed, she decided to create her own line of bags that would help simplify busy women's lives, without sacrificing style.
 
Shortly after conceptualizing her first designs, she applied and was accepted into an accelerator for entrepreneurs.  She utilized the tools she learned from this competition to launch her first line through a Kickstarter campaign.  With the funds raised from this campaign, she produced and delivered a small batch of original Workingurl bags.  Since then, she's obtained customer feedback and worked to improve on the original design. She's now created an improved line, that better serves busy women and their unique lifestyles.
 
 
 
Victoria Hall is from Massachusetts, and lives in South Easton with her family.  Prior to starting Workingurl Co., she worked as a nonprofit arts professional and obtained extensive experience in fundraising, financial management, and event planning.  She obtained a Bachelor's Degree in English, Professional Writing from Fitchburg State University. She graduated from Boston University in 2010, with a Master's Degree in Arts Management.  When she's not busy working on Workingurl Co., being a mom, or spending time with her family, she enjoys reading, traveling, and watching almost all of the Real Housewives franchise.
 
 
 
 
We understand not everyone can be a backer at the time of this campaign.  But you can still help by getting the word out and sharing with all of your friends.   You can share directly from this campaign page, share our main Youtube video link, or find us on social media and share our campaign posts.
 
Find us on:
Facebook at facebook.com/workingurlco
Instagram at instagram.com/workingurlco 
 
 
Return Policy:  Indiegogo is a great way for creators and entrepreneurs to offer their products and ideas at discounted prices.  These funds go toward initiating production and launching a product resulting in a product that a backer can enjoy.  In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defected.  However, if you do receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact vhall@workingurlco.com, so we can assist you.

story:
This campaign has ended, see our website here - www.subs.nz

 

Hear all about Subs' mission on this podcast, with Subs' founder, Andrew Lambie.

Comfort & Durability

Soles: Subs' sole formula ensures that you get both durability and comfort. As soon as you start wearing your Subs, they will quickly mold to your feet, providing you with sturdy, long-lasting comfort. You will have a soft cushion of comfort with every step you take. Our tapered footbed guarantees you some extra durability where it's needed most in the heel. 

Straps: Our straps are designed and positioned so that you will not experience any irritation between your toes. The plugs are strong and durable as well, meaning that they will not easily blow out on you.

Performance: Subs perform extremely well in wet conditions and off the beaten track situations too. The design on both the top and bottom of the soles allows you to get a great grip on any surface you happen to traverse in your adventures.

Subs' Materials and Features

Subs flip-flops use 100% recycled & recyclable materials

Recycled plastic makes excellent sandals because it is highly durable, super comfortable, 100% safe to wear against your skin, and can be recycled over and over again. By purchasing this product you are taking a collective step in helping to reduce the ever increasing global plastic problem, plus you help fund the removal of marine debris, sweet!

Upcycle your Subs

When your Subs are worn out beyond use, and that could take ages, you can send them back to us for upcycling.  We have the ability to take old pairs, grind them up into pellets, put them back through the plastic injection machinery and make brand new pairs. Now, that's what we call sustainable! 

The Subs' team has strong ties to New Zealand and Australia, hence one of our personal favourites, introducing - The Anzac

Almost everything is made from recycled materials, packaging included

All of our packaging is made from recycled paper, and of course is recyclable. 

Subs' pledge: 1 pair purchased = the removal of 1/2 a kg (1.16 lbs) of trash from our ocean ecosystems!

Subs pledge to remove 1/2 a kg (that's 1.16 lbs) of debris from our coastline and ocean ecosystems for every pair sold, which means not only will you fund the removal of 1/2 a kg (1.16 lbs) of debris from our ocean ecosystems, you will also have a super comfy, highly durable pair of flip flops that are made from 100% recycled, recyclable and upcyclable materials!

Plenty of the plastic debris recovered is recyclable

We have been beach cleaning for about a year now, and the amount of volunteers joining us is ever growing, with plenty of interest in different countries around the world in support of what we can do.

Our impact to date: 3,584 kgs or 7,901 lbs of debris removed from our ocean eco-systems

So far we've removed over 3,584 kgs of trash and counting, that's 7,901 lbs! We have been very pleased to find that a lot of the plastic we recover is recyclable, and after being further processed in recycling centers and refined into pallets we have some of our raw materials for manufacturing.

The more we clean our ecosystems, the more we realise we can make an impact. Which is why WE NEED YOU to join us in taking steps for the ocean, because together we can make a large impact. Whether you're spreading the word, interested in volunteering, or can show your support with a purchase or two, you will be making an impact.

 

Safety First

Subs soles and straps are 100% SGS certified. That means that the materials we use have been tested and meet health, safety, and regulatory standards, Subs are totally safe to wear against your skin.

REGULAR & SLENDER STYLE SUBS

 

11 Different Strap Colour Options

Regular flip flops: The regular style of flip flops is for people with normal to wide feet. Our flip flops are unisex but the regular style is mainly suitable for men as it has larger sizes available.

Due to our commitment to using 100% recycled plastic for our soles, we are currently limited to black soles, with 11 strap colour options.

Slender flip flops: The slender style of flip flops is for people with slender to normal feet. Our flip flops are unisex but the slender style is mainly suitable for women as it has smaller sizes available.

Sizes shown are US 10/11 Regular above and US 7/8 Slender below.

 

Subs' Size Guide

To ensure you get the best fit possible, please refer to the size guide below. Subs use unisex sizing, divided between Regular fit soles and straps, and Slender fit soles and straps.

Simply measure your foot and add about 2.5 cm or one inch, to your foot measurement to get your correct size. For example, if your foot is 25 cm long, add 2.5 cm and you should comfortably fit our size 9, which is 27.5 cm long. If your foot is 27 cm long, then you should fit our size 12 comfortably, which is 29.5 cm long, and so on.

Customers with wide feet, and/or larger foot circumference, may want to consider ordering one size larger to accommodate additional foot volume around the strap.

But, it's really up to you, some people prefer a bit of wriggle room behind the heel, whereas others are happy to have the back of the heel in line with the back of the sole.

 

These two illustrations below demonstrate a couple of very common foot sizes. Please note that all measurements reflect the length of the sole, NOT the length of your foot!

Where we begin...

The Subs' story starts in Kyle, New Zealand, in the 1980s, where we grew up on a farm right next to the South West Pacific Ocean.

Back then it was clear to us how our beaches were being affected by plastic waste, with fish and bird corpses constantly washing up ashore, mixed in with plastic waste from fishing nets, bottles and caps.

Now, this problem affects the entire world and its food supply, with an estimated 5.2 trillion pieces of plastic in the world's oceans, of which 269,000 tons float on the surface.

There are five main concentrations of plastic, known as the 'gyres', the largest being estimated twice the size of Texas. Plastic pieces out number sea life in 'Great Pacific Garbage Patch' by 6 to 1.

Hundreds of thousands of sea turtles, whales and other marine mammals and more than 1 million seabirds die each year from ocean pollution, and plastic ingestion, or entanglement in plastic debris.

What we can do is alleviate these problems, and if you walk with us you will be taking some serious steps in the right direction for the ocean's ecosystems

Over 7 years experience in the footwear industry

Collectively, team Subs has over 7 years experience in the footwear industry. We realised we were in a position to do something about the world's extreme plastic pollution problem, and the idea was born to create a footwear product that could sustain the reduction of plastic in our ocean and coastline ecosystems, and recycled plastic in general, by using that plastic as footwear.

 

Testing

We have done extensive testing, including, but not limited to, walking (shock horror), running, skipping, boxing, hiking, surfing, waterfall jumping/swimming.

Waterfall

Non-slip on rocks, even when submerged in running water.

Hiking

Went for a little stroll up a mountain while testing a heavier/harder style of subs, have to say I'm glad it was me and not anyone else because they were wayyyyy too hard, great test, except it was during winter and I had no shoes, no frost bite but safe to say next time I'll take some shoes and socks also.

Natural Hot Springs

Subs are great all terrain flip flops, even in wet, outdoor stony conditions. Subs are highly slip resistant and sturdy, making them especially great in any outdoor environment.

 

Surfing

Alright, surf testing was pretty hairy, can you do it? Yes! Should you? Perhaps, just wear your Subs to the surf.

Subs have excellent taste in drink

Our travel destinations for testing were pretty on point too. Testing was fairly extensive lasting over 12 months.

Koozies!

In fact, we like keeping our drinks cool so much, that we decided to take a few steps for the fridge as well. If you like keeping your drink cool too, check out these Koozies in the perks.

Stickers

Stick 'em anywhere you like, spread the word, the large waterproof sticker is great for surfboards, coolers, cars or scooters to show your support for Subs.

Little & large stickers available in the perks for a small donation to the cause, 

Production Timeline




We've already started shipping, so for most people, you can expect to receive your brand spankin’ new flip flops sometime in September 2017. We will keep you updated every step of the way.

Below you will see a basic overview of the production timeline of the subs' flip flops project so far and the projected timeline over the next few months until the product is under your feet.

This project has been years in the making so we have been through all the necessary processes and have ticked them off the list. As we have done this before, we know we are fully capable of seeing it through and will be launching our new summer footwear into the marketplace!

From the end of the campaign, the delivery of Subs' products will begin as soon as we have received payment from Indiegogo (2 weeks later), we already have pre-orders with our factories so the first people in will get their products very quickly some even before the campaign ends if we have enough cash for shipping.

If it goes haywire we have the production capacity to keep up.

Social Media

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

Tumblr

Website

FAQ’s...

How do I know what size I am in Subs flip flops?

You will find the flip flop measurements in (cm & inches) in the information above. You can measure your foot with a ruler and choose the corresponding size. The Subs' footwear sizing is based on the US men's sizing model. There isn’t a huge amount of difference in each size, you will notice sizes such as the 7/8 have been merged. So if you’re a 7 or an 8 you will most likely fit comfortably in the 7/8.

I’m ordering from outside New Zealand... how do I add ‘international shipping’?

International shipping is included after checkout, sending to the furthest reaches of the world costs about the same as sending Subs to our neighbours. So don't fret, doesn't matter where you live, [yes even Antarctica] you will get your order with no extra cost.

How can I choose my size, style and colours of Subs' flip flops?

Easy as! We will contact you by e-mail when the campaign ends to take your orders of size, colours and style, and Bobs your uncle!

What is Subs doing with the money you raise from this campaign?

A large portion of the money will be spent on repaying production molds – 30,000 USD. The actual production costs are also quite high as we have to meet the minimum quantities set out by our supplier factories This will be determined by how many backers we receive before we do our next order. It might be wishful thinking, but if there is any money left over it will be spent on stretch goals, more colours and styles, those kinds of things.

When will I receive my new Subs flip flops?

We are a positive bunch here and if you get in on the early birds, then there's a good chance you'll receive your Subs before the campaign even ends. The only reasons we cannot send all of the perks immediately as we would like to are, 1) we don't get the money from Indiegogo for at least 2 weeks until after the campaign has ended, and 2) If this goes bonkers our pre-orders won't cover additional perks if added.

What happens if I order the incorrect size?

You Muppet!!! Only joking – it happens... Just let us know and we will do our best to swap them over for you. You might have to incur some delivery costs but we will do everything in our power to make sure you get Subs on your feet. Worst case scenario you'll have an extra pair to give away or sell.

What if my package gets lost in transit?

All packages are tracked internationally, and we will assist in ensuring all packages reach their destination. If you haven't received it within say 10 days of getting the 'your package is on its way' email then we will track it down for you.

Do you plan to bring out more colours and designs?

Yes, we totally plan to do that! However, due to our commitment to using 100% recycled plastic for our soles, we are currently limited to black, with the straps however we can go nuts. Due to the materials we use it's very hard to do bright colors, however darker colors are on the horizon.

Where can I buy this product after the campaign is finished?

If you are inclined to wait until it's over then I would pressure one of your local retailers into stocking us, tell them that they can get better than usual retail buying rates right here. Then you'll save a little on shipping but you're at mercy to what they charge. That's what I'd do anyway. Failing that we will hopefully be in retail stores around the world pretty quickly!

Also, we'll expand our website here to include online sales, and if we hit our target then we'll still be here on InDemand!

I’m having problems backing this project?

That is the saddest story we've ever heard!! Seriously!!! Please contact indiegogo for support – support@indiegogo.com or we might be able to help too... contact us at – hello@subs.nz

If you've actually read all of this, you are a legend!  We hope to have you on board with us soon, thanks for your support!

Team Subs

As soon as you start wearing your Subs, they will quickly mold to your feet, providing you with sturdy, long-lasting comfort. You will have a soft cushion of comfort with every step you take. Our tapered footbed guarantees you some extra durability where it's needed most in the heel. Straps: Our straps are designed and positioned so that you will not experience any irritation between your toes. The plugs are strong and durable as well, meaning that they will not easily blow out on you.Performance: Subs perform extremely well in wet conditions and off the beaten track situations too. The design on both the top and bottom of the soles allows you to get a great grip on any surface you happen to traverse in your adventures.Subs' Materials and FeaturesSubs flip-flops use 100% recycled & recyclable materialsRecycled plastic makes excellent sandals because it is highly durable, super comfortable, 100% safe to wear against your skin, and can be recycled over and over again. By purchasing this product you are taking a collective step in helping to reduce the ever increasing global plastic problem, plus you help fund the removal of marine debris, sweet!Upcycle your SubsWhen your Subs are worn out beyond use, and that could take ages, you can send them back to us for upcycling.  We have the ability to take old pairs, grind them up into pellets, put them back through the plastic injection machinery and make brand new pairs. Now, that's what we call sustainable! The Subs' team has strong ties to New Zealand and Australia, hence one of our personal favourites, introducing - The AnzacAlmost everything is made from recycled materials, packaging includedAll of our packaging is made from recycled paper, and of course is recyclable. Subs' pledge: 1 pair purchased = the removal of 1/2 a kg (1.16 lbs) of trash from our ocean ecosystems!Subs pledge to remove 1/2 a kg (that's 1.16 lbs) of debris from our coastline and ocean ecosystems for every pair sold, which means not only will you fund the removal of 1/2 a kg (1.16 lbs) of debris from our ocean ecosystems, you will also have a super comfy, highly durable pair of flip flops that are made from 100% recycled, recyclable and upcyclable materials!Plenty of the plastic debris recovered is recyclableWe have been beach cleaning for about a year now, and the amount of volunteers joining us is ever growing, with plenty of interest in different countries around the world in support of what we can do.Our impact to date: 3,584 kgs or 7,901 lbs of debris removed from our ocean eco-systemsSo far we've removed over 3,584 kgs of trash and counting, that's 7,901 lbs! We have been very pleased to find that a lot of the plastic we recover is recyclable, and after being further processed in recycling centers and refined into pallets we have some of our raw materials for manufacturing.The more we clean our ecosystems, the more we realise we can make an impact. Which is why WE NEED YOU to join us in taking steps for the ocean, because together we can make a large impact. Whether you're spreading the word, interested in volunteering, or can show your support with a purchase or two, you will be making an impact. Safety FirstSubs soles and straps are 100% SGS certified. That means that the materials we use have been tested and meet health, safety, and regulatory standards, Subs are totally safe to wear against your skin.REGULAR & SLENDER STYLE SUBS 11 Different Strap Colour OptionsRegular flip flops: The regular style of flip flops is for people with normal to wide feet. Our flip flops are unisex but the regular style is mainly suitable for men as it has larger sizes available.Due to our commitment to using 100% recycled plastic for our soles, we are currently limited to black soles, with 11 strap colour options.Slender flip flops: The slender style of flip flops is for people with slender to normal feet. Our flip flops are unisex but the slender style is mainly suitable for women as it has smaller sizes available.Sizes shown are US 10/11 Regular above and US 7/8 Slender below. Subs' Size GuideTo ensure you get the best fit possible, please refer to the size guide below. Subs use unisex sizing, divided between Regular fit soles and straps, and Slender fit soles and straps.Simply measure your foot and add about 2.5 cm or one inch, to your foot measurement to get your correct size. For example, if your foot is 25 cm long, add 2.5 cm and you should comfortably fit our size 9, which is 27.5 cm long. If your foot is 27 cm long, then you should fit our size 12 comfortably, which is 29.5 cm long, and so on.Customers with wide feet, and/or larger foot circumference, may want to consider ordering one size larger to accommodate additional foot volume around the strap.But, it's really up to you, some people prefer a bit of wriggle room behind the heel, whereas others are happy to have the back of the heel in line with the back of the sole. These two illustrations below demonstrate a couple of very common foot sizes. Please note that all measurements reflect the length of the sole, NOT the length of your foot!Where we begin...The Subs' story starts in Kyle, New Zealand, in the 1980s, where we grew up on a farm right next to the South West Pacific Ocean.Back then it was clear to us how our beaches were being affected by plastic waste, with fish and bird corpses constantly washing up ashore, mixed in with plastic waste from fishing nets, bottles and caps.Now, this problem affects the entire world and its food supply, with an estimated 5.2 trillion pieces of plastic in the world's oceans, of which 269,000 tons float on the surface.There are five main concentrations of plastic, known as the 'gyres', the largest being estimated twice the size of Texas. Plastic pieces out number sea life in 'Great Pacific Garbage Patch' by 6 to 1.Hundreds of thousands of sea turtles, whales and other marine mammals and more than 1 million seabirds die each year from ocean pollution, and plastic ingestion, or entanglement in plastic debris.What we can do is alleviate these problems, and if you walk with us you will be taking some serious steps in the right direction for the ocean's ecosystemsOver 7 years experience in the footwear industryCollectively, team Subs has over 7 years experience in the footwear industry. We realised we were in a position to do something about the world's extreme plastic pollution problem, and the idea was born to create a footwear product that could sustain the reduction of plastic in our ocean and coastline ecosystems, and recycled plastic in general, by using that plastic as footwear. TestingWe have done extensive testing, including, but not limited to, walking (shock horror), running, skipping, boxing, hiking, surfing, waterfall jumping/swimming.WaterfallNon-slip on rocks, even when submerged in running water.HikingWent for a little stroll up a mountain while testing a heavier/harder style of subs, have to say I'm glad it was me and not anyone else because they were wayyyyy too hard, great test, except it was during winter and I had no shoes, no frost bite but safe to say next time I'll take some shoes and socks also.Natural Hot SpringsSubs are great all terrain flip flops, even in wet, outdoor stony conditions. Subs are highly slip resistant and sturdy, making them especially great in any outdoor environment. SurfingAlright, surf testing was pretty hairy, can you do it? Yes! Should you? Perhaps, just wear your Subs to the surf.Subs have excellent taste in drinkOur travel destinations for testing were pretty on point too. Testing was fairly extensive lasting over 12 months.Koozies!In fact, we like keeping our drinks cool so much, that we decided to take a few steps for the fridge as well. If you like keeping your drink cool too, check out these Koozies in the perks.StickersStick 'em anywhere you like, spread the word, the large waterproof sticker is great for surfboards, coolers, cars or scooters to show your support for Subs.Little & large stickers available in the perks for a small donation to the cause, Production TimelineWe've already started shipping, so for most people, you can expect to receive your brand spankin’ new flip flops sometime in September 2017. We will keep you updated every step of the way.Below you will see a basic overview of the production timeline of the subs' flip flops project so far and the projected timeline over the next few months until the product is under your feet.This project has been years in the making so we have been through all the necessary processes and have ticked them off the list. As we have done this before, we know we are fully capable of seeing it through and will be launching our new summer footwear into the marketplace!From the end of the campaign, the delivery of Subs' products will begin as soon as we have received payment from Indiegogo (2 weeks later), we already have pre-orders with our factories so the first people in will get their products very quickly some even before the campaign ends if we have enough cash for shipping.If it goes haywire we have the production capacity to keep up.Social MediaFacebookInstagramTwitterTumblrWebsiteFAQ’s...How do I know what size I am in Subs flip flops?You will find the flip flop measurements in (cm & inches) in the information above. You can measure your foot with a ruler and choose the corresponding size. The Subs' footwear sizing is based on the US men's sizing model. There isn’t a huge amount of difference in each size, you will notice sizes such as the 7/8 have been merged. So if you’re a 7 or an 8 you will most likely fit comfortably in the 7/8.I’m ordering from outside New Zealand... how do I add ‘international shipping’?International shipping is included after checkout, sending to the furthest reaches of the world costs about the same as sending Subs to our neighbours. So don't fret, doesn't matter where you live, [yes even Antarctica] you will get your order with no extra cost.How can I choose my size, style and colours of Subs' flip flops?Easy as! We will contact you by e-mail when the campaign ends to take your orders of size, colours and style, and Bobs your uncle!What is Subs doing with the money you raise from this campaign?A large portion of the money will be spent on repaying production molds – 30,000 USD. The actual production costs are also quite high as we have to meet the minimum quantities set out by our supplier factories This will be determined by how many backers we receive before we do our next order. It might be wishful thinking, but if there is any money left over it will be spent on stretch goals, more colours and styles, those kinds of things.When will I receive my new Subs flip flops?We are a positive bunch here and if you get in on the early birds, then there's a good chance you'll receive your Subs before the campaign even ends. The only reasons we cannot send all of the perks immediately as we would like to are, 1) we don't get the money from Indiegogo for at least 2 weeks until after the campaign has ended, and 2) If this goes bonkers our pre-orders won't cover additional perks if added.What happens if I order the incorrect size?You Muppet!!! Only joking – it happens... Just let us know and we will do our best to swap them over for you. You might have to incur some delivery costs but we will do everything in our power to make sure you get Subs on your feet. Worst case scenario you'll have an extra pair to give away or sell.What if my package gets lost in transit?All packages are tracked internationally, and we will assist in ensuring all packages reach their destination. If you haven't received it within say 10 days of getting the 'your package is on its way' email then we will track it down for you.Do you plan to bring out more colours and designs?Yes, we totally plan to do that! However, due to our commitment to using 100% recycled plastic for our soles, we are currently limited to black, with the straps however we can go nuts. Due to the materials we use it's very hard to do bright colors, however darker colors are on the horizon.Where can I buy this product after the campaign is finished?If you are inclined to wait until it's over then I would pressure one of your local retailers into stocking us, tell them that they can get better than usual retail buying rates right here. Then you'll save a little on shipping but you're at mercy to what they charge. That's what I'd do anyway. Failing that we will hopefully be in retail stores around the world pretty quickly!Also, we'll expand our website here to include online sales, and if we hit our target then we'll still be here on InDemand!I’m having problems backing this project?That is the saddest story we've ever heard!! Seriously!!! Please contact indiegogo for support – support@indiegogo.com or we might be able to help too... contact us at – hello@subs.nzIf you've actually read all of this, you are a legend!  We hope to have you on board with us soon, thanks for your support!Team Subs

story:
Tired of using your phone camera to touch up your makeup or fix your hair? 

Had enough of carrying around bulky mirrors in your handbag?

Sick of  being embarrassed because you've had something stuck in your teeth for hours?

Want to take perfect selfies anytime of the day?



The MirraMirra case is the perfect solution with a unique design and 4 different colours to choose from.



 

 

Save over 30% off retail price. 
Prices will go up!

                                 

   



MirraMirra was designed to be durable – we couldn’t be responsible for giving users seven years of bad luck with broken mirrors!


  

The Light feature helps with makeup touch-ups in dark environments.


 

MirraMirra has the same front facing light benefits for taking selfies as competitor cases but with the added benefit of a mirror and a slim design.



NO CHARGING REQUIRED!

MirraMirra's lights are powered through
your iPhones LED torch.



   



MORE VALUE.

LOWER PRICE.

                  



  

  

Save over 30% off retail price.
Prices will go up!

   


MirraMirra is with you wherever you go...


  

 

  

 MirraMirra gives full protection to your phone.

  

  


The Mirra Mirra Case is currently available for the iPhone 6 and 6S. If our crowd funding is a success we will start developing Mirra Mirra for the iPhone 7 and different android devices. Please let us know what device you would like to see Mirra Mirra on and if we get enough demand we will start the development. info@mirramirra.com


Now it's up to you IndieGoGo!

We had a great idea. So we did the research, completed the development and ended up with an amazing product. We have funded the project internally up until this point but now we need your help to bring it to life! All money raised from IndieGoGo will help us get one step closer our goals of producing a truly great product to share with you. Raised funds will be allocated to offset tooling and first run production costs. We are more than confident that with the funds raised from IndieGoGo we will be able to finish tooling and deliver to all of our backers.

   

There are many more consultants, friends, family and colleagues who have helped bring our project to life and we would like to thank them very much for their time and advice. In particular the numerous fashion consultants from around the world who provided the critical advice around the lights and mirror. Everyone has been a huge support through this whole process and we could not have done it without them.

           


                                                   

 

 

Which phones are compatible with MirraMirra?
MirraMirra is compatible with the iPhone 6 and 6S. We are currently working on developing prototypes to work with other devices. 

How thin is MirraMirra?
MirraMirra is only 4.8 mm (0.19") thick. It just feels like part of your phone!

How do you charge MirraMirra?
There is no charging required for the MirraMirra phone case. The lighting function works with the existing LED torch light on your phone. We figured you already had enough cords in our lives!

Can MirraMirra protect my phone?

Yes, although MirraMirra is thin and sleek, it is very robust. The outer shell of the case protects your phone from all-around, making it shock-proof.

What colour options are available?

The MirraMirra is available in the following four colours: Gloss Black, Matte Black, White Marble and Rose Gold. Please send us a message if there is a different colour your after and if we can we will provide it for you. We  love feedback so please send it to info@miraamirra.com. 

How much is shipping and handling?
Shipping is FREE to US, Canada & Australia. 

Shipping is a $6 flat rate to the rest of the world.

When will my MirraMirra be delivered?
We anticipate delivery in January 2017.

Risks & Challenges

Having completed several working prototypes we feel that we have addressed many of the major design hurdles. Like any manufacturing process there are always some risks associated in the development of the tooling and ensuring the end product meets the very high standard we demand. We will only ever ship products that have been tested and meet our quality standards. Delays in manufacturing, beyond our control, always pose a risk.

Despite this, our target date for delivery will be towards the end of January 2017. We would love to be in a position to deliver prior to Christmas and we will do everything we can to make this happen, however we are committed to quality and will not sacrifice this. We are already in the process of organising the tooling and fulfilment agencies, we just need your support.

*PATENT PENDING*

Tired of using your phone camera to touch up your makeup or fix your hair? 
Had enough of carrying around bulky mirrors in your handbag?
Sick of  being embarrassed because you've had something stuck in your teeth for hours?
Want to take perfect selfies anytime of the day?










The MirraMirra case is the perfect solution with a unique design and 4 different colours to choose from.


 
 
Save over 30% off retail price. Prices will go up!

                                 

   





                     

MirraMirra was designed to be durable – we couldn’t be responsible for giving users seven years of bad luck with broken mirrors!

  
The Light feature helps with makeup touch-ups in dark environments.



 




MirraMirra has the same front facing light benefits for taking selfies as competitor cases but with the added benefit of a mirror and a slim design.





NO CHARGING REQUIRED!
MirraMirra's lights are powered through your iPhones LED torch.



   





MORE VALUE.
LOWER PRICE.
                  








  
  
Save over 30% off retail price. Prices will go up!

   

MirraMirra is with you wherever you go...

  



 
  
 MirraMirra gives full protection to your phone.





  
  




@sylviajade - “So convenient for touch-ups when going out with friends, having a mirror with me at all times on my phone case is just so useful”


@lapetitenoob - “I love that it's right on your phone, let's be honest we all have our phones in our hands all the time”

@kimberelymoffit - “The product was easy to use, I really LOVED it, I would definitely use it for a night out with the girls”


@thatsotee - “Any girl would need that mirror, so definitely Mirra Mirra all the way”
How it all started
As with many great ideas, this one started small, in one of our favourite cafes just outside of Melbourne, Australia. We noticed a woman trying (with little success!) to fix her makeup using the front camera on her phone.
Figuring that there must be an easier way to do this, and after doing a lot of research and speaking with many people we realised that this was a problem that a lot of people faced, so we set about finding a solution. And from there Mirra Mirra was born. An iPhone case with a slide out mirror and backing lights.
How it works
Tiny prisms in the top half of the case catch the light from the LED torch on your phone and reflects it around the mirror using 2mm fibre optic tubing.

This allows the perfect amount of light to reflect onto users face for optimal use when fixing makeup or taking selfies.




   



   













For every backer you refer to our campaign you will save an extra 10% on your own MirraMirra Case. Each backer must pledge at least the $39 perk for us to credit you the 10% discount. So if you refer 5 of your friends to back our campaign, you would get a 50% credit on your own MirraMirra Case. Refer 10 people to back our campaign you will end up getting your own MirraMirra case for FREE!See campaign updates to find out how!

 
 

Save over 30% off retail price. Prices will go up!

                                 


Timeline





   
The APP
has been designed to complement the MirraMirra case by activating the light
with the touch of a button. Further to this the phone screen becomes an additional
light source where users can adjust the brightness and switch between different
tones (white, blue and a warm light) to select the right light for every
occasion.




The Mirra Mirra Case is currently available for the iPhone 6 and 6S. If our crowd funding is a success we will start developing Mirra Mirra for the iPhone 7 and different android devices. Please let us know what device you would like to see Mirra Mirra on and if we get enough demand we will start the development. info@mirramirra.com

We had a great idea. So we did the research, completed the development and ended up with an amazing product. We have funded the project internally up until this point but now we need your help to bring it to life! All money raised from IndieGoGo will help us get one step closer our goals of producing a truly great product to share with you. Raised funds will be allocated to offset tooling and first run production costs. We are more than confident that with the funds raised from IndieGoGo we will be able to finish tooling and deliver to all of our backers.
   


There are many more consultants, friends, family and colleagues who have helped bring our project to life and we would like to thank them very much for their time and advice. In particular the numerous fashion consultants from around the world who provided the critical advice around the lights and mirror. Everyone has been a huge support through this whole process and we could not have done it without them.

            




                                                   
  



FAQ


Which phones are compatible with MirraMirra?MirraMirra is compatible with the iPhone 6 and 6S. We are currently working on developing prototypes to work with other devices. 
How thin is MirraMirra?MirraMirra is only 4.8 mm (0.19") thick. It just feels like part of your phone!
How do you charge MirraMirra?There is no charging required for the MirraMirra phone case. The lighting function works with the existing LED torch light on your phone. We figured you already had enough cords in our lives!
Can MirraMirra protect my phone?
Yes, although MirraMirra is thin and sleek, it is very robust. The outer shell of the case protects your phone from all-around, making it shock-proof.
What colour options are available?
The MirraMirra is available in the following four colours: Gloss Black, Matte Black, White Marble and Rose Gold. Please send us a message if there is a different colour your after and if we can we will provide it for you. We  love feedback so please send it to info@miraamirra.com. 
How much is shipping and handling?Shipping is FREE to US, Canada & Australia. 
Shipping is a $6 flat rate to the rest of the world.
When will my MirraMirra be delivered?We anticipate delivery in January 2017.
    
Risks & Challenges
Having completed several working prototypes we feel that we have addressed many of the major design hurdles. Like any manufacturing process there are always some risks associated in the development of the tooling and ensuring the end product meets the very high standard we demand. We will only ever ship products that have been tested and meet our quality standards. Delays in manufacturing, beyond our control, always pose a risk.
Despite this, our target date for delivery will be towards the end of January 2017. We would love to be in a position to deliver prior to Christmas and we will do everything we can to make this happen, however we are committed to quality and will not sacrifice this. We are already in the process of organising the tooling and fulfilment agencies, we just need your support.
*PATENT PENDING*

story:
WE CAN DO PRESCRIPTION! 

We can do prescription lenses in the Zeus, Hera and Ares styles! 

  • Flexible Swiss TR90X Material
  • Detachable Arms
  • Interchangeable Arms Between Styles
  • Replaceable Lenses
  • Polarised Optics
  • Light Weight Polymer
  • Matte Finish 
  • Prescription Lenses Available
  • The Sili Collection is comprised of 4 distinctive styles.

3 of the shapes fully interchange with each other, giving you endless possibilities to switch between your Sili's, mixing colours and styles on the fly.

Flexible Frames

Utilising top of the range Swiss made materials our Impact resistant, flexible frames and arms ensure no matter what you chuck at them, they come out unscathed.

Detachable Arms

Arms detach from the frames with our click and pop hinge system ensuring your Sili's survive any knock, bump or crush. Easy to switch between our available styles.

No more broken hinges (or broken wallets.)

Interchangeable Lenses

We've made it incredibly easy for you to switch between our interchangeable sports lenses.

Our sports range comes complete with multiple lenses so you can install the perfect lens to fit the conditions, improving your game.

CUSTOM OPTIONS

At Sili, we know that having an active lifestyle makes you different and we wanted to give you the option to stay different with over 1000+ variations to choose your custom style and colour.

We have even designed the arms to interchange between the two Categories of Lifestyle and Sports with our simple click and pop arm system.
