story:
UPDATE (12/04/2019)

One extremely lucky supporter will WIN St. Monday Handkerchiefs for LIFE.

Yes, even better than the Second Chance Program, is the opportunity to receive St. Monday Handkerchiefs for the rest of your natural life. You'll never lose your cool with St. Monday.

Note: All levels of funding are eligible for entry. Number of handkerchiefs purchased is equal to number of entries in raffle. Raffle will be drawn on FINAL day of funding.  

Why St. Monday?

There's no reason to lose your cool in the heat.

We make the world's best handkerchief that lets you keep dry while celebrating the art and culture you love (We're starting with New Orleans). Look your best, especially when it's hot out. We discovered the finest eco friendly Japanese quick drying fabrics and adorned them with custom New Orleans art.

It's high fashion meeting high function.

Our industry leading Second Chance Program means you won't be afraid to use your kerchief. If it rips, tears or frays, send it back to us and we'll replace it, free of charge.

(Yeah, it's like you get a SECOND handkerchief for free.)

Features:

The St. Monday handkerchief is ultimate beauty and utility:

  1. Custom art that celebrate New Orleans culture and design.
  2. Japanese Hybrid Cotton: quick-dries instead of sopping into your clothing.
  3. Eco-Friendly Material Production.
  4. Hand finished edges with a tight 6-6 purl.
  5. Small enough for a pocket, large enough to tie around the neck at A 42.5cm by 42.5cm square (that's 16.75 inches).
  6. Our Second Chance Program: When you purchase your kerchief from St. Monday, you won't have to worry about your kerchief breaking or tearing. We fully cover any rip, tear, fade, or break for the lifetime of the kerchief. Just send us the kerchief back, and we'll send a new one in the mail to you. 

Our Origin Story

As professionals, we started carrying handkerchiefs to beat the New Orleans Summer heat.

Useful, high-end fabric can help polish your glasses, mop your brow, or accent a fun outfit or bag, but all current options look like rags, and are made from poor materials, like silk (functionally useless), cotton (cheap), or linen (soaks like a sponge!).

There wasn’t anything ultra-premium or eco-friendly on the market that we wanted to use or carry around with us and show off during New Orleans summer. 

So we made it.

Over a year of designing custom New Orleans patterns, sourcing materials, printers, and finishing details, and we’ve built the best handkerchief on the market (we say in the world).

We're working with the industry leading experts at Privy Label, who ensure our materials and processes are ethically and expertly sourced and managed. 

It's beautiful New Orleans art (our founding city, but more cities to come!) printed on an eco friendly, ultra-soft hybrid-cotton that quick dries like a tech fabric but always feels like an ultra-premium silk.

How We Wear St. Monday:

Progress Roadmap:

2018 - product ideation and art direction

2019 - production partner identification & team structuring

Fall 2019 - supply chain setup and product finalization.

NOVEMBER 2019 - Indiegogo launch

December 2020 - Indiegogo funded

February 2020 - manufacturing & quality control, rewards shipping

March 2020 - direct to customer online sales

Rewards:

St. Monday Forever ($15):

Congrats! You're a founding supporter of the newest startup in New Orleans. Get on our email list and stay updated on all of the growth and happenings of our business. 

Described by the Washington Post as,  "A dazzling virtuosu," Daniel Lelchuk and The Lelchuk pattern is a celebration of culture and class. Having performed across the world with premier orchestras, Daniel resides in New Orleans as the Assistant Principle Cellist appointed under conductor Carlos Miguel Prieto. This piece, meant for both men and women, is inspired by New Orleans food and decadence and will go over well at the Crawfish Boil.

Alan Brackett is ranked as one of The Best Lawyers in America and a Super Lawyer. Alan has developed a reputation as an extremely skilled litigation attorney, who maintains the highest standards of professionalism, qualities that have attributed to him being widely recognized as one of the top litigators in the industry. Not only was he a founding partner of the firm Moledoux, Bland, Legrand, and Brackett, but his commitment to community and Fraternity has led him to be a leading member of many New Orleans civic organizations. This piece is inspired by the iconic shotgun homes that characterize the city and celebrate the depth of our often spooky town.

Mike Dalle Molle is an entrepreneur, co-Founder of GoodWood Nola, and Board President of The Green Project. His visionary wood and metalwork adorns and celebrates many of the newest restaurants and hotels in the city. Inspired by the character of the ironwork that covers Uptown and the French Quarter, the Dalle Molle is an homage to the expert craftsmanship that Mike Dalle Molle has dedicated his life to. 

The Kerchief Set, 3 Total ($88):

If you're looking for a gift that represents the beauty of our city and functional style, but can't decide which one to choose from, you can support the full Kerchief Set and receive all 3 of our first run prints, The Lelchuk, The Brackett, and The Dalle Molle. 

The Best Gifter Ever, 10 Total ($266):

Keep your office, home or friends looking stylish and cool because summer is coming. Pick how many of each pattern you like, and get the first run of St. Monday Kerchiefs!

The Distributor, 30 total ($683):

Run a shop, boutique or e-commerce site? Get stocked and ready for Mardi Gras season. Pick your patterns and stock your shop for the upcoming season. Free Shipping on all Distributor Orders.

The Big Distributor, 50 Total ($963)

Run a big shop, boutique or e-commerce site? Get stocked and ready for Mardi Gras season. Pick your patterns and stock your shop for the upcoming season. Free Shipping on all Distributor Orders. You won’t ever find a price below this volume wholesale rate.

St.Monday Second Chance:

Life happens and sometimes you do lose your cool.

When you purchase a St. Monday Kerchief, you not only receive the finest and most beautiful handkerchief on the market, but you're also eligible for a St. Monday Second Chance. If you rip, tear or fray your beautiful St. Monday Kerchief, send it back and we'll replace it, free.

Sometimes life doesn't go as planned, and there's no reason to lose your cool about it. 

Why We Need You:

We’ve already invested nearly $10,000 of our own money to make this happen.

It’s a huge lift to bring a new product like this to market. When we hit and exceed our fundraising goal, all additional monies will go to generating more stock for our first production run, and setting up our online infrastructure to be a true direct to consumer brand. 

Risks and Challenges:

Risks to production are extremely low. 

We’ve already identified all production partners, systems, and have generated fully functional prototypes. Our managers have already founded and scaled apparel companies, and run businesses in the New Orleans area.

All we need is the capital to fund our first full production run. This isn’t our first rodeo!
story_txt:
UPDATE (12/04/2019)One extremely lucky supporter will WIN St. Monday Handkerchiefs for LIFE.Yes, even better than the Second Chance Program, is the opportunity to receive St. Monday Handkerchiefs for the rest of your natural life. You'll never lose your cool with St. Monday.Note: All levels of funding are eligible for entry. Number of handkerchiefs purchased is equal to number of entries in raffle. Raffle will be drawn on FINAL day of funding.  Why St. Monday?There's no reason to lose your cool in the heat.We make the world's best handkerchief that lets you keep dry while celebrating the art and culture you love (We're starting with New Orleans). Look your best, especially when it's hot out. We discovered the finest eco friendly Japanese quick drying fabrics and adorned them with custom New Orleans art.It's high fashion meeting high function.Our industry leading Second Chance Program means you won't be afraid to use your kerchief. If it rips, tears or frays, send it back to us and we'll replace it, free of charge.(Yeah, it's like you get a SECOND handkerchief for free.)Features:The St. Monday handkerchief is ultimate beauty and utility:
Custom art that celebrate New Orleans culture and design.
Japanese Hybrid Cotton: quick-dries instead of sopping into your clothing.
Eco-Friendly Material Production.
Hand finished edges with a tight 6-6 purl.
Small enough for a pocket, large enough to tie around the neck at A 42.5cm by 42.5cm square (that's 16.75 inches).

Our Second Chance Program: When you purchase your kerchief from St. Monday, you won't have to worry about your kerchief breaking or tearing. We fully cover any rip, tear, fade, or break for the lifetime of the kerchief. Just send us the kerchief back, and we'll send a new one in the mail to you. 
Our Origin StoryAs professionals, we started carrying handkerchiefs to beat the New Orleans Summer heat.Useful, high-end fabric can help polish your glasses, mop your brow, or accent a fun outfit or bag, but all current options look like rags, and are made from poor materials, like silk (functionally useless), cotton (cheap), or linen (soaks like a sponge!).There wasn’t anything ultra-premium or eco-friendly on the market that we wanted to use or carry around with us and show off during New Orleans summer. So we made it.Over a year of designing custom New Orleans patterns, sourcing materials, printers, and finishing details, and we’ve built the best handkerchief on the market (we say in the world).We're working with the industry leading experts at Privy Label, who ensure our materials and processes are ethically and expertly sourced and managed. It's beautiful New Orleans art (our founding city, but more cities to come!) printed on an eco friendly, ultra-soft hybrid-cotton that quick dries like a tech fabric but always feels like an ultra-premium silk.How We Wear St. Monday:Progress Roadmap:2018 - product ideation and art direction2019 - production partner identification & team structuringFall 2019 - supply chain setup and product finalization.NOVEMBER 2019 - Indiegogo launchDecember 2020 - Indiegogo fundedFebruary 2020 - manufacturing & quality control, rewards shippingMarch 2020 - direct to customer online salesRewards:St. Monday Forever ($15):Congrats! You're a founding supporter of the newest startup in New Orleans. Get on our email list and stay updated on all of the growth and happenings of our business. Described by the Washington Post as,  "A dazzling virtuosu," Daniel Lelchuk and The Lelchuk pattern is a celebration of culture and class. Having performed across the world with premier orchestras, Daniel resides in New Orleans as the Assistant Principle Cellist appointed under conductor Carlos Miguel Prieto. This piece, meant for both men and women, is inspired by New Orleans food and decadence and will go over well at the Crawfish Boil.Alan Brackett is ranked as one of The Best Lawyers in America and a Super Lawyer. Alan has developed a reputation as an extremely skilled litigation attorney, who maintains the highest standards of professionalism, qualities that have attributed to him being widely recognized as one of the top litigators in the industry. Not only was he a founding partner of the firm Moledoux, Bland, Legrand, and Brackett, but his commitment to community and Fraternity has led him to be a leading member of many New Orleans civic organizations. This piece is inspired by the iconic shotgun homes that characterize the city and celebrate the depth of our often spooky town.Mike Dalle Molle is an entrepreneur, co-Founder of GoodWood Nola, and Board President of The Green Project. His visionary wood and metalwork adorns and celebrates many of the newest restaurants and hotels in the city. Inspired by the character of the ironwork that covers Uptown and the French Quarter, the Dalle Molle is an homage to the expert craftsmanship that Mike Dalle Molle has dedicated his life to. The Kerchief Set, 3 Total ($88):If you're looking for a gift that represents the beauty of our city and functional style, but can't decide which one to choose from, you can support the full Kerchief Set and receive all 3 of our first run prints, The Lelchuk, The Brackett, and The Dalle Molle. The Best Gifter Ever, 10 Total ($266):Keep your office, home or friends looking stylish and cool because summer is coming. Pick how many of each pattern you like, and get the first run of St. Monday Kerchiefs!The Distributor, 30 total ($683):Run a shop, boutique or e-commerce site? Get stocked and ready for Mardi Gras season. Pick your patterns and stock your shop for the upcoming season. Free Shipping on all Distributor Orders.The Big Distributor, 50 Total ($963)Run a big shop, boutique or e-commerce site? Get stocked and ready for Mardi Gras season. Pick your patterns and stock your shop for the upcoming season. Free Shipping on all Distributor Orders. If you rip, tear or fray your beautiful St. Monday Kerchief, send it back and we'll replace it, free.Sometimes life doesn't go as planned, and there's no reason to lose your cool about it. Why We Need You:We’ve already invested nearly $10,000 of our own money to make this happen.It’s a huge lift to bring a new product like this to market. When we hit and exceed our fundraising goal, all additional monies will go to generating more stock for our first production run, and setting up our online infrastructure to be a true direct to consumer brand. Risks and Challenges:Risks to production are extremely low. We’ve already identified all production partners, systems, and have generated fully functional prototypes. story:
What are Stethies??

Stethies are high quality, lightweight stethoscopes that are:
  • Non-latex
  • Single lumen binaurals
  • 31” in length
  • 5.7 ounces
  • Comfortable, soft sealing ear tips
  • Ergonomically designed binaurals
  • Double sided, stainless steel chest piece with tuneable diaphragm (Adult/Pediatric)
  • Printing is permanent, colorfast and non toxic and is resistant to most household and industrial chemicals
And even though Stethies are fun to look at and pretty cool to wear, we are very serious about how they perform.  We have taken every measure to ensure that they not only brighten your world, but that they also perform under pressure. 

Who are we and how did we get here?

I am the creator of Stethies.  I am dedicated to bringing design, individuality, personal expression and reduced anxiety into the medical field. 

In conversations with friends and relatives in the medical profession, I became increasingly aware of concerns of white-coat hypertension, patient anxiety in both pediatric and adult patients, and uncooperative children. when patients are faced with healthcare professionals using traditional equipment. The need was so great, it couldn't be ignored. 

It was because of these concerns that I was inspired to create a stethoscope that not only would help with these issues, but that would also give those in the medical profession a creative outlet to allow them to express their individuality and bond with their patients. 

A stethoscope that could distract an anxious toddler from the exam itself, and engage them in something bright and fun to look at.  A stethoscope that could possibly help doctors and nurses bond with their patients. 

It was my love of humanity that sparked my Stethies endeavor. And it was my love of art that fueled the passion.

My goal is to simply make the world a brighter place; one Stethie at a time.

It’s been almost a year of perseverance and sheer determination. Through the months of research and testing, there have been minor disappointments but major victories.  As a result, I now have unique, high-quality, lightweight stethoscopes to offer the world: Stethies.

All That is Missing, Is You.

We've done 90% of the legwork to get Stethies into production. We've made solid progress in the last several months - our product design, engineering, and selection is complete. Now we need your help to bring Stethies to the rest of the world. $15,000 covers our initial manufacturing run, allowing us to bring Stethies to you.

Your investment will go towards the cost of manufacturing, packaging and shipping Stethies.

By backing our campaign, you'll be casting your vote to evolve hospitals, clinics, veterinarian and doctor's office beyond the typical, boring stethoscope. You will be helping everyone in the medical field express their individuality, show their team spirit, and even reduce patient anxiety in adults and children. It's a win win for everyone!


Why This Campaign?

We're crowdsourcing capital on Indiegogo to launch or first product run.

If you are among those bold, design-oriented individuals who crave the most innovative products available, you’ll love our Stethie. If you think it's a compelling concept, but don't really need a stethoscope, considering buying one and donating it to a local children's hospital.  What better way to pay it forward?

Risks & Challenges

This is our first Indiegogo campaign. We've spent many hours researching and preparing for the project. However, as with all new experiences we are ready to adapt and learn as we go. We feel the feedback and input of backers will provide us with any adaptations or changes needed though this process.

Any bumps we may hit along the way, you'll be the first to know. We'll inform you with a current status, why it's happening and how we're going to fix it. If at any point you have questions about our risks or challenges, give us a shout - we're happy to talk it through with you.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute, and we totally understand. You'll win a place in our hearts if you share our campaign on Facebook or Twitter, or simply tell your friends about our campaign to get people in motion. Because even if you can’t pay – you can always pay it forward.  We're grateful for any efforts on our behalf.

Special Reviews

RN Fernando Hernandex-Firmin, Church Point, LA - April 2016

"I had the honor of taking the Stethies for a test drive. The quality is great (very comparable to the most popular brand of stethoscope),  The designs are eye catching and actually get the patient to think about something else other than their visit at the office. The color is permanent and withstood cleaning with bleach, Lysol, alcohol, and Cabbie wipes commonly used in the hospital or office setting. Can rest assured that I will be a client..."

Special Thanks

I wouldn't be where I am today without Alexander Burdge at PSDI.  He has been my rock and my cheerleader from the initial conception of Stethies to now.  If anyone out there has a great idea, but doesn't know quite how to get started, give Alex a call.  I call him the miracle worker.  

Also, a special thank  you to my children, Dusty, Tasha, & Kaitlyn for being a constant sounding board while working through all the prototypes and design changes. And for your unending support and encouragement.
Thank you to my niece, Jennifer Moore and friends Terry & Fernando Fremin, and Pediatrician Dr. Mike Melancon, for being my professional consultants. 

We couldn't have made this awesome Indiegogo video on our own without the directive genius of Leo.

story:
We're growing, help make us AWESOME-er!


Circle your calendars on September 29, 2016 for our flagship event, Cirque-It: A Wearable-Tech Fashion Circus - the immersive and interactive event that showcases collective teams made up of wearable-tech “makers”/developers, fashion designers,and spectacle performers.


These teams work for months prior to the event to produce one-of-a-kind pieces that are innovative, stylish, and functional to be worn during sensational performances throughout the evening.


Where:  Toronto, ON  (for now, wink wink)

When:   September 29, 2016

Time:    7 p.m.


Entering our second year of production, Cirque-It serves as an action platform created to generate interest in the intersection of three industries: technology, fashion, and performing arts. See what we did last year and what more we’re doing this year: http://cirque-it.com





What happens after the event?

We're presently shaking babies and kissing hands with local facilities and academic institutions to introduce our teams to what's out there, locally, in order to maintain the momentum they have started.


Information is just the first step, we're really trying to broker a large-scale community partnership that we hope to benefit not only those currently in these industries but also for those who can go beyond them.  It's time to cross streams!


Cirque-It will be donating part of its event's proceeds to this year's youth artist initiative of choice, SKETCH; and it is produced by Noble Sky (a startup in interactive entertainment production); in addition to being a sitting resident project of Ryerson University's Transmedia Zone


Check out some of the PERKS we have to offer and with more to come!

story:
Made with extra soft fiber called, THE AMAZING BEANIES will give you esta winter warmth and protection, while bringing new hopes for a better quality of life and to pay impoverished called Communities of herders in the Andean highlands.


In Peru there are thousands of artisans who generate better income for her work with alpaca fiber.

For the last four years we Have developed methods to refine called hairs to incredible softness. With an obsessive commitment to quality and nature on our side, we created products That are not only beautiful, but technically superior to any man-made materials ..


The luxury fiber Alpaca is one of the main sources of identity and wealth that Peru has. This animal is clearly Peruvian, inhabits the Andes, and in recent years its fiber has opened one of the most promising markets in textiles. Its high quality offers possibilities that Peru increase its production, export and consolidation as the source of alpaca highest quality in the world. We analyze how microeconomics can give us a brief information on the type of good that is, its price elasticity and the opportunity cost of the factors affecting the production of alpaca fiber.


We are convinced our products will enchant responsible Thousands of Consumers like you. The growth of our industry will result in a steady demand of raw fiber flame, Purchased at fair price Directly from the impoverished farmers called. This will Improve the quality of Their Lives and Encourage them to raise more flames.

No extra charge for shipping to the world outside

We want people from all over the world wearing THE AMAZING BEANIES

story:
Your Wallet at Your Fingertip

TOUCHdown is a virtual wallet that uses your fingerprint as a password.

  • Ever lose your wallet?  We have.  We know the anxiety of trying to find it.
  • Ever been robbed?  Us, too.  It's terrifying.
  • Has your identity been stolen? Ours has and we know the frustration of dealing with the aftermath.
  • Wish there was a better way to deal with carrying around a wallet/handbag? We did and that’s why we created TOUCHdown

TOUCHdown is the result of working with a diverse group of individuals who shared their visions of what their ideal wallet would be. 

  • We envision freedom from carrying your wallet so you can go anywhere without worrying about what's inside of it. 
  • We focus on security, which is why we are compliant in all measures. Our security includes, but is not limited to, encryption at rest and in transit, one-time transaction tokens, 24/7 security monitoring, and much more. 
  • We want it to be convenient and easy to use.  All you need is to swipe your finger on the reader.
  • We want privacy for our transactions and customers.  Targeted ads make us feel like someone is watching what we do.

How It Works

1. Swipe or press down your fingerprint on a TOUCHdown merchant's fingerprint reader. Your name, date of birth and selfie will pop up on their TOUCHdown tablet.

2. Swipe the screen to the right and the merchant can then see your verified government ID.

3. Swipe the screen again to the right and you'll get to the payment page.

4. Press the drop-down menu and choose which card you'd like to use in your virtual wallet.

5. Press send. It's really that convenient!

What We Need From You

We want to change the world by fighting identity fraud through our secure fingerprint-accessed wallet. We chose the crowdfunding platform so we can raise funds for our security measures and official release. Crowdfunding allows us to maintain our vision of a secure, privacy-oriented product that doesn't compromise the information our customers entrust with us. No unwanted advertising, no tracking, no information sold. 


Frequently Asked Questions

What is TOUCHdown?

TOUCHdown is a virtual wallet that is designed for privacy-minded people who want freedom from the “stuff” you have to carry for transactions, such as credit cards, debit cards and identification cards.

To use TOUCHdown, the user swipes their finger or touches down on an approved, secure fingerprint reader to open their virtual wallet and select a card to pay with. This can be done at any merchant location that uses TOUCHdown, including online merchants.


How do I join TOUCHdown? What’s the process?

Our Indiegogo campaign is a platform that will allow you to "pre-sign up." You can purchase a TOUCHdown membership now and then sign up later when we're at locations near you (and/or at online merchants).

Once we create our online membership platform, a new user can enroll online with TOUCHdown with a government issued ID for verification, a selfie, the credit/debit cards they normally use, and fingerprint samples. Once enrolled, the new TOUCHdown user can transact anywhere TOUCHdown is used.

How does it work? What can I do with it?

To use TOUCHdown, the user swipes their finger or touches down on an approved fingerprint reader to open their virtual wallet and select a card to pay with. This can be done at any merchant location that uses TOUCHdown, including online merchants.

For now, TOUCHdown can be used for id verification and to make purchases.  We are also working on exciting possibilities for the future.

I have a fingerprint that is really hard for readers to detect.  Oftentimes it doesn’t get scanned at all.  Does your system have provisions for that?

There are some instances where a person’s fingerprint can’t be read. This can be caused by dry fingers, wet fingers, dirty fingers, a worn finger surface, poor finger placement, pressure on the sensor, or contaminants on the sensor surface—conditions that are common in real world use. These instances can be averted by using a multi-spectral reader. Multi spectral readers are the most accurate in capturing images and are the readers we recommend for commercial entities.

Where can I buy a fingerprint reader to use for online purchases and to sign up?

We are an authorized reseller of many different readers that can be used for TOUCHdown and we only carry readers that we feel are valuable in cost and performance. You can purchase a fingerprint reader (or several!) through our Indiegogo campaign. We have readers that work with Android devices (Lollipop) and PCs. We are compatible with and carry the following:

  1. Digital Persona U are U 400 X
  2. Authentic WBF readers
  3. Broadcom
  4. Cogent CS0200
  5. Crossmatch verifier 300 USB
  6. Digent FD1000
  7. Futronic FS80/FS88
  8. Integrated Biometrics
  9. Identix DFR500
  10. Identix DFR500FB
  11. Koehlke
  12. Lumidigm
  13. Next Biometrics NB-1010 U
  14. Precise 200/250
  15. Sagem 1300/1350
  16. SecuGenWBF Readers
  17. Suprema BioMini/Plus/S20
  18. Validity WBF Readers
  19. UPEK Swipe (Eikon)
  20. UPEK TouchChip

Is there an interface or an app for connecting accounts?

Within the TOUCHdown network, your fingerprint will be your key to any of the services or places on our network. We are exploring options for linking other accounts to your TOUCHdown account without affecting your privacy or security.

How is it safe?

TOUCHdown protects both data at rest and in transit. For security purposes, we won’t reveal our methods of protection. However, we assure you that we use industry best practices for security. Our ultimate standard is for our customers’ information to be secure and private.

How is TOUCHdown different from other virtual wallets?

The most notable difference between TOUCHdown and mobile wallets is that it doesn’t require a device.  Users truly have a way to pay without having to carry a phone, wallet or card.

An important difference from the merchant standpoint is TOUCHdown offers more security from fraud; fingerprint identification equipment at the POS deters fraudsters from attempting to make purchases. We also use multi-factor authentication at the POS so the merchant can identify their customer.

Can it work with Google Wallet, Apple Pay or Paypal?

No, Google Wallet and Apple Pay are both mobile wallets that use a smartphone (Android or iOs) for payments. PayPal, like TOUCHdown, is a digital wallet but requires user login for access, whereas the key to access your TOUCHdown account is your unique fingerprint.

Does TOUCHdown insure against fraud?

TOUCHdown is committed to fighting fraud and makes every effort to prevent fraud from occurring. However, because there are so many factors involved in fraud, we cannot reasonably insure against it.

Where can I use it?

TOUCHdown can potentially be used anywhere one might need an ID or wish to make a purchase.  We are always looking for new venues to carry TOUCHdown and welcome users’ suggestions.  We are currently setting up a rewards program for merchant referrals. Please follow us on Facebook or Twitter for future details on our rewards program.

How much does it cost? Is there a free trial?

There is a one-time enrollment fee of $25 ($20 during our IndieGogo launch period) with a 3-month trial period. After that, there is a monthly fee of $10.

I purchased the enrollment on your IndieGogo page. Do I have to sign up right away?

No. We are building a network of merchants online and in your area. Want to be a part of the “excelling your life” movement?  Let us know where you’d like to use TOUCHdown. We will be offering a merchant referral rewards program.

If you purchase an enrollment on our Indiegogo campaign, your account won’t expire and you can sign up whenever you’re ready. Once we have enough online and in-store merchants using TOUCHdown, we will start allowing the sign-up process to happen. Think of our Indiegogo campaign as a “pre-sign-up.”

I don’t have a credit or debit card. Can I still use TOUCHdown?

Yes, you can still use the ID verification features. We are also working on adding other options for your TOUCHdown account in the future.

What if I’m having a problem with my account? Do you have tech support?

Yes, we are in the process of hiring a knowledgeable and friendly 24-7 team. In the meanwhile, if you have any questions about TOUCHdown or our policies, please contact us here.


Merchant FAQs
story_txt:
Your Wallet at Your FingertipTOUCHdown is a virtual wallet that uses your fingerprint as a password.


Ever lose your
wallet?  We have.  We know the anxiety of trying to find it.


Ever been robbed?  Us, too. 
It's terrifying.


Has your identity been stolen? Ours has and we know the frustration of dealing with the aftermath.


Wish there was a
better way to deal with carrying around a wallet/handbag? We
did and that’s why we created TOUCHdown


TOUCHdown is the result of working with
a diverse group of individuals who shared their visions of what their ideal wallet would be. 

We envision freedom from carrying
your wallet so you can go anywhere without worrying about what's inside of it. 

We focus on security, which is why we are compliant in all measures. Our security includes, but is not limited to, encryption at rest and in transit, one-time transaction tokens, 24/7 security monitoring, and much more. 

We want it to be
convenient and easy to use.  All you need
is to swipe your finger on the reader.


We want privacy for our
transactions and customers.  Targeted ads make us feel like someone is watching what we do.




How It Works

1. Swipe or press down your fingerprint on a TOUCHdown merchant's fingerprint reader. Your name, date of birth and selfie will pop up on their TOUCHdown tablet.

2. Swipe the screen to the right and the merchant can then see your verified government ID.





3. Swipe the screen again to the right and you'll get to the payment page.




4. Press the drop-down menu and choose which card you'd like to use in your virtual wallet.



5. Press send. It's really that convenient!

    What We Need From You

We want to change the world by fighting identity fraud through our secure fingerprint-accessed wallet. We chose the crowdfunding platform so we can raise funds for our security measures and official release. Crowdfunding allows us to maintain our vision of a secure, privacy-oriented product that doesn't compromise the information our customers entrust with us. No unwanted advertising, no tracking, no information sold. 




Frequently Asked Questions

What is TOUCHdown?
TOUCHdown is a virtual wallet that is designed for privacy-minded people who want freedom from the “stuff” you have to carry for transactions, such as credit cards, debit cards and identification cards.
To use TOUCHdown, the user swipes their finger or touches down on an approved, secure fingerprint reader to open their virtual wallet and select a card to pay with. This can be done at any merchant location that uses TOUCHdown, including online merchants.



How do I join TOUCHdown? What’s the process?
Our Indiegogo campaign is a platform that will allow you to "pre-sign up." You can purchase a TOUCHdown membership now and then sign up later when we're at locations near you (and/or at online merchants).
Once we create our online membership platform, a new user can enroll online with TOUCHdown with a government issued ID for verification, a selfie, the credit/debit cards they normally use, and fingerprint samples. Once enrolled, the new TOUCHdown user can transact anywhere TOUCHdown is used.
How does it work? What can I do with it?
To use TOUCHdown, the user swipes their finger or touches down on an approved fingerprint reader to open their virtual wallet and select a card to pay with. This can be done at any merchant location that uses TOUCHdown, including online merchants.
For now, TOUCHdown can be used for id verification and to make purchases.  We are also working on exciting possibilities for the future.
I have a fingerprint that is really hard for readers to detect.  Oftentimes it doesn’t get scanned at all.  Does your system have provisions for that?
There are some instances where a person’s fingerprint can’t be read. This can be caused by dry fingers, wet fingers, dirty fingers, a worn finger surface, poor finger placement, pressure on the sensor, or contaminants on the sensor surface—conditions that are common in real world use. These instances can be averted by using a multi-spectral reader. Multi spectral readers are the most accurate in capturing images and are the readers we recommend for commercial entities.
Where can I buy a fingerprint reader to use for online purchases and to sign up?
We are an authorized reseller of many different readers that can be used for TOUCHdown and we only carry readers that we feel are valuable in cost and performance. You can purchase a fingerprint reader (or several!) through our Indiegogo campaign. We have readers that work with Android devices (Lollipop) and PCs. We are compatible with and carry the following:

Digital Persona U are U 400 X
Authentic WBF readers
Broadcom
Cogent CS0200
Crossmatch verifier 300 USB
Digent FD1000
Futronic FS80/FS88
Integrated Biometrics
Identix DFR500
Identix DFR500FB
Koehlke
Lumidigm
Next Biometrics NB-1010 U
Precise 200/250
Sagem 1300/1350
SecuGenWBF Readers
Suprema BioMini/Plus/S20
Validity WBF Readers
UPEK Swipe (Eikon)
UPEK TouchChip

Is there an interface or an app for connecting accounts?
Within the TOUCHdown network, your fingerprint will be your key to any of the services or places on our network. We are exploring options for linking other accounts to your TOUCHdown account without affecting your privacy or security.
How is it safe?
TOUCHdown protects both data at rest and in transit. For security purposes, we won’t reveal our methods of protection. However, we assure you that we use industry best practices for security. Our ultimate standard is for our customers’ information to be secure and private.
How is TOUCHdown different from other virtual wallets?
The most notable difference between TOUCHdown and mobile wallets is that it doesn’t require a device.  Users truly have a way to pay without having to carry a phone, wallet or card.
An important difference from the merchant standpoint is TOUCHdown offers more security from fraud; fingerprint identification equipment at the POS deters fraudsters from attempting to make purchases. We also use multi-factor authentication at the POS so the merchant can identify their customer.
Can it work with Google Wallet, Apple Pay or Paypal?
No, Google Wallet and Apple Pay are both mobile wallets that use a smartphone (Android or iOs) for payments. PayPal, like TOUCHdown, is a digital wallet but requires user login for access, whereas the key to access your TOUCHdown account is your unique fingerprint.
Does TOUCHdown insure against fraud?
TOUCHdown is committed to fighting fraud and makes every effort to prevent fraud from occurring. However, because there are so many factors involved in fraud, we cannot reasonably insure against it.
Where can I use it?
TOUCHdown can potentially be used anywhere one might need an ID or wish to make a purchase.  We are always looking for new venues to carry TOUCHdown and welcome users’ suggestions.  We are currently setting up a rewards program for merchant referrals. Please follow us on Facebook or Twitter for future details on our rewards program.


How much does it cost? Is there a free trial?
There is a one-time enrollment fee of $25 ($20 during our IndieGogo launch period) with a 3-month trial period. After that, there is a monthly fee of $10.
I purchased the enrollment on your IndieGogo page. Do I have to sign up right away?
No. We are building a network of merchants online and in your area. Want to be a part of the “excelling your life” movement?  Let us know where you’d like to use TOUCHdown. We will be offering a merchant referral rewards program.
If you purchase an enrollment on our Indiegogo campaign, your account won’t expire and you can sign up whenever you’re ready. Once we have enough online and in-store merchants using TOUCHdown, we will start allowing the sign-up process to happen. Think of our Indiegogo campaign as a “pre-sign-up.”
I don’t have a credit or debit card. Can I still use TOUCHdown?
Yes, you can still use the ID verification features. We are also working on adding other options for your TOUCHdown account in the future.
What if I’m having a problem with my account? Do you have tech support?
Yes, we are in the process of hiring a knowledgeable and friendly 24-7 team. In the meanwhile, if you have any questions about TOUCHdown or our policies, please contact us here.


Merchant FAQs

story:
Story:

The X2 Slimmy is a decisively minimal wallet designed to carry only what you need. Equipped with unique 2-way RFID providing both protection and access. Made from full grain US steer hide and available in other premium leathers. Slimness: .240” (6.1 mm).

The Original Slimmy launched as a tasteful slim wallet alternative to traditional billfolds and trifolds. These traditional wallets for men offer too much room, which inevitably end up getting crammed full of “stuff” that one does not need on an everyday basis. We liberated men from EDC (everyday carry) pocket bulge, and overtime noticed more and more women buying and using a Slimmy.

It is clear that slim wallet envy is gender blind. By no means have men cornered the uncluttered, everyday carry domain. More and more women are ditching their purses for a slim wallet. And why carry a purse when you end up carrying half your man’s EDC during a night on the town?


Updated with a compact 2 pocket, 1 slot design, new colors, premium leather options, and rounded corners, it is the perfect unisex wallet. Envied by discriminating men and women minimalists worldwide - Slimmy.

The X2 Slimmy was created based on input from backers from a previous (successful) crowdfunding campaign. And we want to keep the momentum going! Please click on the gallery tab for another video used for this project, which provides more product information.

Highlights:


Specs:

Made from full grain USA heavy native steer hide, and by a 4th generation leather maker.

  • Dressed Leather (Black, Blue).
  • Antique Leather: Taking on darker tones based on how you handle and carry it.  
  • Oil Tanned Leather (OTL) Dark Red.
  • Horween Genuine Shell Cordovan is the art of tanning at its finest.

Size Options

All X2 Slimmy Redux wallet come in two sizes (Slimmy 1 or 2) depending on your front pocket EDC needs.

Slimmy 1: W: 3.875” (98.44 mm) L: 2.69” (68.28 mm). Designed compact for less-cash minimalists. For normal use, fold cash into thirds and completely tuck into the Slimmy 1. When carrying more bills, fold in half and they will stick ever so slightly out the top. RFID access and protection ready.

Slimmy 2: - W: 4.125” (104.78 mm) L: 3.125” (79.38 mm). Designed for those who carry more cash and larger size international bank notes. 100, 200 and 500 Euro bills will not fit perfectly. Other Euro banknotes okay. RFID access and protection ready.

How Much Can a Slimmy Hold?

Carry Option:

X2: 2-pocket design with two side slots. More compact than the X3 View Slimmy 3-pocket design, while offering more in-wallet organization than the ultra-thin X1 Slimmy Wallet 1-pocket option. Slimness: .240” (6.1 mm).

X2 Slimmy 1:  3.875” (98mm) x 2.69 (68) x .240 (6)

X2 Slimmy 2:  4.125” (105 mm) x 3.125” (79) x .240” (6.1)

What We Need & What You Get

The design and prototype work are complete for the X2 Slimmy. Funds from this project will be used to purchase materials and cover labor costs for a larger production run. That's where the funds from this Indiegogo project come in. 
For your pledge we will be offering you an X2 Slimmy of your choice. Early adopters can take advantage of discounted pricing, and you will be getting your Slimmy ahead of the general public release.

X2 Slimmy Offering:


For more images click here.
Project

Coming off of a successful Kickstarter campaign, we can add onto our current production run (in progress) instead of starting a new one. Importantly, this will also help us expand our reach and grow, opening opportunities to develop new unisex EDC products. Rather than spending unnecessarily in traditional advertising, you can also help us save precious dollars that can be used for R&D.

All of the design work and prototyping are complete, as the first round of manufacturing will be commence shipping next week. If we can get your reward to you sooner than August, we will be sure to do so!

Risks & Challenges

Having already done two successful Kickstarter projects, as well as backing several others, I know “stuff” happens. No project I have done or backed has been on time. Therefore, I would rather give a realistic delivery date and do our best to beat it, rather than rush things through. I will be working closely with our manufacturer to do my best to keep this project on track. Importantly we are already in production, so a lot of wrinkles in the process have been ironed out.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you do not decide to back my project, you can help us spread the good minimalist word:

  • Share this project with prospective friends and family members.
  • Share to the general public via social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin  and SnapChat).
  • Reach out to bloggers and local media!
  • Send us good minimalist energy...

About Jay

I am the founder and president of Koyono Co. based in Cleveland, OH, and obsessed with a streamlined everyday carry experience. Importantly, I do believe in the notion that the products we use, and how we use them, say a lot about who we are.  In 2014 I successfully completed the Bolstr EDC Bag Kickstarter. It is clear that there are many people, like me, who want to declutter. Making life on-the-go more fluid. I look forward to bringing more ideas to this powerful, engaging and generous community.

Help me get the word out about the X2 Slimmy Project and thank you all for backing my Indiegogo project. I really appreciate it. Keep spreading the good minimalist word so other men and women can Slimmy their wallet!

Thank you,

Jay

Credits

Actor:  Amanda Jordan Jones - instagram.com/amandajordanjones/
Actor: Dylan Rea - instagram.com/dylantrea/
Actor/Director/Photographer: Jay Yoo - jayyoo.com
Location: Ninja City - ninjacity.com
Video Production: Connor Elder - connorelder.com (Slim Wallet Envy)
Video Production: Purple Films - purple-films.com (Slimmy: The Ultimate Slim Wallet with 2-Way RFID)

story:
I am going to intern for WIL Uganda - a small grassroots organisation working to empower and educate women and girls in rural Uganda.


The problems women and girls are facing in Uganda:

Due to cultural norms with women expected to be home-makers, and the prevalence of teen pregnancies, teen marriages, and forced marriages in Uganda (particularly in the rural areas), girls are often denied the basic right to education. This prevents them from being actively involved in their communities and even from being able to provide for themselves and their families.

Statistics show that if every woman were to finish secondary school there would be fewer child deaths, less malnutrition, more educated children, and stronger economies.

Women are key in the development of their communities as a whole; not educating women means losing the potential of many valuable society members, which affects everyone.


What does WIL Uganda do to help?

WIL Uganda works with education as the key to solving many of the problems faced by girls and communities in rural Uganda. The education programmes cover literacy, business skills, leadership, sexual reproductive health, rights and advocacy among others. This is with the hope of empowering and protecting girls and giving them the chance to become future leaders, and active in the development of their communities.

Creating sustainable incomes

Recently WIL Uganda began running a Crafts Programme which teaches women and girls to make traditional hand crafted jewellery which they can sell in local markets or online as individuals or as part of a group. This is the programme which I will be mostly involved with during my time in Busembatia. 


The programme gives the women practical and entrepreneurial skills and enables them to create a sustainable income, giving them greater independence and the ability to provide for their families.
One woman, Irene, has been able to use the money that she made from the  BaNyabo jewellery sales to send her daughter to school. This demonstrates the project's far-reaching potential for positive impact. 

The jewellery is sustainably made using recycled paper. A purchase from here in the UK can have a massive impact on the womens' lives. Here is a link to the group shop on Etsy if you would like to see some of the products made by the ladies' involved in the programme: https://www.etsy.com/shop/BaNyabo?ref=l2-shopheader-name

During my time with WIL Uganda I will be helping to teach the ladies to make the crafts and developing the programme as a whole in order to bring them further successes and leave them with valuable life skills.


Why I need your help

I need to raise £300 to cover some of my in-country expenses provided by WIL Uganda, and obviously to continue and expand the amazing work done by the organisation. The more I can raise above my target, the more can go directly into developing projects. 


Any donations, however small, are greatly appreciated! 

Please help me to reach my goal.


To find out more about WIL Uganda and for updates on their work see the website:
http://wiluganda.co.uk
and Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/WILUganda/?fref=ts

story:
What is Slow Fashion?

Slow Fashion is a movement that encompasses sustainable apparel and provides a broader view, involving consumer awareness of the whole process of design to production, through to use and then re-use. Its growth hinges on a shifting of heart and attitude towards the way we consume clothing. From an attitude of carelessness, ignorance and waste to one of stewardship, intention and pleasure in simple, valuable everyday experiences. This shift will take time and effort, but through steady commitment on the part of designer-makers and educators, awareness will grow.

About Meraki KL

Based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, Meraki KL is a womenswear label aiming to inspire and give back to the environment and community. Our mission is to present consumers with designs that are fashionable, ethically produced, and spread awareness on the Slow Fashion movement across Southeast Asia, starting with our home country. We are also committed in helping small or big charities raise funds. RM10 from each piece we produce will be donated to the selected beneficiary which changes every collection.

At Meraki KL, we work with ONLY ethical factories. From our fabric supplier and even our tailors. All our production and branding materials are made locally, and none are outsourced to other countries. The two people behind Meraki KL, co-owners Hanis and Arisha, will handle all designing, fabric hunting and delivery of garments to customers.

*For our pre-debut collection, our beneficiary was the Welfare Association of Children with HIV/AIDS Malaysia.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal covers only start-up costs to help us get on our feet. Your contribution will help launch a brand that promises to never take the environment for granted, to always give back to the community and to continue delivering great products of great quality throughout its existence.

$3,000 will cover our start-up expenses which includes:

  • A Shopify store
  • A theme for our website
  • Our branding materials (Name cards, thank you cards, hangtags, labels and custom Meraki box)
  • Pre-launch campaign*
  • Order 6 sets of different 100 yards of fabric from our fabric supplier to qualify for wholesale rates = 600 yards of fabric
  • Hire factory and local seamstress
  • Any extra investment will be allocated for advertising and shipping expenses

*We are all about empowerment here at Meraki KL. Nothing beats the pleasure of helping each other flourish and inspire others to pursue their dreams. Our pre-launch campaign will be #knowyourworth. We plan to get influencers to join our movement and to create brand awareness. We want to have custom made temporary tattoos with our tag line #knowyourworth which will be given to the influencers. The influencers will then post a picture(s) on Instagram of them proudly wearing our temporary tattoo with a caption on what they are worth. For example:

“I am more than the things people say about me. #knowyourworth #merakikl”.

With influencers posting and tagging our Instagram page in their posts, we hope they can drive traffic to our page and website and get everyone to know more about slow fashion!

Risks & Challenges

For many, “fast fashion” is the only type of fashion they know. When you think “fast fashion”, you can think disposable, short-lived and cheap; seasonal change, image glorification, and mass marketing; mass production, quantity, standardization and identical product; mediocre quality, lack of meaning and value, international acceptance and global homogenization. While the conditions for garment workers in Southeast Asia may not exactly mirror those in Bangladesh, many similar issues exist. Especially in countries like Vietnam and Cambodia which also have large-scale garment production.

Public awareness of ethical fashion issues is still in its infancy in Malaysia. Most producers, designers, and consumers have not even been exposed to the idea of questioning who made their clothes and under what conditions. When they are, there is a resigned view that accounting for sustainability in their supply chains will make their products commercially unattractive. Consumers here are not curious about who makes their clothing, how much they are being paid and in what condition these people have to work in. It is time to make them curious, help them see and realise what goes on in the back room, and make a change. Our hope is that people will be so enamored with the beauty and virtue of Slow Fashion’s principles and product that they will forget about the less satisfying alternative of fast fashion.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you are not able to contribute for various reasons, but that’s okay. You can still help us, here’s how:

  • Help us reach someone who can contribute
  • Get the word out and make some noise about Meraki KL or Slow Fashion
  • Help share our Indiegogo campaign with the Indiegogo share tools

As we get up and running, we will also be looking for brand ambassadors and influencers with whom we will collaborate, grow and ultimately contribute the same values as we do. Thank you so much for taking the time to hear us out, we really appreciate it.
story_txt:
What is Slow Fashion?
Slow Fashion is a
movement that encompasses sustainable apparel and provides a broader view,
involving consumer awareness of the whole process of design to production,
through to use and then re-use. Its growth hinges on a shifting of heart and
attitude towards the way we consume clothing. From an attitude of carelessness,
ignorance and waste to one of stewardship, intention and pleasure in simple,
valuable everyday experiences. This shift will take time and effort, but
through steady commitment on the part of designer-makers and educators,
awareness will grow.
About Meraki KL
Based in Kuala
Lumpur, Malaysia, Meraki KL is a womenswear label aiming to inspire and give
back to the environment and community. Our mission is to present consumers with
designs that are fashionable, ethically produced, and spread
awareness on the Slow Fashion movement across Southeast Asia, starting with
our home country. We are also committed in helping small or big charities raise
funds. RM10 from each piece we produce will be donated to the selected
beneficiary which changes every collection.
At Meraki KL, we
work with ONLY ethical factories. From our fabric supplier and even our
tailors. All our production and branding materials are made locally, and none
are outsourced to other countries. The two people behind Meraki KL, co-owners
Hanis and Arisha, will handle all designing, fabric hunting and delivery of
garments to customers.
*For our pre-debut
collection, our beneficiary was the Welfare Association of Children with
HIV/AIDS Malaysia. 
What We Need & What You Get
Our goal covers only
start-up costs to help us get on our feet. Your contribution will help launch a
brand that promises to never take the environment for granted, to always give
back to the community and to continue delivering great products of great quality
throughout its existence.
$3,000 will cover
our start-up expenses which includes:


A Shopify store


A theme for our website

Our branding materials (Name cards, thank you
cards, hangtags, labels and custom Meraki box)
Pre-launch campaign*

Order 6 sets of different 100 yards of fabric
from our fabric supplier to qualify for wholesale rates = 600 yards of fabric


Hire factory and local seamstress


Any extra investment will be allocated for
advertising and shipping expenses


*We are all about
empowerment here at Meraki KL. Nothing beats the pleasure of helping each other
flourish and inspire others to pursue their dreams. Our pre-launch campaign will
be #knowyourworth. We plan to get influencers to join our movement and to create
brand awareness. We want to have custom made temporary tattoos with our tag
line #knowyourworth which will be given to the influencers. The influencers
will then post a picture(s) on Instagram of them proudly wearing our temporary
tattoo with a caption on what they are worth. For example:
“I am
more than the things people say about me. #knowyourworth #merakikl”.
With influencers
posting and tagging our Instagram page in their posts, we hope they can drive
traffic to our page and website and get everyone to know more about slow
fashion!
Risks & Challenges
For many, “fast
fashion” is the only type of fashion they know. When you think “fast fashion”,
you can think disposable, short-lived and cheap; seasonal change, image
glorification, and mass marketing; mass production, quantity, standardization
and identical product; mediocre quality, lack of meaning and value,
international acceptance and global homogenization. While the conditions for
garment workers in Southeast Asia may not exactly mirror those in Bangladesh,
many similar issues exist. Especially in countries like Vietnam and Cambodia
which also have large-scale garment production. 
Public awareness of
ethical fashion issues is still in its infancy in Malaysia. Most producers,
designers, and consumers have not even been exposed to the idea of questioning
who made their clothes and under what conditions. When they are, there is a
resigned view that accounting for sustainability in their supply chains will
make their products commercially unattractive. Consumers here are not curious
about who makes their clothing, how much they are being paid and in what
condition these people have to work in. It is time to make them curious, help them see
and realise what goes on in the back room, and make a change. Our hope is that
people will be so enamored with the beauty and virtue of Slow Fashion’s
principles and product that they will forget about the less satisfying
alternative of fast fashion.
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand if you
are not able to contribute for various reasons, but that’s okay. You can still
help us, here’s how:


Help us reach someone who can contribute


Get the word out and make some noise about
Meraki KL or Slow Fashion


Help share our Indiegogo campaign with the
Indiegogo share tools


As we get up and
running, we will also be looking for brand ambassadors and influencers with
whom we will collaborate, grow and ultimately contribute the same values as we
do. Thank you so much for taking the time to hear us out, we really appreciate
it.

story:
Hi Indiegogo,
Even if we say they don't, first impressions matter! When you're meeting someone, the first thing they learn about you is what you look like. We at Lureaux understand that people tend to make assumptions about you because of what you wear. We designed our shoes to enable people to convey the right message by simply wearing our shoes. Many people wear the same boring shoes and miss the opportunity to say: "Hi there, I am not mediocre!". Don't be trapped in mediocrity. Dare to be different, wear Lureaux Shoes! 

Idea and Inspiration
About one year ago I, Bas, was looking for a unique dress shoe. These shoes were available to some extent, but they were really expensive. In my opinion it shouldn’t be expensive to express yourself through the things you wear. This was the day that I got the idea to create a unique dress shoe that is affordable for everyone. Subsequently, I approached an old friend, Femke, because I knew she was the right designer to work with. Femke is also very in to fashion, something we at Lureaux consider as important as well. She was very enthusiastic and had a lot of inspiration. She came with dozens of sketches and ideas. Besides drawing and designing, Femke loves to travel to foreign countries which is also an important source of inspiration. 

Lureaux Shoes
Our designs range from special to extraordinary and everything in between. Lureaux Shoes contain high quality materials. The shoes are manufactured in an environment with high ethical working standards. This was tested by third-parties as well as by ourselves. The high quality of the materials make it possible to wear the shoes on a daily base. Most designer shoes are very expensive. Besides designing awesome shoes, our goal was to make our collection affordable for everyone. This also makes the shoe ideal to wear to a job interview or party.

Our Models
Ostrich


Ostrich Cognac


Army Green



Army Blue


Paint Dark Blue


Paint Light Blue


Style Black


Funk

Pre-Indiegogo
It took a lot of  time and resources for our team to come to this point. First of all, we had to design models, make a promo video, source materials, look for partners and so on. At this point, we succesfully completed our Kickstarter campaign. For this, we improved the quality of the shoes and also had to design and manufacture shoeboxes for example.  

We structured the initial proces of this project as follows. First, we started sketching and designing. We took a lot of time for this stage, since this will determine our brand image.  Only the best designs were selected to make sample shoes from. We composed a shortlist of 10 manufacturers that were recommended by different trade unions and close contacts in this industry and asked the manufacturers to produce the samples based on our designs. We ranked the suppliers on different criteria that were set in advance such as quality of the materials used, service, support, timely delivery and ethical work environment. The manufacturer that ranked the highest on all criteria was selected. This manufacturer became our partner and has already produced a high quality batch of shoes for our Kickstarter backers.


Why Indiegogo? 
After finishing a very succesful Kickstarter Campaign, it is  time to give you and the Indiegogo community an opportunity to get a fresh pair of Lureaux Shoes. We at Lureaux really love crowdfunding. In this way, we get loads of feedback. We can test how popular each design is, what we need to improve and so on. This information reduces the risk of ending up with stock that will not be sold. In return, we reward you with a discount on the newest Lureaux Shoes. The Indiegogo community could give us a boost to build a unique brand. If our goal is reached, we are able to build a stock level of Lureaux Shoes that allows us to fulfill orders of our almost finished online shop. This online shop is now under construction and is expected to go live in July. The amount of funding will be used to cover manufacturing and shipping cost of the new batch. Of course, we won't be able to cover our own fee and the design costs for example. But backing us means that you give us an opportunity to grow and hopefully in this way we can cover all costs in the future. If you back us, we will reward you with attractive discounts and the possibility to stand out by wearing Lureaux Shoes. For a more detailed description of the rewards, please read the text below.

Rewards 
As explained above, we reward our backers with attractive discounts. The earlier you back us, the more money you save. We have all sort of deals for you, so pick the one that you like! Do you want only one pair of shoes? Then we have the following deals for you:


Do you want two pairs of Lureaux Shoes? Then we have the following deals for you:


Do you want three pairs of Lureaux Shoes? Then we have the following deals for you:


Timeline
Our Campaign runs 40 days and as explained above, the earlier you back us, the more discount you get! See the timeline below to see when what to expect when in the coming period.


Post-Indiegogo
After our goal is reached and the campaign has ended, we will send you a survey to ask your size(s) and preferred model(s). Also, we will send you more interesting information about our models. This allows you to choose your preferred size and model(s). You can choose any model that you've seen on this page (and possibly more). After you completed the survey, we will start to manufacture your shoes as soon as possible. 

Size Chart
We use European sizes, please take a look at the size chart below and choose your size.

Risks and Challenges
The risk for this project, if any, is very low. To illustrate this: we already wear the shoes ourselves. Moreover, we succesfully ran a campaign on Kickstarter and managed to solve the corresponding logistical challenges.
The only risk, if any, would be that you order a size that slightly deviates from your actual size. To solve this, we are currently looking for ways to set up an international reverse logistics network that allows us to accept reverse logistics from anywhere in the world. Untill then, please contact us when it turns out that you ordered a size that doesn't fit.In this way, we can help you to solve this issue. Another risk is that we cannot deliver on the actual delivery date due to unforeseen circumstances. We emphasize that we already managed to solve the logistical challenges and we expect to deliver the shoes on (or even before) the promised delivery date. However, if the delivery date will be postponed we will directly inform our backers. Also, if it is possible to deliver the shoes before the planned delivery date, we will ask whether it is preferred to have the shoes delivered earlier. Moreover, every update that might be interesting for our backers will be shared. Lastly, we promise that we will do everything to meet and exceed your expectation!
It's time to BACK US
First of all, thank you for your time. We hope that you will you back us by pre-ordering one or more pairs of Lureaux Shoes. Please feel free to contact us at info@lureaux.com if  you have further questions. Lastly, if you can't back us, you can still help us by sharing our project page :)

story:
THE TALE OF THE IDIOT is a self-produced short film adapted and inspired by the novel "More than Human" by Theodore Sturgeon.

Directed by Seth Morley set design by DEM

The film is finished and now we are preparing for the final stages of production (sound mix and color correction) and the distribution on the film festival circuit.
We ask your contribution to support the final stages of production of the film.

20€ T-SHIRT LIMITED EDITION of the film "The Tale of the Idiot"

A black shirt in organic cotton with one color (Gold) hand made silk-screen printing designed by Leon Ka

Limited edition of 111 t-shirts.

Sizes S / M / L and XL

The shipping cost is 8€ for E.U. and United Kingdom.

Outside Europe will be charged an extra cost of shipping.

I have no money! How can I help?

Spread the word! People need to know about this campaign. 

Love, comment and share the news on Twitter, Instagram or Facebook.

Thank you for your help and your support!

13 € the POSTER LIMITED EDITION 20x30 on black paper, one color (gold) hand made silk-screen printing

designed by Leon Ka

printed by PERPETUA, MIlano

For more info: seth.morley@gmail.com
Thank you for your support.

https://vimeo.com/youaregodfilmprod

THE TALE OF THE IDIOT | Teaser

___________________________________________________

THE TALE OF THE IDIOT è un cortometraggio autoprodotto liberamente ispirato al romanzo

"PIU' CHE UMANO" di Theodore Sturgeon.

Un film diretto da Seth Morley, con la scenografia di DEM

Il montaggio è finito e ora ci prepariamo per le ultime fasi di produzione del cortometraggio, missaggio audio, correzione colore e distribuzione nel circuito dei festival cinematografici.

Vi chiediamo un piccolo contributo per sostenere le ultime fasi di produzione del film.

20 € T-Shirt EDIZIONE LIMITATA maglia nera in cotone biologico con stampa serigrafica a mano  disegnata di Leon Ka

Stampa PERPETUA, Milano

Edizione limitata 111 maglie nere con stampa oro 

disponibile nelle taglie: S/M/L e XL

13 €/£ poster EDIZIONE LIMITATA stampa serigrafica a mano su carta

  Disegno di Leon Ka

Stampa PERPETUA, Milano

Per informazioni: seth.morley@gmail.com
Grazie per il supporto

https://vimeo.com/youaregodfilmprod

_________________________________________________

THE TALE OF THE IDIOT

Synopsis

“L'amor che move il sole e l'altre stelle”

Dante, Paradiso canto XXXIII

Evelin lives with her sister Alice and her Father in an isolated cottage along the river.

Since her mother’s passing no one has ever crossed the gate of their property.

Nobody has left or entered.

They live in world in which every sign of life has to be suppressed and inhibited.

Life is a source of pain, attachments and affections induce sorrow and this evil has to be avoided.

But now something new has started to grow inside Evelin.

Something that cannot be pushed away.

Her body has awaken and has no intention to be bunked down again.

In the meantime the blossoming spring has started and a young man, called by everyone the idiot, has decided to abandon his land, looking for the woman he met in his dreams.

The story was inspired by the book “More Than Human” by Theodore Sturgeon

“ Like a stone in a peach, a yolk in an egg, he carried another thing.

It was passive, it was receptive, it was awake and alive.

If it was connected in any way to the animal integument, it ignored the

connexions. It drew its substance from the idiot and was otherwise unaware of him.”

…....................................................................................................................

“L'amor che move il sole e l'altre stelle”

Dante, Paradiso canto XXXIII

Evelin vive con la sorella Alice e il padre in una casa isolata lungo il fiume.

Da quando la loro madre se ne è andata nessuno ha più varcato il cancello della proprietà.

Nessuno è più entrato o uscito.

I tre vivono in un mondo grigio e privo di luce, un mondo dove ogni segnale di vita deve essere soppresso ed inibito.

La vita provoca dolore, i legami e gli affetti provocano dolore e questo male deve essere evitato.

Ma Evelin ora sente dentro di se nascere qualcosa di nuovo che non riesce a scacciare.

Il suo corpo si è svegliato e non ha più intenzione di tornare a dormire.

La primavera sta sbocciando e un giovane chiamato da tutti l'idiota ha deciso di lasciare la sua terra per incontrare una donna incontrata in sogno.

La storia è liberamente tratta dal libro “ Più che Umano” di Theodore Sturgeon

“ L’idiota viveva in un mondo nero e grigio,

punteggiato dai lampi bianchi della fame e dal

fremito della paura.

Come un nocciolo in una pesca o un tuorlo in un

uovo, portava dentro un’altra cosa. Una cosa

passiva e ricettiva, una cosa sveglia e viva.“ 

Theodore Sturgeon

a film by Seth Morley

with

Adriana Grigoriev

Marta Suardi

Mino Francesco Manni

Niccolò Tiberi

Set design | Dem

Costumes | Paolo Di Lorio

Art works and drawings | Leon Ka

Live audio | Andrea Pezzotta

Make up fx | Dadi etro

Adaptation and screenplay | Seth Morley e Sam Madrigal

Cinematography | Seth Morley

Edit | Seth Morley

Music:

Ludwig van Beethoven - The Consecration of the House, Op. 124

Antonin Dvorak - Rusalka - Song To The Moon

Ludwig van Beethoven - The Creatures of Prometheus, Op. 43

Ludwig van Beethoven - The Ruins of Athens, Op. 113

Johann Sebastian Bach - Prelude in C Major BWV 846

https://musopen.org

full HD | 47' | color | English | 25p

© 2017 YOU ARE GOD FILM PROD
